flores_passage: A dɔn ka a fɔ ko i tɛgɛ labilalen do kosɛbɛ i kɛ tɔ ka fɔlikanw bɛɛ fɔ koɲuma - ani fɛnɛ a lajɛ i ka na yɛlɛmakura caman kɛ ni i bolodennkɔniw ye. O cogo la, i bɛna i yɛrɛ sɛgɛn dɔɔnindɔɔnin. N hakili lajigi ko nafa tɛ a la ka kilew gosi ni fangaba ye mankanba nɔfɛ i n'a fɔ piyano kan. Akɔridiyɔn kan, walasa ka mankan layɛlɛ, i bɛ nɛgɛniw digi ni fanga ni teliya dɔɔnin ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de tɛ jate ladilikan ɲuman ye walasa ka akɔridiyɔn fɔ?
mc_answer1: Walasa ka mankan layɛlɛ, i bɛ butɔnw digu ni fanga min ye, dɔ fara o kan
mc_answer2: Lamagali nafatanw dɔgɔya kosɛbɛ walasa i ka mɛn ka sɔrɔ i ma sɛgɛn
mc_answer3: I hakili to a la ka fɔlikanw digi ka i bolo to lafiya kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Dɔ fara i ka nɛgɛniw digi cogo teliya kan walasa ka farankan mankan sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Thĩna ũrĩa mũnene hĩndi ya kũgeria gũcenjia thenema  ĩtuĩke DVD nĩ overscan. TV nyingĩ cithondeketwo nĩguo cikenie mũingĩ. Gwa gĩtũmi kĩu, kĩndũ kĩrĩa gĩothe wonaga TV inĩ kĩarĩ na mĩhaka ĩtinitio igũrũ, thĩ na mĩena. ũndũ ũyũ wĩkagwo nĩguo mbica iihũre gĩcicioinĩ gĩothe. ũndu ũyũ witagwo overscan. Kwa mutino, ungĩthondeka DVD, kwĩna uhoteku ĩtinio mĩicoinĩ, na angĩkorwo thenema nĩ irarĩ na tũcunjĩ tũkuhĩrĩirie thi, tutikuonanio tuothe.

mc_answer4: Ka dugumasɛbɛnni tigɛ ka surunya dugumana na kosɛbɛ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mɔgɔ bɛ se ka nin degun jumɛn kelen de sɔrɔ n'a bɛ ka filimu dɔ yɛlɛma ka ta DVD fɔrima la?
mc_answer1: Ja dɔ min tɛ ekaran bɛɛ lafa
mc_answer3: Ja dɔ min bɛ ekaran bɛɛ lafa

flores_passage: Amerikɛn fɛrɛ kun sinsin no ka kɛlɛ faralenɲɔgɔnkanɔ kɛ kabɔ fan sabala minunw tɛ kelen ye. Cadwalder kun bena kɛlɛkɛbolo dɔ ci Biritaniki kɛlɛkɛbolo marayɔrɔ ka`a Bordertown kɔnɔ, walasa ka farankaw bɛɛ bali. Zenerali James Ewing kun bena kɛlɛkɛla mɔgɔ 700 ta ji dala Trenton Ferry kɔnɔ, ka pɔn minɛ Assunpink Creek ani ka jugu kɛlɛkɛ kukuw bali ka boli. Kɛlɛkɛlaw yɛrɛyɛrɛn mɔgɔ ba 2400 kun bena ji tigɛ kilomɛtiri kɔnɔntɔn Trenton kɔkɔduguyanfan fɛ, ani tuguni tilara kulu fila ye, kulu kelen Greene ka mara kɔnɔ ani kulun kelen Sllivan ka mara kɔnoɔ, walasa ka sɔkɔmadani ataki kɛ yani tile kabɔ.
question: Bretaɲi kɛlɛbolo dɔ tun bɛ min?

flores_passage: "A latigɛ nin kɔ Wasadenbulɔn fɛ Zuyekalo tile 4, tigɛra sɛbɛni tigɛnon bila mina Wasadenbulɔn ɲɛmɔgɔ fɛ John Hancock ani Sɛkiretɛri Charles Thomson cira ka ta so damani damani dɔrɔn John Dunlap gafedilanyɔrɔ. Su kɔnɔnana, gafe fotokopi 150 ani 200 kɛra, min dɔnlen sinsin inafɔ ""Dunlap broadsides"". O Sɛbɛn in kalanko fɔlɔ jamana kɛra John Dixon fɛ Independence Hall kuru kɔnɔ Zuyekalo tile 8. Kelen kun jira George Washington ma Zuyekalo tile 6, min y'a kalan a ka kɛlɛkɛden kuluw ye New York kɔnɔ Zuyekalo tile 9. Sɛbɛn fotokopi de sera Londres Utikalo tile 10. Dunlap broadsides 25 min beyi alisa ye fotokopiw kɔrɔlen ye minunw balɔn na. Tigɛlasɛbɛeni sɛbɛn  yɛrɛyɛrɛ ma se ka balo."

flores_passage: faganmarakɛlaw, o baara lajɛlila, kun ye laɲinin kɛ sabatilila. Kɛlɛkuluw minunw ye nɛfɛ yɔrɔ sabati kun ye New Hampshire kɛlɛbolo 1 ani 2 mɔgɔ 200 ye, kolonɛli John Stark ani Reed ka mara kɔnɔ (u fila bɛɛ kɛla zɛnɛrali ye). Stark ka mɔgɔw jɔra dakɔrɔra gɛrɛfɛ kɔkɔdugu yanfan dan na faganmarakɛlaw ka jɔyɔrɔla. Nin ji funu fitini ye wo dayɛlɛ Mystic Riŋer fanfɛ penɛnsili kɔkɔdugu ni kɔrɔn yanfan fɛ, u ye sinsan bɔɲan jɔna nin kabkuru kɔgɔ surumaniye kɔkɔ yanfan dan fɔ ji dagolola jida fitini sanfɛ. Gidley walima Start kun ye poto  jɔ piye 100 bɔɲɔgɔngo (mɛtiri 30) sinsan nɛfɛ ani ye ɔridiri di ko mɔgɔsi kana mugu ci fo waatimina nin u yɛrɛw ka kɛlɛkɛdenw tɛmɛna la.
question: Kolonɛli Stark ka kɛlɛkulu tun bɛ min?
mc_answer1: Kɔkɔdugu yanfan dan na, ka bɛn sinsan ma
mc_answer3: Penɛnsili kan kɔrɔn ni kɔkɔdugu cɛ

question: K'a kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Stark ka mɔgɔw y'u ka sinsan bonya tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer1: Tuma min Fangamarakɛlaw ye weleweleda kɛ ka ta sabatiliw ma
mc_answer2: Kɛlɛkɛdenw tɛmɛnenw kɔ gulonni berew la
mc_answer4: Tuma min kɛlɛkɛkuluw ye ɲɛfɛla sabati

flores_passage: Waatitumaw yirasira kelen dɔrɔn tun bɛ Sini lawalema bolo; Sini waati kelen o kelen walema du kelen o kelen min ye fanga kɛ tun ye fangabolojatelenba ye. Ani fangabolo kelen o kelen ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, kabilatilanniw ka waati tun tɛ kelen ye. O waatiw la lakodɔnniba tun ye MasamaraSaba ka waati ye min ye san 60 kɛ Han ni Jin Fangabolo ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. O waatiw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, kɛlɛjugu donna hɔrɔnw cama ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ minnu ye ɲɔgɔn kɛlɛ fanga kosɔn. MasamaraSabaw kɛra jolibonbawaatiw ye Sini lawalema tariku la mɔgɔw caman saara minna faamasigiyɔrɔ nɔfɛ faamasoba kɔnɔ Xi'an.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de tun ye Sini nin juguya waati ba ye?

flores_passage: Dugumɛnɛ kulu be tama ani ka ɲaga niwo camaw na fɛnɛ. Sigiyɔrɔfalen falen waatila, dugumɛnɛni kulu be tama sufɛ ani be jɔ ka lafiyɛn tile kɔnɔ. Kulu be sigiyɔrɔfalen falen baaraw daminɛ nin dumuni minunw beyi dɔgɔyala. O waati in na, kulu be nafan dɔ dilan fɔlɔ minunw be fali dɔngɔndɔn. Nin yɔrɔfalen falen girin girinw walima tamaw be tile tani 17 de kɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de ye tiɲɛ ye dugumɛnɛ kulu don tɔ sigiyɔrɔfalen la?
mc_answer3: U bɛ ɲaga da min bɛ falen tile 17 kɔfɛ

mc_answer2: U bɛ tama tile 17 ka sɔrɔ u m'a don ɲaga la
mc_answer3: U bɛ ɲaga falen don o don
mc_answer4: U bɛ don ɲaga kelenw de la waati jayan kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Camaw ye yɛlɛmaw jateminɛ farikolo kalan na, ani tabolo sinsin neno waati dɔw la kɔnɔna yɛlɛmali cogo sɔrɔlila ani adadenfarikolo kɔnɔna sumalila. Waatidɔw la yɛlɛmali, minunw tɛ jaabi dɔrɔn ye kɛrɛmara siɲi ye, sɛbɛna balofɛnw camaw kan, bakiteriw, sanpiɲɔn, jiriw ani bangaw b'ula. Adamadenfarikolo sumana b'u yɛrɛ balo yɛlɛyma yɛlɛmalila min be kɛ yɛlɛmali labilalen waatila ali na sɔrɔ kɔfɛra siɲi teyi.
question: Fɔta jumɛn de bɛ taa fɛ hali ni kɛnɛma taamasiɲɛw bɛ yen?

flores_passage: Popilasiyɔn ye farikoloɲɛnɛmayanaw kuluw fɛn dɔla marayɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛn ne dola. Nin jamana konodenw bɛɛ ye kelen ye lajɛlila nin mɔgɔyadilan na cogoya kɛrɛnkɛrɛni ye, u be wele ko farikolo kelenw. Nin fɛnw be yɛlɛmabolo cama jira nin cogoya kɛrɛnkɛrɛni ye, u be wele ko farikolo camaw.

flores_passage: Kunkokanu yɔrɔlajɛli be mɔgɔ camaw sama min be fɛka kunkonɔ yɔrɔw lajɛ k'o kun k'o yɛrɛ lajɛli damu ye, nin jiriw ye ani kunkokɔnɔ baganw. Yɔrɔlajɛli baaraw milisaliw dɔ ye sogofaga ye, jɛgɛmɔw, fotota, kɔnɔlajɛ ani parikuw lajɛli, ani kunafoniw kalani yɔrɔ ani jiri kɛcogoyala. Misali dɔ ye lajɛli ye, fototali ye, ani kalanlikɛli ye organgatuangs kan Bɔrineyo kɔnɔ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de tɛ se ka kɛ kunkokanu yɔrɔlajɛli misaliya baara ye?

flores_passage: Sɔkɔmaw sɔkɔma, mɔgɔ be jamana fitiniw bila mɔbilila ka t'u ka baarakɛyɔrɔw la ani mɔgɔ dɔw be tɛm'ula minunw ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ye fan nin u tɛmɛn'ula dɔrɔn. Nin boli fɛn in kɔnɔ min be takasegikɛ, mɔgɔw be tugulen cogodɔla nin, ani b'u jukɔrɔma dɔndɔn, tiransipɔri fɛrɛɛw la min sirileno no yɛrɛtɔgɔla mɔbiliw kan. Dɔni y'a jira ko nin sisijugu ba sɔrɔ ye ɲɛnɛmaya yɛlɛma kabɔ a cogo kɔrɔla min y'adamaden ka taɲɛ jukɔdɔndɔn san miliyɔn fila tɛmɛni kɔnɔ.

flores_passage: Jateminɛla, ordinatɛriw fɛnw fɛn be baara la bibi in na sinsin leno kunafoni la yɛlɛma yɛlɛma la baarali kan min kode nino nin jateden fila fila cogoya yala. Jateden fila fila  be seka waleri kelen walima fila dɔrɔn ne di, n'o ye 0 walima 1, ani nin jateden be jateminɛ inafɔ fila fila jateden - walima bits, ka oridinatɛri diɲɛ kɔnɔna kuma fɔ.

flores_passage: "Bulɔguw be seka kalandenw ka sɛbɛnli taɲɛ fɛnɛ. Tumamina nin kaladenw b'u ka bulɔgu baaraw daminɛ nin kan sariyaw ani sɛbɛncogo cɛnu ye, jamaw kɛliyeb waaticamana b'o yɛlɛma. Bari kalandenw be jama kiritikelila baw ye, bulɔgu sɛbɛna b'a ɲinin cogobɛɛla ka ka sɛbɛnli taɲɛ ka jalakiliw bali. Bulɔ sɛbɛni baara be ""kalandenw karaba ka dɔni ɲinin diɲɛ kan u gɛrɛfɛ"". Nege ka jama ka nege satisifɛ b'a to kalandenw hakilidiya ani nafan dɔn ula (Toto, 2004). Bulɔ sɛbɛni baara ye fɛn ye min baaraɲɔgɔnya wele, ani kalandenw ɲɔnti k'u kalan samakataɲɛ ka tɛmɛ kalan kɔrɔnlen cogoya ta kan. Bulɔgu itilize ɲuman ""be seka fagan di kalandenw ma ka kɛ mirilili ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛlaw ye; Nin ɛntɛrɛnɛti fɛnw jaabili ye, kalandenw be sek'u jɔyɔrɔw ɲɛfɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka sɛbɛni siratigɛla, ani be sek'u yɛrɛ hakilinaw fɔ kunbalan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen dɔ kuna (Ovarec, 2002)."
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen de ma kofɔ tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ inafɔ kalanden ka bulɔguli nafa fɔlɔ?
mc_answer1: Kan sariyaw ani sɛbɛncogo cɛɲi taɲɛ
mc_answer4: Nege layɛlɛlen kalan nɔfɔ tugu la

flores_passage: "Bulɔguw be seka kalandenw ka sɛbɛnli taɲɛ fɛnɛ. Tumamina nin kaladenw b'u ka bulɔgu baaraw daminɛ nin kan sariyaw ani sɛbɛncogo cɛnu ye, jamaw kɛliyeb waaticamana b'o yɛlɛma. Bari kalandenw be jama kiritikelila baw ye, bulɔgu sɛbɛna b'a ɲinin cogobɛɛla ka ka sɛbɛnli taɲɛ ka jalakiliw bali. Bulɔ sɛbɛni baara be ""kalandenw karaba ka dɔni ɲinin diɲɛ kan u gɛrɛfɛ"". Nege ka jama ka nege satisifɛ b'a to kalandenw hakilidiya ani nafan dɔn ula (Toto, 2004). Bulɔ sɛbɛni baara ye fɛn ye min baaraɲɔgɔnya wele, ani kalandenw ɲɔnti k'u kalan samakataɲɛ ka tɛmɛ kalan kɔrɔnlen cogoya ta kan. Bulɔgu itilize ɲuman ""be seka fagan di kalandenw ma ka kɛ mirilili ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛlaw ye; Nin ɛntɛrɛnɛti fɛnw jaabili ye, kalandenw be sek'u jɔyɔrɔw ɲɛfɔ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka sɛbɛni siratigɛla, ani be sek'u yɛrɛ hakilinaw fɔ kunbalan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen dɔ kuna (Ovarec, 2002)."
question: Ninnu fɛnw kelen jumɛn de ko fɔra bulɔguli la inafɔ dusudonbaga kalanden ka sɛbɛnli taɲɛlila?
mc_answer1: Nin fɛnw jaabili ye ɛntɛrɛnɛti jaabili ye ɛntɛrinɛti kumacaman
mc_answer3: Ka bulɔgu kalanbaaw sakona ko to senna

flores_passage: Kuma fɔnfɔni ye ɲɔgɔnkɔ be mirili waati nege naati ani kumali tɔw fɛ. A b'a to kalandenw be se sɔrɔ ka baara kɛ  u yɛrɛ bɛrɛla ani kalan kunafoni konturolila u bɛrɛla. Farakan fɔlen na, waatidɔwla balelenw beyi nin baarakɛwaati yɛlɛmali cogoya dɔ ye (Bremer, 1998). Ɛntɛrɛnɛti itilizeli ani Diɲɛ Ɛrezoba Tugunlen siraw b'a to kalandenw be akisɛ sɔrɔ kunafonina waatibɛɛla. Kalandenw be seka ɲininkaliw kɛ fɛnɛ kalanfaw la tile waatibɛɛla ani be sigi nin jaabi sɔrɔli ye teliyala, nin kɔnɔnilikɛli ye fo ɲɔgɔnɲe wɛrɛ ɲɔgɔnkunbɛla.

mc_answer1: Ɛntɛrɛnɛti itilizeli inafɔ kalan kɛ minɛ
mc_answer2: Ka ɲɛ-ni-ɲɛ akisɛ sɔrɔ ni kalanfaw ye tile waati bɛ

flores_passage: Mĩako ya tene ya nyũmba cia athamaki nĩikoretwo ĩcũngĩrĩirie meciria na kũrehe mbica cia haro mecirianĩ na cia mbarathi cia Arthur. Ona ĩrũgamĩtio gatagatĩ ka matigari ma mĩako ya mĩaka ngiri ĩmwe nĩ ũhũthũ kũririkana mĩgambo na mĩnungo ya mbara thiru, hakuhĩ kũigua makinya ma mbarathi igũrũ rĩa mĩaro ya mahiga na kũigua mũnungo wa guoya ũkiuma marima ma kũiga ohũo. question: Ninnu kelen jumɛn de ma kofɔ ni tɛmɛsira in na inafɔ kasa walima mankan min tun bi ka fɛrɛ ye faamaso tiɲɛniw na?

flores_passage: Faamaso Kirby Muxloe tun ye tata ye ka tɛmɛ faamaso yɛrɛ kan, min tun ye o waatibaaranɔn  ye. A ka filantɛrɛnɔrɔlenbaw ni kogopɛnpɛrɛnlenw ye waatijankɛlɛbuniw kun. 1480 sanw kɔnɔ, a jɔli daminɛlen Lord Hastings fɛ, kayira tun bɛ jamana fanbɛ la ani lakana tun bɛ ɲini fo ni coolokuluni dɔw tun nana binkani na.
question: Ninnu kelen jumɛn de bi faamaso Kirby Muxloe cogoya jaati ɲɛfɔ ka?
mc_answer1: Faamaso tata kogow tun laɲininen do Lord Hastings fɛ
mc_answer2: A tun mako bɛ kogopɛnpɛrɛnlen fitini na ka sabu kɛ jamana ka bɛn ye jɔli waati la
mc_answer3: Faamaso jɔli tun ta damana ko ye o waati
mc_answer4: A tun jɔla walasa ka mɛn kosɔbɛ ani ka kɛlɛ gɛlɛw kunbɛn

mc_answer2: Subasema jɔlendo ka min mɛn ka kɛlɛ kunbɛn
mc_answer3: Tatakogo jɔli ka dɔgɔ ka tɛmɛn faamaso ka

flores_passage: Nin yɛlɛmali ye kimotɛri tilan ko naani na bolila, teliya be dɔgɔyala baakɛ ani jijali kɛra jagoya ye. Awɔ kilimɛtiri kilancɛ boliba, mɔgɔ dɔ min be seka sanga bila bugo, kan ka teliya damakɛɲɛne sɔrɔ, nka jija kan ka matarafa kunbalan bɛɛ kɔnɔ. Dɔw bolotɔ be jamana cɛci nɛnɛ waatila, nin sanfɛ farikolo fanw bɔɲɔnalibaaraw tuguli y'ala,  ye labɛni waati ɲɛnɛma ye kabɛn bolili waatima.

mc_answer2: Ka sinsin teliya matarafali kan degeli waatila
mc_answer4: Farikoloɲɛnajɛyɔrɔ itilizeli ye ka sanfɛ farikolo fanw bɔɲɔnalibaaraw kɛ

Farikolo kɛnɛya barika dakɛɲɛnali marali, jimi waleyaw ɲuma barali ani dafana fɛnw cogoya cama famuya be seka farikoloɲɛnɛjɛra dɛmɛ ka ka dɔfara a farikolo se kan ani ka ka farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ damu bɔnɲa.
question: Farikoloɲɛnɛjɛra dɔ fɛ, fɔta jumɛn de tɛ se ka sɔrɔ dumuniɲumannafama waleyaw dɔrɔn fɛ?

flores_passage: Yɔrɔ camancɛ bolili  ye cogola farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ nɔgɔmani ye; nka, famuyabaliya beyi ka ɲesin fɛn fitiniw minunw be laɲinin ka dɔn la. Fɛnw be seka san nin mako b'ala, nka a cama bena nafan finiti walima tɛna nafan fɔyisi s'i farikolo se ma. farikoloɲɛnɛjɛlaw be sek'a jateminɛ ku be fɛnw do fɛ ali na sɔrɔ a tɛ nafan s'ama.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Muna yɔrɔ camancɛ bolila bɛ se ka fɛnw san minnu da ka gɛlɛn?

mc_answer3: A bɛ na nafa ba se u ka farikolo se ma
mc_answer4: Famuyabaliya dɔw bɛ fɛn danɔngɔnw dafɛ

flores_passage: "MRI sinsinleno piziki fenomɛni kan min be wele nikilerɛri makan bɔlen ye (NMR), min kodɔn na san ba 1930 kɔnɔ Felix Bloch fɛ (be baara kɛ Stanford Sanfɛkalansola) ani Edward Purcell (Kabɔ Harvard Sanfɛkalansola). Nin ni makan ye, ɛman foro and aradiyo jikuruw be seka to atomuw be siɲali fitiniw di. San ba 1970 kɔnɔn Raymond damadian, dɔkɔtɔrɔ ani dɔni ɲɛɲilikɛra dɔw,  ye ja dili ni makan ye ju dɔn inafɔ dɔkɔtɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛglikɛ baara minɛ. San naani kɔfɛ tiyiga sɛbɛn dɔ dir'ama min kun diɲɛ tigiya sɛbɛn fɔlɔ dilile ye MRI domɛni kɔnɔ. San ba 1977, Dɔkitɛri Damadian ye ""farikolo fɔlɔ"" dilani dafan, MRI sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛna, a ye min wele ko ""bukɔbali""."

flores_passage: Adamadenw de ye dantanfɛnw ye minunw de be seka mɔgɔ wɛrɛw hakilinaw kalan. O kɔrɔ ye k'anw be seka ɲɛfɔ jogojɛlen na adamaden tɔw be min ye, kaniya, damina, dɔn  walima fɛ. O se ninunw cɛra, mɔgɔ wɛrɛw kaniya famuyali nafan ka bɔn kosɛbɛ. A b'a t'anw be adamaden ko dogoninw dɔw ɲɛnɛbɔ. flores_passage: Mwĩcirĩrie mwega nĩ urĩa urongoreirio guetha kĩhonia kia kũrehe mĩciirĩrie ĩtiganĩte hamwe nĩgũo gwetha kĩhonia. ũndũ ũrĩa waarĩ na bata mwĩcirĩrie inĩ wari ihenya, ũũgĩ na kwaga kuhĩtia, hamwe na kumenya ma, kũhũthĩra njĩra ĩria ciothe ciiho hamwe na kũmaatha moohoro. ũndũ ũrĩa wa bata mũno mwĩcirĩrie-ini ũyũ: Gũkorago na kĩhonia kĩmwe: Wĩchirie ũhoro wa ihonia igĩrĩ, wega kana ũru. Mwĩcirĩrie wa mũthemba ũyũ ukuruhanĩte na maũndũ magainie na gĩthomo kĩa sayansi haamwe na miĩkie mĩtĩkĩrĩku ya maũndũ. Andũ arĩa makorago na mwĩcirĩrie ta ũcio nĩmahotaga kũririkana mĩtaratara, kũona ihonia na kũruta wĩra kũringana na ithimi cia sayansi.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, fɔta jumɛn de ye mɔgɔ ka fanga ye mɔgɔ min bɛ miiricogokɛ min bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka yirali kɛ jaabi ɲuman cama na kungo kelen na
mc_answer2: Ka fɛɛrɛ kuraw labaara kungo dɔ la
mc_answer3: K’u ka tan ta ka kungo ɲɛnabɔ

flores_passage: Mwĩcirĩrie mwega nĩ urĩa urongoreirio guetha kĩhonia kia kũrehe mĩciirĩrie ĩtiganĩte hamwe nĩgũo gwetha kĩhonia. ũndũ ũrĩa waarĩ na bata mwĩcirĩrie inĩ wari ihenya, ũũgĩ na kwaga kuhĩtia, hamwe na kumenya ma, kũhũthĩra njĩra ĩria ciothe ciiho hamwe na kũmaatha moohoro. ũndũ ũrĩa wa bata mũno mwĩcirĩrie-ini ũyũ: Gũkorago na kĩhonia kĩmwe: Wĩchirie ũhoro wa ihonia igĩrĩ, wega kana ũru. Mwĩcirĩrie wa mũthemba ũyũ ukuruhanĩte na maũndũ magainie na gĩthomo kĩa sayansi haamwe na miĩkie mĩtĩkĩrĩku ya maũndũ. Andũ arĩa makorago na mwĩcirĩrie ta ũcio nĩmahotaga kũririkana mĩtaratara, kũona ihonia na kũruta wĩra kũringana na ithimi cia sayansi.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛŋ de tɛ jate inafɔ sinsinyɔrɔ mɔgɔw ka hakilina la minnu miiricogokɛ bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: K’a famu ko jaabi ɲuman kelen dɔrɔn de bɛ yen

flores_passage: Widewo dilan natilli y'an sama ka ɲɛɲiniliw nafan ma cama kɛ farikolo tabolo finitiw ɲɛfɔlila, ɲɛda yɛlɛmaw cogoya ɲɛfɔlila minunw ye milisekɔndi damadami dɔrɔn. kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, a fɔra ko a be seka dɔ nin mɔgɔ dɔ be ka nkalɔn tikɛ nin a farilikolo yɛlɛma cogoya finitiw ɲɛfɔli kaɲɛ kosɛbɛ. Oiver Sacks, a ka sɛbɛn kɔnɔ The President's Speech, ya jira cogomina mɔgɔ minunw tɛ seka kuma famuya ka sababu kɛ nzɛbɛn cɛnliye, be seka jɛlenya sɛgɛsɛgɛ kaɲɛ kosɛbɛ. Hali a y'a jira ko nin sew suguw adamaden kɛcogo ɲɛfɔlila be seka sɔrɔ lala baganw fɛnɛ na inafɔ wulu marataw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de tɛ jate inafɔ farikolo tabolo fitini?
mc_answer1: Ka yɔrɔwɛrɛ lajɛ n’i bɛ kumana

flores_passage: Widewo dilan natilli y'an sama ka ɲɛɲiniliw nafan ma cama kɛ farikolo tabolo finitiw ɲɛfɔlila, ɲɛda yɛlɛmaw cogoya ɲɛfɔlila minunw ye milisekɔndi damadami dɔrɔn. kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, a fɔra ko a be seka dɔ nin mɔgɔ dɔ be ka nkalɔn tikɛ nin a farilikolo yɛlɛma cogoya finitiw ɲɛfɔli kaɲɛ kosɛbɛ. Hali a y'a jira ko nin sew suguw adamaden kɛcogo ɲɛfɔlila be seka sɔrɔ lala baganw fɛnɛ na inafɔ wulu marataw.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn de tɛ tiɲɛ ye farikolo tabolo finiti ɲɛfɔli kan?
mc_answer1: Widewo dilan y'an sama ka taa ɲɛtaa nafamanbaw ma
mc_answer2: ɲɛfɔli cogo ɲuman bɛ se ka nkalon ye
mc_answer3: Kumakan ani ɲɛda cogoyaw ɲɛfɔlen do
mc_answer4: A be seka dɛmɛlikɛ ka jɛlenya sɛgɛsɛgɛ

flores_passage: Komi dɔni sɔrɔli ani kalanli se yɛlɛmala cogola inafɔ a fɔra sanfɛ cogomina, o jateminɛ nɔrɔmali mina dɔni be sɔrɔ yɛlɛmala. Fɛɛrɛ walasa ka kunafoni sɔrɔ n'o tɛ kelen ye. Piresiyon tɛyi tuguni mɔgɔ kelen ka mirila, nka mirili gafe la se kɛra piriyorite  ba ye. Duguma jateminɛla, Renaissance ye yɛlɛma ba dɔn kalanli fɛɛrɛ la ani dɔni carilila.
question: Ninnu jumɛn nafa boɲana kosɛbɛ k’a sabu jɛ Renaissance ye?

flores_passage: Komi dɔni sɔrɔli ani kalanli se yɛlɛmala cogola inafɔ a fɔra sanfɛ cogomina, o jateminɛ nɔrɔmali mina dɔni be sɔrɔ yɛlɛmala. Fɛɛrɛ walasa ka kunafoni sɔrɔ n'o tɛ kelen ye. question: K’a sabu kɛ Renaissance ye, sinsinni dɔgɔyara ninnu jumɛn de kan?

flores_passage: "Intanet nĩĩingĩranĩtie mĩario ya mũingĩ na ya gatagatĩ ka mũndũ na ũrĩa ũngĩ. Maũndũ ma intanet nĩmoongereire mwĩkĩre wa mandũ na mũcokerie wa ngatho. Kwa mũhiano, ""gũthoma"" na ""kũiguana"" nĩ mamwe ma maũndũ macũngĩrĩirio nĩ kũhũthĩrwo kwa intanet (James et al., 1995). ""Kũingĩrio kwa mũingi"" na ""njoho cia wendo"" onacio nĩciacungĩrĩirie Eighmey na McCord (1998) kũũrĩria mwonere wa athomi na athikĩrĩria a website."
question: Ninnu jumɛn de tɛ kun jira ka ɛntɛrinɛti labaara jɛɲɔgɔnya min bɛ taɲɛ kama?
mc_answer2: Ka to jɛɲɔgɔnya la ni denbaya ye

question: Ninnu jumɛn de tɛ kun jira ka ɛntɛrinɛti labaara mɔgɔ yɛrɛ sendonni kama?
mc_answer1: Ka dumunidɔ nafɛnw n’a tobicogo ɲini
mc_answer2: Ka bilikɛ ɛntɛrineti barokɛyɔrɔ dɔ kan

flores_passage: Gotik taabolo ye Sanba tanifilafili kɛra sankɛmɛsigi 10na, 11na ni 14na. Daminɛ na Donfini in  yɛlɛmacogo tunbe Byzantine laada bolo kɔrɔn fɛ. Nka k'a da kunnafonidi siraw sumaya kan, Erɔpu taabolow tun be se ka to kɔ ni san 25 k'a se 30 ma. Cɛmancɛ Waati laban yɔrɔw la, Erɔpu tilebin y'a daminɛ k'a yɛrɛ ka taabolo yiriwa. O waati ɲɛtaa ba dɔ ye, diinɛkɛlɛw sabu la, kuruniw labaarali ye ka donfiniw datugu.
question: Tuma jumɛn Erɔpu tilebin yan fan y’a banbanni dabila ni fangan ye wali taabolo kan k’a yɛrɛka taabolo yiriwali daminɛ?
mc_answer3: San 25 yɔrɔw la Cɛmancɛ Waati kɔfɛ

flores_passage: Gotik taabolo ye Sanba tanifilafili kɛra sankɛmɛsigi 10na, 11na ni 14na. Daminɛ na Donfini in  yɛlɛmacogo tunbe Byzantine laada bolo kɔrɔn fɛ. Nka k'a da kunnafonidi siraw sumaya kan, Erɔpu taabolow tun be se ka to kɔ ni san 25 k'a se 30 ma. Cɛmancɛ Waati laban yɔrɔw la, Erɔpu tilebin y'a daminɛ k'a yɛrɛ ka taabolo yiriwa. O waati ɲɛtaa ba dɔ ye, diinɛkɛlɛw sabu la, kuruniw labaarali ye ka donfiniw datugu.
question: kuruniw labaarali ka donfiniw datugu sabu bɔra mun de la?

flores_passage: Anw be seka balo tɛriyala nin diɲɛ ye, anw be seka dɔn diɲɛ kɔlɔlisili kulula, ani anw be seka kɛ ali o kɛlɛkɛbaw ye walasa ka kɔlɔlɔw nata dɔgɔya cogoyala. O ye dɔrɔn bana tamasiyɛn furakɛli ye ka camana. Nka nin i tɛ dile dama dama ni fura fɛ, ola anw kan ka kunbalan jujɔn ɲinin ka dɔn, ani anw kan k'u bali ka baara kɛ. O ye kɛnɛkan ko ye ko diɲɛ yɛlɛmala kosɛbɛ ko sababu kɛ adamaden ka dɔniya ani tɛkinolozi tali ye ɲɛ, ani kunbalan cayala kosɛbɛ ko sababu kɛ mɔgɔcayakojugu ye  ani adamenw ka balolocogo damatɛmɛlen ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de jatelen do inafɔ waatijan fɛɛrɛ min be se ka kɛ diɲɛ kunkow la?
mc_answer4: Ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni diɲɛ kɔlɔlisili kulula

flores_passage: Anw be seka balo tɛriyala nin diɲɛ ye, anw be seka dɔn diɲɛ kɔlɔlisili kulula, ani anw be seka kɛ ali o kɛlɛkɛbaw ye walasa ka kɔlɔlɔw nata dɔgɔya cogoyala. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de jatelen tɛ inafɔ bana tamasiyɛn furakɛli diɲɛ kungow la?
mc_answer2: Ka kunbalan jujɔnw balili ka baara kɛ
mc_answer3: Ka kumakan bila balocogo damatɛmɛlen sugandili balili ma
mc_answer4: Ka balo ni diɲɛ teriya cogoyaw ye kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: Fangalatilen tun ye taabolo dɔ ye minna Erɔpu jamanaw tun bɛ a ɲinina  ka Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ ka taya makaran. Hakilina tun ye ko Erɔpu jamanaw bɛɛ ka a ɲini ka jamana kelen bali ka fangaba sɔrɔ, o la jamanamarabulonw tun bɛ u ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw yɛlɛmayɛlɛma waati dɔ la walasa ka fanga tilenlen to. Ɛsipaɲi fanga yɛlɛmayɛlɛma kɛlɛ ye kɛlɛ fɔlɔdaminɛ yira min jujɔn tun ye fangalatilen ye. O kɛra yɛlɛmaba dɔ taamasiɲɛ ye, komi Ɛrɔpu jamanaw tun tɛ na u yɛrɛ bila diinɛkokɛlɛw la tun. O la sa, San Bisabakɛlɛ kɛra diinɛkɛlɛ dɔ taamasiɲɛ ye.
question: Ɛsipaɲi fanga yɛlɛmayɛlɛma kɛlɛ ye kɛlɛ fɔlɔdaminɛ yira min jujɔn tun ye fangalatilen ye kasɔrɔ a ma kɛ diinɛko hukumu kɔnɔ?

Ɛsipaɲi fanga yɛlɛmayɛlɛma kɛlɛ ye kɛlɛ fɔlɔdaminɛ yira min jujɔn tun ye fangalatilen ye. O kɛra yɛlɛmaba dɔ taamasiɲɛ ye, komi Ɛrɔpu jamanaw tun tɛ na u yɛrɛ bila diinɛkokɛlɛw la tun. O la sa, San Bisabakɛlɛ kɛra diinɛkɛlɛ dɔ taamasiɲɛ ye.
question: Kɛlɛjumɛn de kofɔlen do kumadɔw la inafɔ ‘diinɛkɛlɛ’ laban?

flores_passage: Ihinda-inĩ rĩrĩ rĩu kanitha wa Catholic nĩwatongete mũno na ũkagĩa hinya na andũ nĩmooragia ciũria. Makĩria ma mĩaka ngiri dini ya ũkristiano niyanyitithanĩtie mabũrũri ma Europe ona mena mĩario na mĩtugo ĩtiganĩte. Hinya wayo mũingĩ wahutagia andũ othe kuuma muthamaki ngina aikari. ũmwe wa mawĩtĩkio manene ma ũkristiano nĩ atĩ ũtonga waagĩrĩirwo kũhũthĩrwo kũnina thĩna na atĩ mbeca cia kanitha ciĩho nĩũndũ wa gĩtũmi kĩu. Kanitha yaigĩte ũtongoria wayo Rome mĩaka makĩria ma ngiri ĩmwe na gũcokanĩrĩra kũu kwa hinya na mbeca nĩgwatũmaga aingĩ marigwo kana nĩyahingagia bata wayo.
question: Nin yɔrɔ jumɛnw de la Egilizi Katoliki tun tɛ ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ?
mc_answer1: Ni nafolomanfɛnw tilacogo tun bɛnnen don Egilisi kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Ni diinɛ sariya jɔnjɔnw kan ka ladilan
mc_answer4: Ni Egilizi sariya jɔnjɔnw tun bɛ ka dafa

flores_passage: Ocutɔburukalo tile 6 san 1789, Masamuso Marie Antoinette,  u den fila (Marie Therese san 11 ani Louis Charles san 6) ani masakɛ in balimamuso, Madam Elizabeth,  jakoyara feerekɛ musokulu dɔ fɛ ka ka bɔ Pari ta segin Versailles. Sowotoro dɔ kɔnɔ, u seginna Pari u lamininen jaman dɔ fɛ minnu be kule ni kankari da la Masakɛ ni Masamuso ma. Jaman in ye Masakɛ ni Masamuso jakoya k'u ka sowotoro fɛlɛwow bɛɛ dayɛlɛ. Waati dɔ selen, jaman in mɔgɔ dɔ ye Masa lakanabaa dɔ kunkolo yanga min fagara Versailles Masamuso jatigɛlen ɲɛna.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jɔn de fagara Versailles ?

question: Ninnu na, mun de jagoya Massakɛ ni Masamuso kan Jama fɛ?

flores_passage: Sɔɔni balawu daminɛni kɔ, Beretaɲi ye Alimaɲi jisira datugun. Fɛɛrɛ tun ɲɛna, ka minɛkunbabaw tigɛ kɛlɛdenw ni mɔgɔgansanw la, hali ni a sɔrɔ ni datuguli in tun bɛ diɲɛlamini sariya sɔsɔ kosɛbɛ bɛn kɛra min kan diiɲɛlaminisankɛmɛfilalabanbɛnkansɛbɛnw fɛ. Beretaɲi ye mugujugu bila diɲɛjiw la ka kurunw bɛɛ bali  ka don kɔgɔjiba la, minnu ye cɛmancɛkurunw fɛnɛ bila farati la. Ikomi jabijɔnjɔn ma sɔrɔ o fɛɛrɛ in na, Alimaɲi tun bɛ fɛ ka o jabi ɲɔgɔn boloda a ka kɛlɛjijukɔrɔkurun na.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de sabu tɛ Beretaɲi ka bɛnkanbaliya kɔgɔjila kɛlɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Alimaɲi sago ka o kɛlɛ fɛɛrɛ suguw kɛ
mc_answer2: Kurun minnu tun sen tɛ fosi la, olu bilala farati la
mc_answer4: Fɛn nafamanbaw tun tɛ se ka sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Sɔɔni balawu daminɛni kɔ, Beretaɲi ye Alimaɲi jisira datugun. Fɛɛrɛ tun ɲɛna, ka minɛkunbabaw tigɛ kɛlɛdenw ni mɔgɔgansanw la, hali ni a sɔrɔ ni datuguli in tun bɛ diɲɛlamini sariya sɔsɔ kosɛbɛ bɛn kɛra min kan diiɲɛlaminisankɛmɛfilalabanbɛnkansɛbɛnw fɛ. question: Kumasen jumɛn de tɛ lakilili kɛ ka ɲɛ Beretaɲi ka jisira datugu la min kɛra Alimaɲi kama?
mc_answer2: A ye Alimaɲi ka jijukɔrɔkɛlɛ lawuli
mc_answer3: A ye Alimaɲi ka minɛnkumabaw tɛmɛni bali
mc_answer4: A y’a sabati kurun minnu tɛ mɔgɔsi ta ye olu kana bila farati la

flores_passage: Lameriki jamana kɔnɔ, mogɔ bɔɲɔngo ba 400.000 nzɛbɛn bana (MS) ɲɔgɔn camaw d beyi, k'o kɛ kunkolola bana fɔlɔ ye denmiseniw ani mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw camancɛ taw la. Nzɛbɛ bana (MS) ye bana ye min be fasa sira caman cɛ ta juruw minɛ, minunw  ye nzɛbɛn, kɔkolo ani ɲɛ fasaw faralen ye ɲɔgɔ kan. Ɲɛninili ye jira ko musow ka teli ka nzɛbɛn bana in sɔrɔ siyɛn ka tɛmɛ cɛ kan.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, a ka c’a la mɔgɔ jumɛn de bɛ se ka sɛgɛ ko nsɛmɛ bana yer’a la?

flores_passage: Ɲɛninli in y'a jira ko jigitigɛ ani jɔrɔ ani kojuguw be seka dimi ani lujura kɔ duguma dimi cɛ banabatɔw dilan. Dimi kɔlɔlɔ dɔrɔn, min tɛ jigitigɛ ani jɔrɔ ye fɛnw ye dɔgɔkun PA baaraw sirileno mina. Minunw b'u sedɔn nin baaraw jɔlen na mako be dɛmɛla dimi yeli cogojuguma la ani danfara kɛlila dimi dabilabalila ani waatidɔw faridoɲɔgɔnala ko sababu kɛ dɔngɔndɔn boli boli ye.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, minnu b'u sedɔn nin baara jɔlenw na olu mako bɛ dɛmɛ caman na ka ɲɛsin mun ma?

flores_passage: Farikoloɲɛnajɛ kura ɛsikirimu be zuye niwo cama na, ka daminɛ sanfɛ kalandenw la minunw y'a kalan sanfɛ kalansola ka ta bila a dɔn ba nganaw la Olɛnpiki tulɔnkɛla la. Farikoloɲɛnajɛ in be zuye fɔlɔfɔlɔ ɲɔgɔndan cogoyala, ɛsikirimlu zuyeba kelen ani dɔwɛrɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, a ka c'a la ɛsikirimu be zuye cogodi?

flores_passage: Kɔnɔna dɔngɔnɔn be seka y'o yɔrɔninbɛla. O waleyaw inafɔ fɔnɔli ye dangɛ min ma se sɛgɛsɛgɛli jɔna jɔna ma. Tamasiyɛn ɲuman ɲuman kɔnɔna dɔngɔnɔn kan be seka kɛ fura baraniw ye ani furaw bagama sɔrɔli ye. A kɔfara lajɛ walaka ka dɛmɛli kunafoni jɔnjɔn sɔrɔ o dɔngɔnɔn kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de be se ka kɛ Kɔnɔna dɔngɔnɔn tamasiɲɛ barikama ba ye?

flores_passage: Walasa ka benkɛla min kan lajɛ, i kan k'a kɛ yɔrɔ lajɛ fɔlɔ walaka ki ka lakana sabati. I kan kan benkɛla min kan cogoya jateminɛ waatimina i be gɛr'ala ani dirapo wilema suguw sugu. N'i jɔgilila i kɛ tɔ ka dɛmɛlikɛ, i be sekana kɔw tɔw juguya dɔrɔn ne.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, walasa ka binkɛra min kan lajɛ, baara bɛrɛbɛnnen fɔlɔ jimɛn de k'an ka kɛ?
mc_answer2: Binkɛra min kan ka gɛrɛ o la
mc_answer3: Binkɛra min kan k'o cogola lajɛ

flores_passage: Walasa ka benkɛla min kan lajɛ, i kan k'a kɛ yɔrɔ lajɛ fɔlɔ walaka ki ka lakana sabati. I kan kan benkɛla min kan cogoya jateminɛ waatimina i be gɛr'ala ani dirapo wilema suguw sugu. N'i jɔgilila i kɛ tɔ ka dɛmɛlikɛ, i be sekana kɔw tɔw juguya dɔrɔn ne.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn de tɛ ye, bin kɛra min kan k'o lajɛ cogo baaraw jira ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer2: Ka yɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ ka kɔn bin kɛra min kan ɲɛ
mc_answer3: Bin kɛra min kan ko cogoya la
mc_answer4: Ka lajɛ ka jateminɛ kɛ dirapo bilema suguw sugu la

flores_passage: Sigida ni politiki kɔlɔlɔw caman tun bɛ ye i n'a fɔ hakɛjate, bɔli kelennafanga na ka taa tilannifanga, bɛɛya  la ani daŋanuya ko jamana ye jama ta ye nka kuntigi kelen ta tɛ. Yɛlɛma fɛnɛ kɛlen kɔ baaraw dayɛlɛra cɛw bɛɛ ye minnu tun bɛ u ɲinina ka sababu kɛ timinandibaw ni garisɛgɛtigibaw ye ka ɲɛ sɔrɔ u ka kow la. O kelen kɛra kɛlɛcɛw la bawo sani jalasɔrɔ ka kɛ jɛɲɔgɔnyako ye a kɛra o waati seko ani dɔnko mugudala ye. Faransi Yɛlɛma fɛnɛ ye jamana wɛrɛw mɔgɔdegunnenw caman sɔn hakili la ka yɛlɛmaw dadon u yɛrɛ fɛ yen.
question: Yɛlɛma jumɛnw de sabu bɔra Faransi Yɛlɛma la n’olu ye nɔ bila fasoden baarakɛlaw la kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer2: Sinsin bɔli jɛɲɔgɔnyako kan ka taa seko ni dɔnko kan

question: Ka tugu Faransi Yɛlɛma la, sanga sɔrɔli kɛlɛcɛya la ani baara wɛrɛw la a ka dɔgɔn a la o tun sinsin ne bɛ mun de kan?

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ bɛɛ be sen dɔn dugubaara la ani be tiransipɔri sira itilize. Mɔgɔw bɛɛ b'u damagasi tiransipɔri siraw cogoyala. Jamana minunw taleno ɲɛ kɔnɔ, a ka gɛlɛ i ka nin damagasiw suguw mɛ ji kalite kuna walima pɔnw beni duguma kuna. Muna tiransipɔritasiyɔn cogoya siraw be damagasiw natai, muna u tɛ sɔn dɔngɔndɔ? Yala tiransipɔri baarabaw tɛ se foyila wa? Walima yala fɛn fitini dɔ beka kɛ wa?
question: A fɔlendo ko wasa ka dɔgɔn ka ɲɛsin foroba baarada jumɛn de ma kosɛbɛ jamana yiriwalenw na?

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ bɛɛ be sen dɔn dugubaara la ani be tiransipɔri sira itilize. Mɔgɔw bɛɛ b'u damagasi tiransipɔri siraw cogoyala. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de be se ka fɔ foroba tiransipɔri kan?
mc_answer1: U kanunen ka ɲɛ u ta baga bɛɛ fɛ
mc_answer2: U tiɲɛnen do ka tɛmɛ ji kalite kan
mc_answer3: U ye u la baara bagaw bila ka damakasi caman kɛ
mc_answer4: U ye fu ye jamana yiriwalen cama na

flores_passage: Sirikilasiyɔn bolili bolifɛnw bolilaw kelen kelen ka bolili kalan ani mɔbiliw pɔnw fila ni ɲɔgɔncɛ  ani seɲɔgɔma ɲɔgɔn na u be min kɛ. Nka, sirikilasiyɔn bolili kalanli ka gɛlɛ bari mɔbili bolila kɛcogoya tɛ seka dɔn 100 purusan na. Jigisilila, mɔbilibolilaw be tabolo ta kategori jɔnjɔn do kɔnɔ; sirikilasiyɔn bolili be tugu boli hakɛyale dɔla ani be seka sɛbɛn cogogɛlɛna nin mati ye. Walasa ka sirikilasiyɔn bolili sɛbɛn, tuguɲɔgɔnya kɛra fɛn cogoya saba nin ɲɔgɔn cɛ: (1) bolili, (2) a bɔnɲa ani (3) a teliya. tuguɲɔgɔnya be desɛn mirili nɔgɔya, ani sirakunana cogogaw baaraw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn bɛ se ka gɛlɛya ka jateminɛ kɛ k’a sababu kɛ mɔbili bolila kɛcogoya tɛ seka dɔn?

flores_passage: Sirikilasiyɔn bolili bolifɛnw bolilaw kelen kelen ka bolili kalan ani mɔbiliw pɔnw fila ni ɲɔgɔncɛ  ani seɲɔgɔma ɲɔgɔn na u be min kɛ. question: Ninnu jumɛn de bɛ labaara walasa sirikilasiyɔn bolili be seka sɛbɛn nin mati ye?

flores_passage: Hershey ani Chase ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kun ye hakilina ɲɛfɛ ta ya nin adayɛni kun ye a jɔlan fɛn ye. Hershey ani Chase ye bakiterifagana walima banakisɛw nati k'u yɛrɛ ka adayɛni dɔn banakisɛ kɔnɔ. U ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli lajɛli fila kɛ nin adeyɛni damasiyɛli ye banakisɛfagana kɔnɔ nin fɔsifɔri farima ye walima banakisɛfagana puroteyini ye nin silifiri farima ye.
question: Hershey ni Chase ye mun de itilize ka k'u yɛrɛ ka adayɛni dɔn?

flores_passage: Yɛlɛmali be seka kɔlɔlɔ cama di ka da yɛlɛmali cogoya kan, o dilan fɛn nafan ye ani nin farikolobɔn minɛlen ye farikolobɔn dɔ bɔlen anu bugulen ye. Yɛlɛmali farikolobɔn dɔ bɔlen ani bugulen dɔrɔn de be seka ta denmisɛniw ma, tumamina nin yɛlɛmaliw yɔrɔwɛrɛw la be seka farikolobɔn bagali walima kansɛri nati.
question: Yɛlɛmali ka se ka taa bɔnaw la o dulonnen do mun na?
mc_answer1: Ni farikolobɔn ye bɔlen ani bugulen ye
mc_answer4: Ni yɛlɛmali be se ka farikolobɔn faga

flores_passage: Yɛlɛmali be seka kɔlɔlɔ cama di ka da yɛlɛmali cogoya kan, o dilan fɛn nafan ye ani nin farikolobɔn minɛlen ye farikolobɔn dɔ bɔlen anu bugulen ye. question: Ka da kunafoni dilenw kan tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ, yɛlɛma nɔ suguyaw tɛ u jigi da mun kan?
mc_answer1: Nɔ bilala jɔlan fɛn hakɛ joli la
mc_answer2: Ni Nɔ bilala bɔn dɔ bɔlen ani bugulen ye
mc_answer3: Nɔbilala jɔlan fɛ min na o nafa

flores_passage: A beko bakɔlɔniw fɔlɔ kun marala san 10.000 dɛmɛniko Zagros kulu la Iran kɔnɔ. Tabolo ani siyakulu dɛmɛninw y'a daminɛ k'u mara walasa ka nɔnɔ, kunsigi, sogo ani golow sɔrɔ nɔgɔyala. Bakurubala, bakɔlɔni maralen kun maralen dɔ kuluw cɛra minunw kun be yala kuluw la walima biman yɔrɔ wɛɛrɛw la, waatidɔw la kun be gɛn bagangɛnanw fɛ minunw kun ya waaticama denmisɛniw walima cɛmisɛniw, minw kasurun bagangɛnan kodɔnlen na. Nin bagan gɛn fɛrɛw beka nati ali bibi in na.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de tun tɛ kun ye walasa tabolow ka baa mara?
mc_answer1: U tun b’a to u bɛ sogo sɔrɔ
mc_answer2: U tun bɛ bin dun k’a dalakɛɲɛ
mc_answer4: U tun b’a to u bɛ nɔnɔ sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Gɔlifu ye farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ je min n'a zuyebaw be jiri fɛrɛn do labaara ka balɔn bugɔ ka dɔn wɔni kɔnɔ. Zuye fan fɔlɔ be kɛ wɔni tanisegin la, nin zuyekɛraw daminɛli ye waatibɛla wɔni fɔlɔla ani taleɲɛ ba laban wɔni taniseginanla. Zuwekɛra min bɔni fitini kɛ, walima jirifɛrɛ yɛlɛma yɛlɛma dafa ka turu sebaya sɔrɔ. Zuwe be kɛ bin sanfɛ ani bin min be wɔni da gɛrɛfɛ tigɛlen kokɛ fitini ani be wele green.
question: Gɔlifu kun ye ka mun hakɛ dɔgɔmani taa?

flores_passage: Gɔlifu ye farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ je min n'a zuyebaw be jiri fɛrɛn do labaara ka balɔn bugɔ ka dɔn wɔni kɔnɔ. question: Gɔlifu tɛrɛnkan, yɔrɔ jumɛn bin tigɛlendo k’a surunya?

flores_passage: Dɔni kun fɔlɔ ye ka dɔn cogomina diɲɛ boli nin dɔniya fɛrɛw ye. Nin fɛrɛ in be dɔniya ɲɛɲinili tilancɛ bɛ nɛfɛ. A tɛ kelen dɔrɔn ye koyi, sɛgɛsɛgɛli lajɛli, ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli dɔ ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye min be nati walasa ka hakilina kelen walima fila den gɛrɛfɛ, ɲininkaliw kɛli ani lajɛliw kɛli be dɔni ɲɛɲininli nɛfɛ.
question: Jumɛn ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli kun ye?
mc_answer1: Ka hakilina kelen walima caman dɛn kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer2: K’a faamu diɲɛ bɛ cogo min na

flores_passage: Dɔni kun fɔlɔ ye ka dɔn cogomina diɲɛ boli nin dɔniya fɛrɛw ye. Nin fɛrɛ in be dɔniya ɲɛɲinili tilancɛ bɛ nɛfɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de tɛ dɛmɛlikɛ ka dɔni ɲinini bila sira?
mc_answer3: Hakilina minnu bɛ se ka sɔrɔ k’olu dɛn gɛrɛfɛ

flores_passage: Fiyɛnkolɔɔn be jirijuw bɔn, a be sojanw jirifɛrɛnw ta kabɔ u kuna, ani ka mɔbiliw ta k'u fili sanfɛ. Fiyɛnkolɔn fan juguma fila te tɛmɛ nɛgɛ kanɛ saban kan. Fiyɛnkolɔɔn be jiri jubɔn, ganselitabulow ji kabɔ sojanw sanfɛ, ani mɔbili pan ka sanfɛlala. Fiyɛnkolɔn fan juguma fila te tɛmɛ nɛgɛ kanɛ saban kan. Nin subaga fiyɛnkolɔn be fiyɛnw fili min be kimomɛtiri 480 lɛrɛ kɔnɔ (133 mɛtiri/sekɔndi kɔnɔ; 300 mph).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kumasen jumɛn de tɛ tiɲɛ ye fiyɛnkolonw kan?
mc_answer1: Fiyɛnkolonw bɛ se ka fɛn bɛɛ tiɲɛ u kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer2: Fiyɛnkolonw bɛ yɔrɔ fitininw gosi ka tɛmɛ fununfunun tɔw kan
mc_answer3: Fiyɛnkolon caman bɛ tɛmɛ lɛri saba kan
mc_answer4: Fiyɛnkolon dɔw be se ka fiyɛn fili fo mayili (miles) 300 lɛri kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Fiyɛnkolɔɔn be jirijuw bɔn, a be sojanw jirifɛrɛnw ta kabɔ u kuna, ani ka mɔbiliw ta k'u fili sanfɛ. Fiyɛnkolɔn fan juguma fila te tɛmɛ nɛgɛ kanɛ saban kan. question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, kumasen jumɛn de bɛ ɲɛfɔlikɛ fiyɛnkolon kan ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la u bɛ mɛ ka tɛmɛ lɛri saba kan
mc_answer2: U bɛ fiyɛn dilan ka se 480 mayili (miles) ma lɛri kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: U bɛ nɔbila yɔrɔ baw la ka tɛmɛ fununfunun tɔw kan
mc_answer4: A se b’u ye ka jiri bɔn ka bɔ dugukolo la

flores_passage: Adamadenw be lunɛtiw dilan ani k'u dɔn cɛɲali kama kabini san bayirikaw kɔnɔ. Nka, tɛlɛsikɔpu fɔlɔ tiɲɛ tiɲɛ dilana Erɔpu sikɛli 16 na labana. Telesikɔpu nininw be lunɛti fila faralenɲɔgɔnkan nati ka fɛnw minunw be yɔrɔjan samagɛrɛ ani k'u bɔɲa.
question: Adamadenw ye ninnu jumɛn de kɛli daminɛ san kɛmɛ sigi 16nan?

flores_passage: Adamadenw be lunɛtiw dilan ani k'u dɔn cɛɲali kama kabini san bayirikaw kɔnɔ. Nka, tɛlɛsikɔpu fɔlɔ tiɲɛ tiɲɛ dilana Erɔpu sikɛli 16 na labana. Telesikɔpu nininw be lunɛti fila faralenɲɔgɔnkan nati ka fɛnw minunw be yɔrɔjan samagɛrɛ ani k'u bɔɲa.
question: Kabi waati joli adamadenw bɛ fɛnw bonya ni lunɛtiw ye?

flores_passage: "Muhammad tun natara kosɔbɛ kow la minnu bɛ kɛ diɲɛso in kɔfɛ. A tun bɛ taa tuma ni tuma kuluwo dɔ la min ko nana ladɔn ni ""Hira"" ye ""Noor"" (yeelen) Kulu la ka a lajɛ. Kuluwo in yɛrɛ, min ye waatijan kɛ, ye taamasiɲɛɲumanba di Muhammad ka kelennadeliw ma. Kuluwo in bɛ a kelenna, min bɛ kuluw cɛman kelen sanfɛ Makan kaɲɛka la. Tiɲɛna, a yɔrɔ dɔn man di abada hali ni anw bɛ a dɔn ko a tun bɛ ye. Ni i donna a kɔnɔ kaban o ye i toni ye i kelen na. Fɛn wɛrɛ tɛ se ka ye ni a bɔra sankolo cɛɲumanni-jɛman i sanfɛ ni kuluw caman minnu bɛ ka i lamini. Diɲɛ fan foyi ye man di walema mɛ man di ka i to a kɔnɔ."
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, Muhamadu ka kuluwo bɛ mun fɔ kelennadeliw an’u nafaw kan?
mc_answer1: A bɛ nafa di hɛrɛ ni kelenna toli ma
mc_answer2: Kɛnɛma mankanw bɛ dɛmɛli kɛ miiri la
mc_answer3: A tun mako bɛ waati fitinin dɔrɔn walasa ka to a kelen na
mc_answer4: A tun bɛ hami mɔgɔw k’a yeli la wali a mankan mɛnni na

flores_passage: Tirɛnsiraw kun jɔla Angiletɛri siyɛkili tani wɔɔrɔnan daminɛna. Ali na sɔrɔ tirɛsira kun dilan neno ni jiri faraw ye, u kun b'ato sow minunw b'a sama ka witesi telima sɔrɔ ani ka dɔni girimanbaw sama ka tɛmɛ sira fitini gɛlɛmaw kan o waatila. Siratugulan nana jɔna walaka ka siraw bil'u nɔna ka to. Dɔnidɔni, nka, a yɛra kafɔ ko siraw kun be seka ɲɛ ka tɛmɛ o bɛ kan nin nɛgɛ bari b'u sanfɛla la. O kɛra waleya carilen ye, nka nege be cɛni cama kɛ wagɔn jiri senw na. Waati jateminɛla, jiri senw falen na nin nɛgɛ senw ye. San ba 1767, tirɛnboli siraw dafalen nana.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nɛgɛ tun bɛ kɛ mun de ye fɔlɔ?

Siratugulan nana jɔna walaka ka siraw bil'u nɔna ka to. Dɔnidɔni, nka, a yɛra kafɔ ko siraw kun be seka ɲɛ ka tɛmɛ o bɛ kan nin nɛgɛ bari b'u sanfɛla la. O kɛra waleya carilen ye, nka nege be cɛni cama kɛ wagɔn jiri senw na. Waati jateminɛla, jiri senw falen na nin nɛgɛ senw ye. San ba 1767, tirɛnboli siraw dafalen nana.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, munna jiri senw falenna ka kɛ nɛgɛ senw ye?
mc_answer1: U ye dɔfara sow ka teliya kan
mc_answer3: U tun bɛ se ka donni girinmanw ta
mc_answer4: U tun bɛ ka sin siraw nɛgɛw fɛ

flores_passage: Hakilidansira laada ba dɔ tunbe Romantizimu na k'a bɔ sɛbɛnnikɛlaw la inafɔ Goethe, Fichte ani Schelgel la. Romantizimu hokumu kɔnɔ, sigiyɔrɔ ye mɔgɔw labɛn ani ni waati tɛmɛni ye, mɔgɔw ka laada ni kokɔrɔ bɔra kɛnɛkan, wa k'u bɛn ni sigiyɔro mɔgɔw ye ka fisa k'a tɛmɛ ni sariya jajoyalen mɔgɔw kan kɛnɛkan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de ye mɔgɔw labɛn Romantizimu waati la?

flores_passage: Mũthingi wa rĩĩciria rĩa mĩtambo ya kĩ-rĩu ũthondeketo nĩ meciria maingĩ makonainie na mĩkĩre ya maũndũ, kuma gũtindĩkĩrĩria nginya gũtua matua marũmu atĩ mĩtambo ya kĩ-rĩu nĩ ĩkonainie na ũgĩ na mawatho ma sayansi makonainie na mĩtambo ĩyo ya kĩ-rĩu. ũthathaũri wa ũthii wa na mbere wa mĩtambo ya kĩ-rĩu ugaga maũndũ merĩ: atĩ ũthii wa na mbere wa mĩtambo ya kĩ rĩu ni ũringanaga na maũndũ ma mĩikarire na ũteti, na atĩ mĩtambo ya kĩ rĩu nĩũhutanagia mũno na maũndũ ma itũra gũkĩra ma mĩikarire. Kwa mũhiano, mũndũ no oige ngari itũmaga gwako barabara. Barabara cia bũrũri itirĩ umithio mũnene angĩkoro irateithia mĩtoka mĩnini, kwa ũguo no nginya mĩtaratara ya gũthondeka na kũnyihia thogora ya cio ĩthondeko. Andũ magĩa ngari nyingĩ nĩmatũmaga mĩtino mĩingi ya barabara yonekane, na mĩtambo ya kĩ-riu nĩ ĩbatarĩkanaga nginya mathibitarĩ-inĩ gũthondeka mĩĩri ĩrĩa mĩtihangie.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn de tɛ jirali kɛ fɛɛrɛsiraw detɛrimizimu hakilinala bakurunba la?
mc_answer1: Fɛɛrɛsiraw nɔ sigidala ani sigi cogoya la
mc_answer2: Kokɔrɔw ma fɛn kɛ Fɛɛrɛsiraw ka yiriwali la
mc_answer3: Fɛɛrɛsiraw bɛ fɛn kɛ sigida mɔgɔw la
mc_answer4: Fɛɛrɛsiraw yiriwali sinsinnen tɛ politiki fanga kan

flores_passage: """Sanfɛ'nɛgɛkuruni ""bɛ i ko V dɔ ani ""dugumanɛgɛkuruni"" i ko sɛbɛnfuranɔrɔlan walema selekenaani min bobara tɛ a la. Sanfɛ kɔrɔ ye i ka kan ka a daminɛ kanmisɛni na ni ka nɛgɛkuruni ɲɔnti, ani duguma kɔrɔ ye i ka kan ka a daminɛ kanba la (o ye i tɛgɛ ye nɛgɛkuruni minɛ yɔrɔ min na) ni ka nɛgɛkuruni ɲɔnti. Kɔrɔlen, sanfɛ nɛgɛkuruni bɛ mankanfɛgɛnman di, dugumanɛgɛkuruni ka girinman ani a bɛ mɔgɔ don. I yɛrɛ hakili latigɛ ka i ɲɛna nɔnw bila, nka i hakili to nɔnmaranikɔrɔw yɛlɛmayɛlɛma bɛ ye fɔli kanma, o la u ka kan ka kɛ u kɛcogo la."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de jɛlen tɛ nɛgɛjurunin sama fɛ?
mc_answer2: Mariki dɔ be i ko sɛbɛnfuranɔrɔlan

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn lajɛnnen do ni mankan fitini ye?
mc_answer3: Nɛgɛkuruni min bɛ i ko V
mc_answer4: K’a daminɛ i tɛgɛ bɛ nɛgɛkurunin minɛ yɔrɔmin na

flores_passage: Ka dan bɔ dantanfɛnw tɔw la minunw be ko adamaden,  homodiw t'u tigɛ nati tuguni ka tama walima dɔni ɲun walima ka panpan yiriw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Siyenpanzew tigɛ ani sen ka surun boɲan ani jaɲa na, jiralikɛlila tigɛ natilila dɔni ɲunila ka tama tigɛ gunkunkan. Adamaden tigɛ ka surun ka tɛmɛ sen kan, nin tigɛgɔnidenw tileni ye. Sukɔrɔ tigɛkolo, san miliyɔn filia ka se saba ma kɔrɔya, be nin yɛlɛma tigɛ baaraw la jira kabɔ tamala ka ta yɛlɛma yɛlɛmalima.
question: Sukɔrɔw b’a jira an ko tɛgɛ laban k’a bɛrɛbɛn ni ninnu jumɛn de labaarali ye fɔlɔ?

flores_passage: Ka dan bɔ dantanfɛnw tɔw la minunw be ko adamaden,  homodiw t'u tigɛ nati tuguni ka tama walima dɔni ɲun walima ka panpan yiriw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. question: Ninnu jumɛn de bɛ woronin tɛgɛngɔni kolow ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: U tilennen do ka tɛmɛ adamaden ta kan
mc_answer2: U bolow n’u senw tɛ kelen ye bonya la
mc_answer3: U bɛ doni ɲun de kɛ
mc_answer4: U ka baara dɔlɔ ye yɛlɛmayɛlɛmali kɛ

flores_passage: Siyekili muganan ɲɛɲinli ya' jira ko suguya fila dɔrɔn de beyi: dogolen ani kɛnɛkanta. Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla. Den gɛrɛfɛ ani faraɲɔgɔnka tuguni be yɛlɛmali ɲagamu kulu filaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ nin zenerasiyon kelen kelen bɛɛ ye.
question: Sugandili jɔlan kura yɛlɛmali bɔ suguya jumɛnna?

flores_passage: Siyekili muganan ɲɛɲinli ya' jira ko suguya fila dɔrɔn de beyi: dogolen ani kɛnɛkanta. Yɛlɛmali be farikolo dilan na yɛlɛmali kura farakan, ani sugandili b'a bɔ kɛnɛkantaw yɛlɛmali kulu cɛla. Den gɛrɛfɛ ani faraɲɔgɔnka tuguni be yɛlɛmali ɲagamu kulu filaw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ nin zenerasiyon kelen kelen bɛɛ ye.
question: Baara taa cogo jumɛn de bɛ dɔfara jɔlan yɛlɛmali kan?

flores_passage: "Kunko fitini kɔnɔ, a ka gɛlɛ gɔn dɔ ma, min kɔnɔna bɛ komi adamaden ta, ka ka dugumuniko min jagoyalen ɲɛnɛbɔ nin jiri minunw beyi la. Farakan fɔlila, a ɲɛnɛbɔ baliyala be seka kɔlɔlɔ juguma nati: kɔrɔbayali gɛlɛya, dumuni nafan ma dɔn ni baliya bana, ani laban laban na saya. Jiriw minunw sɔrɔkadi kosɛbɛ be kɛ puroteyiniw jiri furaburuw la ani nakɔkɔnɔ fɛnw la, nka o yɛlɛmali ka gɛlɛ dantanfɛnw ma inafɔ anw fo n'anw y'a tobi. cogoya wɛrɛla, bagan dumuniw (dugumɛniw, bubagaw, cɛfanw) yɛlɛma madi dɔrɔn, nka u be seka poretiyiniw ɲafan ma baw di amino-asidi fitini nafan be sɔrɔ mina. Fɛnw bɛ jateminɛlen kɔ, anw makan ka kaba nin anw bɛnbakɛw kun ye ""poretiyeni ko kunbalan"" ɲɛnɛbɔ cogodola cogokelemina siyɛnpanze ba kɛ cogomina kunko fitini kɔnɔ bibi in na."
question: Ka da kunnafoni dilen kan tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ, gɔn kan ka ninnu jumɛn de dun walasa k’a ka “poroteniyi ko gɛlɛya” ɲɛnabɔ?

flores_passage: "Kunko fitini kɔnɔ, a ka gɛlɛ gɔn dɔ ma, min kɔnɔna bɛ komi adamaden ta, ka ka dugumuniko min jagoyalen ɲɛnɛbɔ nin jiri minunw beyi la. Jiriw minunw sɔrɔkadi kosɛbɛ be kɛ puroteyiniw jiri furaburuw la ani nakɔkɔnɔ fɛnw la, nka o yɛlɛmali ka gɛlɛ dantanfɛnw ma inafɔ anw fo n'anw y'a tobi. cogoya wɛrɛla, bagan dumuniw (dugumɛniw, bubagaw, cɛfanw) yɛlɛma madi dɔrɔn, nka u be seka poretiyiniw ɲafan ma baw di amino-asidi fitini nafan be sɔrɔ mina. Fɛnw bɛ jateminɛlen kɔ, anw makan ka kaba nin anw bɛnbakɛw kun ye ""poretiyeni ko kunbalan"" ɲɛnɛbɔ cogodola cogokelemina siyɛnpanze ba kɛ cogomina kunko fitini kɔnɔ bibi in na."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kunbalan jumɛn de sabu ma bɔ amino-asidi nafamanw dɛsɛli la?

flores_passage: Dugumasɛnɛ be mɔgɔw faraɲɔgɔnkan minnu hakilina ye kelen ye minnu bolo u ma jate sigida kɛwalew la min b'a to u be se k'u yɛrɛ lakodɔn hakilina dɔ sɔrɔ. Dugumasɛnɛ be se ka danfara ni a mɔgɔw sisan, siya, sigiyɔrɔ ani/walima cɛya ni musoya ye. Fɛn minunw be tabolo tuguma taw jira, ko fɛrɛfɛrɛnsiya kabɔ bɔɲɔngɔn be seka kɛ kan, cɛŋan, dinɛ, politiki, cɛ ni musoya, kɛyɔrɔ ye walima u fara len ɲɔgɔn kanw ye. Tabolo duguma ta tugu baw b'o ka tuguli jira tumadɔw la nin cogoya kɛrɛnkɛrɛni natili ye, min be seka kɛ fini dɔn cogoya, kuma cogo ani kɛcogoya ani kuma cogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛn len ye.
question: Dugumasɛnɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw mɔgɔw b’u ka fara ɲɔngɔnkan ya ni kulu wɛrɛ ye cogodi?
mc_answer1: N’a si filɛli ye k’u ɲagamin u la
mc_answer2: N’u kɛrɛfɛmɔgɔ bɛɛ ka danayaw tali ye
mc_answer3: Ni jɛnniye ni sigida kɛwalew ye
mc_answer4: Ni finidon cogo kɛli ye tamasiyɛn sugudɔ ye

flores_passage: Denmisɛniw be bɔ siyako ani siyako kɔlɔlɔw kalama denmisɛniya kɔnɔ ani o siyako kɔlɔlɔ be ziye o ka tagabolo kan. Misalila, denmisɛniw minunw b'o yɛrɛ jati siyakulu fitini dɔ fɔ min kofɔlen ka baara kɛ ekɔlila tɛ baara kɛ ekolila tumamina nin u bɔra nin kuma in kalaman min tugulen u ka siyala.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni hakilina jiralen in ye tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ, mun de bɛ se ka denmisɛn na min b'a yɛrɛ jati siyakulu fitini dɔ fɛ min kofɔlen do k’u bɛ don bagabagali walew la?
mc_answer1: O denmisɛn in b’a si filɛ k’a yɛrɛ tanga bagabagali walew donni ma
mc_answer2: A ka c’a la o denmisɛn in bɛ se ka don bagabagali walew la
mc_answer3: O denmisɛn in b’a yɛrɛ bɔsi jama dalajɛw la
mc_answer4: O denmisɛn in bɛ n’a ban ka don ko la ni siyakulu fitini tɔw ye

flores_passage: Denmisɛniw be bɔ siyako ani siyako kɔlɔlɔw kalama denmisɛniya kɔnɔ ani o siyako kɔlɔlɔ be ziye o ka tagabolo kan. Misalila, denmisɛniw minunw b'o yɛrɛ jati siyakulu fitini dɔ fɔ min kofɔlen ka baara kɛ ekɔlila tɛ baara kɛ ekolila tumamina nin u bɔra nin kuma in kalaman min tugulen u ka siyala.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, denmisɛn ka bɔli kow kalama minnu kofɔlen siya kan, a bɛ se ka yɛlɛma don ninnu jumɛn de la?
mc_answer1: Siyakulu fitinin min n’a b’a yɛrɛ jati o fɛ
mc_answer3: U ka jɛɲɔngɔnya ni denmisɛn wɛrɛw ye

flores_passage: "Fɛɛrɛw dɔra kodonlen min natila walasa ka adamadenya tabolo nafan jira ye ka misali ta kaw jugu damadamani kan denmisɛniw, nin dengɛrɛfɛ, bɔnɛ walima dabɔkama nin matɔrɔli ye, ma kolo adamadenya sirafɛ mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw fɛ tumamina u tun be ka kɔrɔbaya. U denmisɛni sugu ninunw be wele ""bagan"" walima kungokɔnɔ fɛnw. O denmisɛni bagan namaw dɔw kun datugula so u ka mɔgɔ fɛ (waaticamala u yɛrɛ bangebaw fɛ); o ka dɔw ra nin denmisɛni fili sababu kun ye bangebaw bani ye denimɛni nalon man walima lujuratɔra la. Denmisɛni bagan namanw be seka kojugumaba damatɛmɛn walima hakiliwili ko minunw be kɛ denmisɛninw na ye yani ban k'ula walima yan'u ka boli. A fɔra ko dɔw kun lamɔra baganw fɛ; a yɛra ko dɔw kun balola kunkokɔnɔ u kelen. Nin u lamɔra dɔrɔn kunkokɔnɔ bagan ye, denmisɛni bagan be tabolow jira (farikolo dan na) be inafɔ ladonikɛ bagan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen, inafo a ka siran adamadenw ɲɛ walima adamaden jatelibaliya."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, a ka c’a la ninnu jumɛn de basigilen tɛ denmisɛn bagannamanw lamɔnina?
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔw ɲɛ n’u hakilina ɲɛ siranɲɛ

flores_passage: "Fɛɛrɛw dɔra kodonlen min natila walasa ka adamadenya tabolo nafan jira ye ka misali ta kaw jugu damadamani kan denmisɛniw, nin dengɛrɛfɛ, bɔnɛ walima dabɔkama nin matɔrɔli ye, ma kolo adamadenya sirafɛ mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw fɛ tumamina u tun be ka kɔrɔbaya. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de bɛ baganya jogow kofɔ ka ɲɛ denmisɛnna?
mc_answer1: Baganya jogow caman sababu bɔra lujura dɔ la
mc_answer2: Baganya jogo bɛ se ka bɔ fo dɛngɛrɛfɛ la
mc_answer3: Baganya jogo ka ca denmisɛnw na minnu tun bɛ datugu so bangebagaw fɛ
mc_answer4: Baganya jogo bɛɛ bɔra nalomaya juguman de la

flores_passage: Baloɲini sɛnɛ ye taasira ɲɔgɔnman dɔ ye min be kɛlɛ Baloɲini sɛnɛ ye taasira nɔgɔnman ye, tuma dɔ gɛrɛgɛrɛ, min be se sigidayɔrɔ si maralenw ma k'a fara sɛnɛfɛn yɛlɛma ni baarafɛɛrɛ nɔgɔnmanw ma walasa ka sɔrɔta bonya kɔsɛbɛ. Tariku la, sɛnɛkɛlaw fanba tunbe baloɲini sɛnɛ de kɛ wa hali sisan o kelen do ɲɛtaa jamana caman na.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, nin wale jumɛn de basigilen tɛ ni baloɲini sɛnɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka sinsin sɔrɔ kan min bɛ sɛnɛkɛla ka denbaya makow ɲɛ
mc_answer2: Ka dumuni dilan k’a feere tɔw ma
mc_answer3: Ka sinsin sɔrɔ caman kan n’o ye fɛɛrɛ ɲɛtaalenw fɔnkɔɲɔgɔn ye
mc_answer4: Sumansiw sɔrɔli minnu ye sɛnɛkɛla ka yɔrɔ ta ye

flores_passage: Baloɲini sɛnɛ ye taasira ɲɔgɔnman dɔ ye min be kɛlɛ Baloɲini sɛnɛ ye taasira nɔgɔnman ye, tuma dɔ gɛrɛgɛrɛ, min be se sigidayɔrɔ si maralenw ma k'a fara sɛnɛfɛn yɛlɛma ni baarafɛɛrɛ nɔgɔnmanw ma walasa ka sɔrɔta bonya kɔsɛbɛ. Tariku la, sɛnɛkɛlaw fanba tunbe baloɲini sɛnɛ de kɛ wa hali sisan o kelen do ɲɛtaa jamana caman na.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de bɛ baloɲini sɛnɛ walew ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: O ye cogo ye min bɛ danfɛnw dɔrɔn de kan
mc_answer2: U bɛ fɛɛrɛw kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw labaara ka sɔrɔ bonya f’a dan
mc_answer3: A b’a to sɛnɛkɛkɛlaw bɛ se k’u ka sumansi yɛrɛkɛ o ka mara la
mc_answer4: Ali sisan u bɛ ka labaara sɛnɛkɛlaw fɛ jamana dɔw la

flores_passage: Lala turisimu cogoya carili kodɔnlen ye mɔgɔw be min tugu tamala: tulɔnkɛ yɔrɔlajɛli. O ye waatimine nin mɔgɔw tara yɔrɔ dɔ la min no ka dɔngɔndɔ diɲɛlatigɛ tɛ kelen ye walasa ka lafiya ani k'o yɛrɛ ɲɛnɛjɛ. Kɔkɔjidaw, tulɔnkɛyɔrɔ parikiw, ani sigiyɔrɔw de ye yɔrɔ kodɔnlenw ye yɛrɛɲɛba turisiw be ta yɔrɔmina kosɛbɛ. Nin mɔgɔ dɔ ka yɔrɔlajɛli kun ye ka ta yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛne dɔla walasa ko tariku dɔ ani tabolo, o la o o yɔrɔlajɛ cogo dɔnlen no inafɔ yɔrɔtabolodɔn yɔrɔlajɛ. Turisiw be seka jamana kɛrɛnkɛrɛn dɔ yɔrɔ nafanw cama lajɛ walima u be seka sugandi ka sinsin yɔrɔ kelen dɔrɔn kuna.s
question: Ka ta bɔ fɛnkɔrɔmaraso la, o bɛ jate turisimu suguya jumɛn fɛ?

flores_passage: Lala turisimu cogoya carili kodɔnlen ye mɔgɔw be min tugu tamala: tulɔnkɛ yɔrɔlajɛli. O ye waatimine nin mɔgɔw tara yɔrɔ dɔ la min no ka dɔngɔndɔ diɲɛlatigɛ tɛ kelen ye walasa ka lafiya ani k'o yɛrɛ ɲɛnɛjɛ. Kɔkɔjidaw, tulɔnkɛyɔrɔ parikiw, ani sigiyɔrɔw de ye yɔrɔ kodɔnlenw ye yɛrɛɲɛba turisiw be ta yɔrɔmina kosɛbɛ. Nin mɔgɔ dɔ ka yɔrɔlajɛli kun ye ka ta yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛne dɔla walasa ko tariku dɔ ani tabolo, o la o o yɔrɔlajɛ cogo dɔnlen no inafɔ yɔrɔtabolodɔn yɔrɔlajɛ. Turisiw be seka jamana kɛrɛnkɛrɛn dɔ yɔrɔ nafanw cama lajɛ walima u be seka sugandi ka sinsin yɔrɔ kelen dɔrɔn kuna.s
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de bɛ se ka kɛ yɛrɛɲɛba dugutaalaw bolo kosɛbɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka u yɛrɛ don tabolow kɔnɔ kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: Ka u lafiya ka bɔ u ka don o don kow ma

flores_passage: Mɔgɔw minunw sen kun dɔneno ala san tani camaw tɛmɛni kɔ y'an dɛmɛ k'anw ka fagan ani kanu kanu nin gɛlɛlyaw  ani dɛsɛliw sɛgɛsɛgɛli ɲuman ye. Nin mɔgɔw yɛrɛ tɔgɔla tarikuw, du ani baarakɛyɔrɔ tarikuw lamɛli ye, anw be kunafoni ɲafan ma sɔrɔ kunu kan ani mɔgɔ kodɔnlen dɔ kan minunw baarakɛyɔrɔ tabolo ɛnfiliyanse sira ɲuman walima sira jugu fɛ. Waatimina mɔgɔ dɔ ka tariku famuyali t'a ka tabolo famuyali jira, a be kɔni mɔgɔ dɛmɛ ka dɔn yɔrɔmina u be sɔrɔ baarakɛyɔrɔ tarikila. Nin taɲɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye ani jantolila bɛnw na, mɔgɔw ani minunw bɛ sendɔn leno alo be bɔ kosɛbɛ baarakɛyɔrɔ tabiya, kuntilennaw ani fagan kalama. O yɔrɔ in na, mirilila kunu antirepirɛniya tabolo ani u folola taɲɛ minunw na be mɔgɔw dɛmɛ ka dayɛlɛ yɛlɛmaliye ani tabolo kuraw o yɔrɔ ɛgilizi la. O taɲɛ tariku in be yɛlɛmali jɔrɔ dɔgɔya, nin tabolo ɲuman natili ye ka ɲɛsin sinin yɛlɛmali ma.
question: Mun de fɔra tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ inafɔ fɛn dɔ min bɛ se dɛmɛli kɛ ka dɔ bɔ yɛlɛma ɲɛsiranɲɛ la yɔrɔ egilizi kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka hakilijiginkɛ antirepirɛniya tabolo misali ɲumanw na
mc_answer2: Ka dɔnni sɔrɔ mɔgɔw kan mɔgɔ minnu ye nɔ bila jɛkulu ka tabolo la

flores_passage: Mɔgɔw minunw sen kun dɔneno ala san tani camaw tɛmɛni kɔ y'an dɛmɛ k'anw ka fagan ani kanu kanu nin gɛlɛlyaw  ani dɛsɛliw sɛgɛsɛgɛli ɲuman ye. O taɲɛ tariku in be yɛlɛmali jɔrɔ dɔgɔya, nin tabolo ɲuman natili ye ka ɲɛsin sinin yɛlɛmali ma.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka tariku faamuya be se k’i dɛmɛ mun na?
mc_answer1: Ka dɔ bɔ yɛlɛma ɲɛ siranɲɛ na
mc_answer3: Ka yɔrɔ ko faamu sɔrɔ jɛkulu kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Posimodɛrini mɔgɔw ka fɛrɛ kalan kuna be libɛrite di kabɔ dɔni yɛlɛmabaliw ma. Tiɲɛla, fɛn kelen dɔrɔn teyi ka kalan. Kalan be kɛ kalanden ani dɔni jira ɲɔgɔncɛlala. Anw ka yeta nin fɛɛ bɛk'i yɛrɛ ani dɔni jiralen ye, kalan kɛli jabaranin porogaramuw fɛ b'o misali jira. Anw camaw b'anw yɛrɛ ye jabarani porogaramu lajɛma min b'a kunafoni cogow walima fɛnw anw tɛna sen dɔn mina walima min dɔni bilasenkan. Anw tɛna seka mɔbili gɛn ka minɛ fiyɛnw fiyɛnw, ka fɔntɛni dilan anw ka sokɛnɛna, ka ta Peru ka yɔrɔkɔrɔw tɔw kalan, walima anw sigiɲɔgɔn ka so dilan ye tuguni.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn de bɛ posimodɛrini mɔgɔw ka kalanfɛrɛ ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Kalan kɛcogo dɔw nafa ka bon ni dɔw tɔw ye
mc_answer2: Kalan kan ka sinsin fɛnw kan an dalen b’a la k’an bɛna minnu kɛ
mc_answer3: Kalan kɛ cogo dɔw ka fisa nin dɔw ye
mc_answer4: Fɛnw tɛ kalan na minnu ye kelen ye fan bɛɛ walima minnu tɛ yɛlɛma

flores_passage: Posimodɛrini mɔgɔw ka fɛrɛ kalan kuna be libɛrite di kabɔ dɔni yɛlɛmabaliw ma. Tiɲɛla, fɛn kelen dɔrɔn teyi ka kalan. Kalan be kɛ kalanden ani dɔni jira ɲɔgɔncɛlala. Anw camaw b'anw yɛrɛ ye jabarani porogaramu lajɛma min b'a kunafoni cogow walima fɛnw anw tɛna sen dɔn mina walima min dɔni bilasenkan. Anw tɛna seka mɔbili gɛn ka minɛ fiyɛnw fiyɛnw, ka fɔntɛni dilan anw ka sokɛnɛna, ka ta Peru ka yɔrɔkɔrɔw tɔw kalan, walima anw sigiɲɔgɔn ka so dilan ye tuguni.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn de tɛ posimodɛrini mɔgɔw ka kalan fɛrɛ jira ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: Kunafoni be se ka kalan cogoya caman de la
mc_answer2: Dɔnni cogoyadɔw k’an ka bila dɔw sanfɛ
mc_answer3: Kalan cogoya sɛmɛnen do kalanden ani dɔnni jiralen
mc_answer4: Ali dɔnni min n’a be se ka kɛ an tɛ baara k’a la o kan ka kalan

flores_passage: Sugunɔgɔ tigɛli ye dabɔn kama kunuli sugunɔgɔ nɔrɔmali waatikɔnɔ ani ka sunɔgɔ tuguni waati finiti kɔfɛ (sanga 10 ka 60 la) O be seka nɔgɔyala nin alarimu bilaliyera finiti ki bɔ ko kalama ka sɔrɔ i ma pɛnw pɛnw. Nin i yɛrɛ ye alarimu boli yala i ka sunɔgɔ kɔnɔ, a be seka bila bɔn fan dɔni fɛ, k'i karaba ka bɔ gilan kan ka faga. Cogoya wɛrɛw dɔgɔn dɔn tabolola bɛ seka kɛ ji man fɛnw cama miliye (kɛrɛenkɛrɛniyala ji walima te, sugunɛ cayala dɔnlen dɔ) yan'i ka sunɔgɔn, min be karaba ka wili ka sugunɛ kɛ.
question: Dabɔnkama kunuli sugunɔgɔ nɔrɔmali waatikɔnɔ, ninnu jumɛn de sen be don sugunɔgɔ tigɛli baaraw la?
mc_answer1: Ka kalan kɛ lɛri kelen ani miniti bisaba sani i ka segin ka sunɔgɔ la
mc_answer2: Ka taa ɲɛgɛnna ani ka segin ka taa dilankan o nɔgonni fɛ
mc_answer3: Ka alarimu faga i ka tabalikan ani ka segin ka sunɔgɔ miniti mugan kofɛ
mc_answer4: Ka kunun ka ji min buteli la i ka tabalikan

flores_passage: Sugunɔgɔ tigɛli ye dabɔn kama kunuli sugunɔgɔ nɔrɔmali waatikɔnɔ ani ka sunɔgɔ tuguni waati finiti kɔfɛ (sanga 10 ka 60 la) O be seka nɔgɔyala nin alarimu bilaliyera finiti ki bɔ ko kalama ka sɔrɔ i ma pɛnw pɛnw. Nin i yɛrɛ ye alarimu boli yala i ka sunɔgɔ kɔnɔ, a be seka bila bɔn fan dɔni fɛ, k'i karaba ka bɔ gilan kan ka faga. Cogoya wɛrɛw dɔgɔn dɔn tabolola bɛ seka kɛ ji man fɛnw cama miliye (kɛrɛenkɛrɛniyala ji walima te, sugunɛ cayala dɔnlen dɔ) yan'i ka sunɔgɔn, min be karaba ka wili ka sugunɛ kɛ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de te sunɔgɔ tigɛli ɲɛfɔli ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer1: A be se ka da dɔgɔn dɔn tabolokan
mc_answer2: A kun de y’i kan’i yɛrɛ pewu
mc_answer3: A baara bɛ kɛ i ka sunɔgɔ nɔrɔmali waati la
mc_answer4: Kununin kɔfɛ, a kun ye de ka segin ka sunɔgɔ lɛri fila kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ dɔw dalen n'ala ko suko dilanlen jɔlen cama natili be seka sɛgɛ damatɛmɛ wale nati. Nin fenomɛnini kun jɔnjɔn  ye suko jɔlenw jaabi min be waati janya nɛtugu ka dayɛlɛw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Nin nɛtugu ka dayɛlɛw dama damani ɲɔgɔn cɛ su kɔnɔ, nin cogoya in i be sunɔgɔ kɛ ani i faikolo be yɛrɛ sɔrɔ bɛ dɔgɔya kosɛbɛ f'a be kɛ kunbalan ye. O sɛgɛ ka jugu inafɔ nin kun be ka wili sanga muganw san muganw walima sanga bisabaw sanga bisabaw ani ka jabarani lajɛ. O kɔlɔlɔ sirileno cogomina ani waatidamina i nzɛbɛn ba ɲinin ka suko jɛlen k'i be bɔ min kalaman.
question: Ni hakili b’a sifilɛ ka suko jɔlen kɛ kuma caman, dɔ bɛ mun kan?
mc_answer1: Ɲɛtugu ka dayɛlɛ teliman hakɛ cogo
mc_answer4: Waati janya ɲɛtugu ka dayɛlɛ telimanw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ

flores_passage: Mɔgɔ dɔw dalen n'ala ko suko dilanlen jɔlen cama natili be seka sɛgɛ damatɛmɛ wale nati. O kɔlɔlɔ sirileno cogomina ani waatidamina i nzɛbɛn ba ɲinin ka suko jɛlen k'i be bɔ min kalaman.
question: Suko jɔlen be se ka ni nɔ jugu jumɛn bila farikolola?
mc_answer1: Ɲɛtugu ka dayɛlɛ teliman cogoyaw dɔgɔyali
mc_answer2: Ɲɛtugu ka dayɛlɛ teliman dɔgɔyali sufɛ
mc_answer4: Ɲɛtugu ka dayɛlɛ teliman caya sufɛ

flores_passage: "Ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ kuluw be mara nin ni baaraɲumankɛli sariya kelenw ne ye inafɔ kulu kɛnɛkantaw, nka danfara fitiniw b'u cɛ. Ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ baara denw be baarakɛ waatidɔw la inaf'u kunafɔni di yɔrɔ ka s'u ka kulu den ma. Waaticama b'u bolo ka tɛmɛ baara cogoya kɔrɔ kɛbaw kan komi u ka kuluw be seka ɲɔgɔn ɲe ka sinsin waati bɔndaw camaw kan min tɛ seka famuya lala u yɔrɔ kuntigi fɛ. ""Kulu yɛbali"" ka pirezansi (Larson and Lafasto, 1989, p109) ye fɛnɛ kulu yebali fan cogoya kelen dɔ ye. ""Kulu yebali"" ye marali kulu bɛɛ be konti kɛ minunw fɛ. Kulu yebali kuludenw bɛɛ tabolo latigɛ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kulu kɛnɛkantaw ni ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ kuluw bɔlen do mun ni mun na?
mc_answer1: Sigi kɛlen do n’a ye kulu fila bɛɛ ka baara kɛ hakɛ kelen na
mc_answer2: Kulu fila bɛɛ ka waati hakɛ bɛ yɛlɛma u ka don o don baaraw la
mc_answer3: Kulu fila bɛɛ bɛ ɲɛfɔlikɛ marabaga yebali ye
mc_answer4: Kulu fila bɛɛ bɛ baara kɛ yɔrɔminnu lɛri ye kelen ye

flores_passage: "Ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ kuluw be mara nin ni baaraɲumankɛli sariya kelenw ne ye inafɔ kulu kɛnɛkantaw, nka danfara fitiniw b'u cɛ. Kulu yebali kuludenw bɛɛ tabolo latigɛ."
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, kumasen jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye ka ɲɛsin ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ ni kulu kɛnɛkantaw ma?
mc_answer1: A ka c’a la kɛnɛkan kuluw mara nin ni baraɲumankɛ kosɛbɛ
mc_answer2: Ɛntɛrinɛti sanfɛ kuluw bɛ baara kɛ tumadɔw la inafɔ kɛnɛkan kuluw ka ɲɔgɔnsɔrɔyɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Kɛnɛkan kuluw waati ka dɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ ɛntɛrinɛti sanfɛ kuluw ta kan
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔminnu tɛ lɛri kelen na, ɛntɛrinɛti sanfɛ kuluw be se k’olu nafa

flores_passage: Nin hakilinaw b'a jira ko mɔgɔ makɔ walima nege dɔw be mɔgɔ ra min dumina u kɔnɔ waatimina u be kɛ baliku ye. Nin hakilinaw b'a jira ki makɔ walima nege dɔw be mɔgɔ ra min dumina u kɔnɔ waatimina u be kɛ baliku ye. Nin hakilinaw b'a lajɛ min b'a to mɔgɔ dɔw be kɛ fɛnw fɛ u be min kɛ ani fɛn cumɛn b'u ka siyiyɔrɔ min bena to u ba kɛ walima tɛ fɛn dɔw kɛ. Farifoni hakilina ba dɔlen fila ye Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs Theory ani Hertzberg's Two Factor Theory.
question: Ninnu jumɛn tɛ fɛn ye min b’a kɔnɔkow hakilinaw sinsinnen bɛ min kan?
mc_answer1: Nege kura minnu bɛ na balikuya kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Cogomin mɔgɔ sigiyɔrɔ nɔ b’a ka walew la

flores_passage: Tila sabana sariya, min labaralen do kojugun wa burujalen do tuma do, ye sariya guwansan de ye min ni d0 ka fƐn bƐƐ bila u nɔ la jaa kan. A b'a ɲɛfɔ ko kumasenkun bilayɔrɔŋuman fanba ye sirawdaankun ye min jaw tilan ka kɛ sabasabajɔ tilenniw ni banamininiw ye (misali la)
question: Ninnu jumɛn tɛ tila sabannan sariya fɛn ye?
mc_answer1: Basigiyɔrɔ dɔ dilanni yɔrɔ minna fɛn be se ka bila yɔrɔminna
mc_answer2: Ka ja in ɲɛnɛmaya ani k’a barika
mc_answer3: Ka fɛn to yɔrɔ jɔnjɔn ɲuman dɔ la

flores_passage: A be dilan hali bi-bi in na, ɲa janko, a ka lahalaya kunnafoni taara cɛn na jatalan nimerikiw jaa kaptelanw yangan fɛ. A be dilan hali bi-bi in na, ɲa janko, a ka lahalaya kunnafoni taara cƐn na jatalan nimerikiw jaa kaptelanw yangan  fƐ Yangan 35 mm ni 36 mm yangan 24 mm janɲa kan be taa  tiɲƐ la, o be se ka fili mɔgɔ u ma. Ni yangan in suguya kunnafoni ( a tilali sigiyɔrɔ ma tan ni fila yasa ka kunnafoni bƐƐ la gansanw jaateden)  a folen do ko min ye 3:2. sisan yangan caman ( misali la, APS yanganw) ni lahala kunnafoni bƐƐ ka kan walima be surunɲa kɔsɔbƐ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de tɛ 35mm ja yangan ɲɛfɔ?
mc_answer1: A bɛ ka dilan hali sisan
mc_answer2: A tara jatalan nimeriki yanganw fɛ
mc_answer3: A bonya yɛlɛmali cogoya ka ca ni yanga tɔw caman ta ye baara bɛ kɛ minnu na
mc_answer4: Yangan min ka ca diɲɛ kɔnɔ n’a bɛɛ ye o de do

flores_passage: Zooms kɔlɔ ye fokali gƐlƐya ni kuntilenna fƐn minw hakƐka kan yasa fokaliw cƐjanɲa gamu sɔrɔ kaɲi kɔsɔbƐ ka tƐmƐ kuntilenna folow kan. Dɔ be bɔ gƐlƐya in na ni lentiye dilanbaw ye  lantiye dilan hakƐ dɔw sɔrɔ minw ka ca kɔsɔbƐ Nin de ye a to zoom be se ka jaa dɔw bɔ min suguya be kaɲa ni suguya ye min sɔrɔla ni fokali janɲa kuntilenɲa ye. Zoom kuntilenɲa kɔlɔ wɛrɛ ye ko kuntilenɲa dayɛlɛnnen ba ( Teliya) ka fɛgɛn kɔsɔbɛ tuma cama. O be a to zumew da dumanw be labarali be gƐlƐya yeelen fƐgƐman  lahalayaw la min ni felasi tƐ ala.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, komi dilannikɛlaw bɛ ka kuntilenna ɲumanw dilanni caya, samali kuntilennaw fisayara cogodi?
mc_answer2: U labaara kadi yelen dɔgɔman yɔrɔw la
mc_answer3: Ja ɲɛ ni kuntilenna minnu sinsin yɔrɔ janya ni dansigilen b’a la de ye kelen ye
mc_answer4: U sinsinyɔrɔ gɛlɛya ka dɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ kuntilenna fɔlɔw ta kan

flores_passage: Zooms kɔlɔ ye fokali gƐlƐya ni kuntilenna fƐn minw hakƐka kan yasa fokaliw cƐjanɲa gamu sɔrɔ kaɲi kɔsɔbƐ ka tƐmƐ kuntilenna folow kan. Dɔ be bɔ gƐlƐya in na ni lentiye dilanbaw ye  lantiye dilan hakƐ dɔw sɔrɔ minw ka ca kɔsɔbƐ Nin de ye a to zoom be se ka jaa dɔw bɔ min suguya be kaɲa ni suguya ye min sɔrɔla ni fokali janɲa kuntilenɲa ye. Zoom kuntilenɲa kɔlɔ wɛrɛ ye ko kuntilenɲa dayɛlɛnnen ba ( Teliya) ka fɛgɛn kɔsɔbɛ tuma cama. O be a to zumew da dumanw be labarali be gƐlƐya yeelen fƐgƐman  lahalayaw la min ni felasi tƐ ala.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsiran in kɔnɔ kunafoni kan, tuma jumɛn zoom lentiyew bɛ se ka fusaya ka tɛmɛ kuntilen fɔlɔw kan?
mc_answer1: Ni kuntilenɲa dayɛlɛnni dan ye laɲini dɔ ye
mc_answer2: N’i mago tɛ kuntilenɲa fɛnw canman na
mc_answer3: N’i tɛ fɛ ka yelen mɛnɛ dibimayɔrɔw la
mc_answer4: N’i bɛ ka fokali gɛlɛya wɛrɛ ɲini

flores_passage: Misitisisimi ye nɔnnabɔ ye ka ɲɛsin  diinɛkulu ma, farafasiyali ma, walema tiɲɛnlaban,-alakosuma,-diinɛtiɲɛn,-walema alakowajuliŋuma ma. Danaba bɛ dɔnnitilennni, hakilina, walema  dinɛkosɛgɛsɛgɛli/alakosɛgɛsɛgɛli walema jowsɛgɛsɛgɛli ɲɛɲini. Mantow bɛ taabolo walema kɛwale dɔw ta minnu kun ye ka o dɔnniw lakunu. Misitisisimi bɛ danfara ka bɔ diinɛ tɔ wɛrɛw ka danaya ni baato la ni a ka sinsinni ye mɔgɔ ka hakilinatigɛ dɔrɔn ye, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnyala minnu bɛ bɛn, jateminɛba, nusɔndiya, walema sewa kunkan.
question: Nin fɛn jumɛn kelen tɛ se ka jate Misitisisimi bugunatigɛ hakika fɛ?
mc_answer1: Sinsin kɛlen bɛ mɔgɔ ka bɛn ani nisɔndiya hakililatigɛ kan
mc_answer3: A bɛ se kɛ Misitisisimi kalandenw bɛ waleya dɔw kɛ minnuw b’a to u hakili bɛ Alako tiɲɛ famu
mc_answer4: Ka sinsin i yɛrɛ kelen pe ka faamuya-ɲininin kan o bɛ se ka sanka diinɛ ani batoko canman wɛrɛw ma

flores_passage: Misitisisimi ye nɔnnabɔ ye ka ɲɛsin  diinɛkulu ma, farafasiyali ma, walema tiɲɛnlaban,-alakosuma,-diinɛtiɲɛn,-walema alakowajuliŋuma ma. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nin fɛn jumɛnw dɔlakelen tɛ Misitisisimi kuntilenna dɔ ye?
mc_answer2: Diinɛkosɛgɛsɛgɛli ɲuman ɲinili sigida mɔgɔw ka dɔɔnintilennen na
mc_answer3: Sinsinni hakilikunu kan min bɛ nunsɔndiya nati

flores_passage: Waatijan na siyɛkili kɔnɔntɔnan ani muganan kɔrɔ, da kun kɛleno ala ko Nouvelle Zelande sigibaw fɔlɔ kun ye Maori ye, minunw kun be kɔnɔ belebeleba faga nin o wele ko moas. O hakilina in ye tuguni hakilina do bilasen kan ko Maoriw bɔra Polynesie batɔn ba la ani ka Nouvelle Zelande minɛ kabɔ Moriori, ka sɛnɛla dugu dɔ sigi. Nka, pirewu kura y'a jira ko Morioriw kun ye Maori gɛlɛkan mɔgɔw ye minunw bɔra Nouvelle Zelande ka ta Chatham gun sanfɛ, nin u yɛrɛ ka sɛnɛcogo lafiyalen dilani ye. Kulu wɛrɛw kun be Chatham gun sanfɛ. O kun ye Maori ye minunw tagara yɔrɔjan kun mabɔ Nouvelle Zelande la. U kun b'u yɛrɛ wele Morioriw, balanɲɔgɔna dɔni kun beyi ani a laban na, Morioriw silatununa ka bɔyi.
question: Ka kɛnɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jɔn tun bɛ se ka sɛnɛla sigida sigi?
mc_answer2: Moriori ka bɔ Chatham gun sanfɛ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kulu minnu tun bɛ maos faga olu tun ye yɔrɔ jumɛn sigiba fɔlɔw ye?

flores_passage: Purelans origami ye origami dɔ ye minna kuriko kelen dɔrɔn de be se ka kɛ waati kelen kɔnɔ, kuruli gɛlɛnmanw ma daga inafɔ kuruli wolokilen, wa yɔrɔ ɲɔgɔnmanw de be kuruliw bɛɛ la. A tun labɛnna John Smith fɛ san 1970w kɔnɔna na walasa ka kurulikɛla kuraw dɛmɛ walima minnu lujuralen do.
question: Lahaliya jumɛn na purelans ka oragi fɛɛrɛ bɛ kurulikɛla nafa?
mc_answer1: Kurukɛla in b’a kanu ka kuruli camanw kɛ ɲɔgɔnfɛ
mc_answer2: Kurulikɛla in bɛ se kuruli la kosɛbɛ
mc_answer3: Kurulikɛla bɛka origami dɔ ladan min mako bɛ kuruw la kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Kurulikɛlan y’a senfilɛ siɲɛ kɛlen walima siɲɛ fila

flores_passage: Purelans origami ye origami dɔ ye minna kuriko kelen dɔrɔn de be se ka kɛ waati kelen kɔnɔ, kuruli gɛlɛnmanw ma daga inafɔ kuruli wolokilen, wa yɔrɔ ɲɔgɔnmanw de be kuruliw bɛɛ la. A tun labɛnna John Smith fɛ san 1970w kɔnɔna na walasa ka kurulikɛla kuraw dɛmɛ walima minnu lujuralen do.
question: Nin fɛnw dɔlakelen jumɛn tɛ Purelans origami bugunatigɛ jaati?
mc_answer1: A dabɔlen bɛ kurulikɛla kɔrɔw de kama
mc_answer2: Kɔfɛ kuruw tɛ fɛrɛ in kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Yɔrɔ tilenɛw kakan ka kɛ kuruw la
mc_answer4: Fɛrɛ ɲuman do min bɛ kurulikɛlaw dɛmɛ minnu te se kuruli la kɔsɛbɛ

flores_passage: Indus ka kurukanfolon tabiya tun ye Nsiranɛgɛ Tile tabiya ye Ɛndi kaɲɛka-tibinyanfan bangudeni la min ye bi  Pakistan ni Ɛndi kaɲɛka-tilebinmaraw dɔ ye ani Afiganisitan kaɲɛka-kɔrɔnyanfan lamini. Tabiya in yiriwala Indus  Badaw la min y'a tɔgɔ di a ma. Hali n'a y'a sɔrɔ kodɔnna dɔw be k'a ŋunuŋunu ko k'a d'a kan ko tabiya  in fana tunbe sisan  Sarasvati badingɛw la, n'o jara bi, a tɔgɔ tun kakan ka kɛ Indus-Sarasvati tabiya ye k'a sɔrɔ dɔw b'a fɔ a ma Harappan tabiya,  Harappa bolo aka yɔrɔw fɔlɔfɔlɔw min wɔgɔbɛra 1920 sanw na.
question: Kakɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, yɔrɔ jumɛn sɛn tɛ Indus ka Badingɛ Tabiya la?

question: Nin fɛnw dɔlakelen jumɛn tɔgɔ ma fɔ tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ min be se ka kɛ kurukanfolon Tabiya tɔgɔ ye?

flores_passage: Wasabaliya ani ɲɛngoya bena kɛ nin anw waatibɛla ani o ye sigiɲɔgɔnkan cogoya ye ko nin mɔgɔ cama be nafan sɔrɔ ala, nafan camaw bena sɔrɔ waatifitini kɔnɔ nin baarakɛliye nin ɲɛngoya ye. Jigisila, mɔgɔw cama bena ye ko ka nafan kuntakalajan ye ka baara kɛ nin tɔw ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nafakuntalajan bɛ sɔrɔ nin fɛn jumɛn kelen na?
mc_answer1: Ka baara kɛ ni ɔ ye
mc_answer3: Ka sisin kɛ fɛn min bɛ madamadɔ nafa ka tɛmɛ jamafanba kan
mc_answer4: Ka sɔn a ma ko nafa bese ka sɔrɔ wasabaliya la

flores_passage: Wasabaliya ani ɲɛngoya bena kɛ nin anw waatibɛla ani o ye sigiɲɔgɔnkan cogoya ye ko nin mɔgɔ cama be nafan sɔrɔ ala, nafan camaw bena sɔrɔ waatifitini kɔnɔ nin baarakɛliye nin ɲɛngoya ye. Jigisila, mɔgɔw cama bena ye ko ka nafan kuntakalajan ye ka baara kɛ nin tɔw ye.

flores_passage: Ameriki ka benkannikɛlɛ musaka ka Filipini minɛ bɔra Filipinikadenw yɛrɛ fɛ. U jagoyara ka ninsɔngɔ sara Ameriki jagoyafangamarabaaw ye, ka musakaw fanba sara ni nafaw juru dulonni tora Filipini marabulon na Wall Street warimarasow fɛ. Lɛgɛsɛ ye min ye, tɔnɔnba ninnu sɔrɔ la waatijan ninmatɔrɔ in na min dara Filipinikaw kan kɛra Ameriki benkannikɛlɛ tɔnɔnw ju ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn ye kɛlɛ musakaw fanba sara?

flores_passage: Walasa ka diinɛkɛlɛcɛw famu i kakan k'a faamu hokumu min ye kulu in sigili lateliya. Tile minna ko nunuw kɛra be wele forobala ko Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati, Erɔpu tariku waati sankɛmɛsigi 11na, 12na ni 13na (san 1000-1300 Yesu bangeli kɔfɛ). Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati tugura Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati Daminɛ la wa Cɛmancɛ Waati laban tugura ola, min, ni bɛnkan na, banan san 1500 yɔrɔw la.
question: Waati jumɛn kɔna diinɛkɛlɛcɛw ka tile ɲɛ?

flores_passage: Walasa ka diinɛkɛlɛcɛw famu i kakan k'a faamu hokumu min ye kulu in sigili lateliya. Tile minna ko nunuw kɛra be wele forobala ko Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati, Erɔpu tariku waati sankɛmɛsigi 11na, 12na ni 13na (san 1000-1300 Yesu bangeli kɔfɛ). Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati tugura Sanfɛ Cɛmancɛ Waati Daminɛ la wa Cɛmancɛ Waati laban tugura ola, min, ni bɛnkan na, banan san 1500 yɔrɔw la.
question: Waati jumɛn fɔra diinɛkɛlɛcɛw ka tile kɔ?

flores_passage: Roman Fangamara kɛlɛhakilina sira y'u dɛmɛ ka furakɛli ɲɛtaaw sɔrɔ. Furakɛlikɛlalaw y'a daminɛ ka ta baara la Fangamasa Augustus fɛ wa u ye Roman Furakɛlikɛli Baarakɛbolo fɔlɔ sigi senkan min tun kakan ka baarakɛ kɛlɛ kɔfɛ. Farali furakɛlikɛlalaw ye dimidalafura caman dɔn inafɔ mɔrifini k'a bɔ sayiyirini kisɛw la ani isicopolamini k'a bɔ fogofogoyiri kisɛw la. U jola tigɛli sira fɛ walasa ka banabaatɔw kisi kɛlɛbɛ ma ani sirili ni jolisiraw digili ye walasa ka joli munumunu kunbɛ. Sankɛmɛsigi caman na Roman Fangamara kɛra sabu ye ka ɲɛtaa ba caman sɔrɔ furakɛli sira fɛ ani ka dɔnni fanba labɛn an be min dɔn bi.
question: Furakɛli suguya walima furakɛli sira jumɛn tɔgɔ m’a fɔ ni furakɛlikɛlaw ani farali furakɛlifaw tun bɛ baara kɛ n’a ye Roman Fanga waati?
mc_answer1: Jawilibana, min be mɔgɔ minɛ ka sabu kɛ jatigɛ wale kɔrɔ dɔ ye, ko furakɛ ni dimidafura suguyaw camanw ye
mc_answer2: Ka fogofogoyiri kisɛw kɛ ka isicopolamini dilan
mc_answer3: Ko joli munumunni kunbɛn ni jolisiraw digili ye

flores_passage: Roman Fangamara kɛlɛhakilina sira y'u dɛmɛ ka furakɛli ɲɛtaaw sɔrɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsira in ye, nin fɛnw jumɛn kelen ma kɛ furakɛli ɲɛtaw nɔ ye Roman fangamara waati?
mc_answer4: Furakɛlikɛlaw tali baara la fangamasa fɛ

flores_passage: Lajɛlin, walima lajɛli se sirileno yeli fasajuruw fanw la walima ɲɛdenw. Ɲɛ dilani cogoya cama beyi, aranzelila n'o ka baarakɛtaw fanw ka laɲinin ye. Dilani camaw be se camaw di, ka fɛgɛ nin funufunu janya ye ani be lajɛli ɲuma cogoyacamala, ali u mako baaraw cama la walasa kunfoni dɔn taw famuya ani jateden camaw ka baara kɛ a cogola.
question: Yeli se sirilendon fɛn jumɛn la?

flores_passage: Lajɛlin, walima lajɛli se sirileno yeli fasajuruw fanw la walima ɲɛdenw. Ɲɛ dilani cogoya cama beyi, aranzelila n'o ka baarakɛtaw fanw ka laɲinin ye. Dilani camaw be se camaw di, ka fɛgɛ nin funufunu janya ye ani be lajɛli ɲuma cogoyacamala, ali u mako baaraw cama la walasa kunfoni dɔn taw famuya ani jateden camaw ka baara kɛ a cogola.
question: ɲɛ dilani cogoya caya fan nin ɲɔgɔncɛ o sirilen do fɛn juman la?

flores_passage: "Sikhism ye diinɛ ye ka bɔ Ɛndi danguni na. A bɔra Punjab mara la kɛmɛsi 15na waati ka bɔ kabila bolofara dɔ ka diinɛ bolofara dɔ la Hindu laada kɔnɔ. Sikhs bɛ u ka diinɛ danfara ka bɔ Hinduyisimi na ka diinɛ dannan hali ni a sɔrɔ u bɛ a dɔn ko a ju ni a laadaw bɔra Hinduyisimi na. Sikhs bɛ a fɔ u ka diinɛ ma ko Gurmat, min ye Punjabi ye ""guru taabolo kan"". Guru ye Ɛndi diinɛw bɛɛ sinsinbeereba ye guru ye nka Sikhism na a ye nafan dɔ sɔrɔ min bɛ kɛ Sikhs ka danayabakuruba ye. Diinɛ in bangera kɛmɛsi 15nan na Guru Nanak fɛ (1469-1539). Guru 9 wɛrɛw ye ɲɔgɔn falen."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsiran ye, nin Sikhism kun kan kuma jumɛn tɛ diinɛ in bugunatikɛ faasi?
mc_answer1: Sikhism bɔra Ɛndu lada kɔnɔ kabilabolofara dɔ ka bolofara la
mc_answer2: Guru ye Sikhism sinsinbereba min tɛ sɔrɔ diinɛ fosi wɛrɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Gunuw kɔnɔntɔn ye ɲɔgɔn falen diinɛ in sigibaga, Guru Nanak, kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Sihkism laadaw dɔw jubɔra Henduyisimi na

flores_passage: "Sikhism ye diinɛ ye ka bɔ Ɛndi danguni na. A bɔra Punjab mara la kɛmɛsi 15na waati ka bɔ kabila bolofara dɔ ka diinɛ bolofara dɔ la Hindu laada kɔnɔ. Sikhs bɛ u ka diinɛ danfara ka bɔ Hinduyisimi na ka diinɛ dannan hali ni a sɔrɔ u bɛ a dɔn ko a ju ni a laadaw bɔra Hinduyisimi na. Sikhs bɛ a fɔ u ka diinɛ ma ko Gurmat, min ye Punjabi ye ""guru taabolo kan"". Guru ye Ɛndi diinɛw bɛɛ sinsinbeereba ye guru ye nka Sikhism na a ye nafan dɔ sɔrɔ min bɛ kɛ Sikhs ka danayabakuruba ye. Diinɛ in bangera kɛmɛsi 15nan na Guru Nanak fɛ (1469-1539). Guru 9 wɛrɛw ye ɲɔgɔn falen."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsira in ye, nin fɛnw kele jumɛn be se ka jate nafɔ Sikh diinɛ sinsinbereba dɔ?
mc_answer3: Ka ban ka Ɛndu diinɛ wɛrɛw dɔn

flores_passage: """Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana"" ye nzɛbɛn bana ye min be ɲɛfɔ kɔrɔlen nin bana saba ye, nin o ye balikakokɛ ye, tulonkɛ ani boliboli damatɛmɛ walima ""kisɛya damatɛmɛlen"". O tɛ kalan lujura ye, o ye kalanli ɲakamu ye; a be se ""mɔgɔ 3 ka ta 5 la denmisɛniw la, lala mɔgɔɔ cama inafɔ Amerikɛn denmisɛni miliyɔn 2"". Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana be denmisɛni minunw na be gɛlɛya sɔrɔ walasa ko ɲɛsin fɛnw ma inafɔ lɛkɔli baara, nka u be seka ɲsɛin fɛnw ma minw ka d'o ye inafɔ zuye kɛli walima i jaɲɛ wakulɔni filɛli walima kumasen sɛbɛni nin tomi sɛbɛn baliya ye. U denmisɛniw b'u yɛrɛ do kunbalan cama na bari u be dɔn ""farati kow la, kɛlɛw la, fagan sɔsɔ baaraw la"" walasa ka hakili nisondiya ba bari u hakili tɛ nisondiya nin fɛɛrɛ nɔrɔmaliw ye. Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana be dangari mɔgɔyala nin u tɔɲɔgɔn ye bari denmisɛni tɔw tɛ sek'a famuya kun mina u be kewale kɛ u be minunw kɛ walima muna u be kalanikɛ u b'a kɛ cogomina walima u ka mɔgɔbayara cogo nin tɔ ta tɛ kelen ye."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana bɛ denmisɛnni minnu na, a bɛ se ka gɛlɛya u ma k’u sinsin mun de kan?
mc_answer4: Fɛn minnu kɛli ka d’u ye

flores_passage: """Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana"" ye nzɛbɛn bana ye min be ɲɛfɔ kɔrɔlen nin bana saba ye, nin o ye balikakokɛ ye, tulonkɛ ani boliboli damatɛmɛ walima ""kisɛya damatɛmɛlen"". O tɛ kalan lujura ye, o ye kalanli ɲakamu ye; a be se ""mɔgɔ 3 ka ta 5 la denmisɛniw la, lala mɔgɔɔ cama inafɔ Amerikɛn denmisɛni miliyɔn 2"". Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana be denmisɛni minunw na be gɛlɛya sɔrɔ walasa ko ɲɛsin fɛnw ma inafɔ lɛkɔli baara, nka u be seka ɲsɛin fɛnw ma minw ka d'o ye inafɔ zuye kɛli walima i jaɲɛ wakulɔni filɛli walima kumasen sɛbɛni nin tomi sɛbɛn baliya ye. U denmisɛniw b'u yɛrɛ do kunbalan cama na bari u be dɔn ""farati kow la, kɛlɛw la, fagan sɔsɔ baaraw la"" walasa ka hakili nisondiya ba bari u hakili tɛ nisondiya nin fɛɛrɛ nɔrɔmaliw ye. Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana be dangari mɔgɔyala nin u tɔɲɔgɔn ye bari denmisɛni tɔw tɛ sek'a famuya kun mina u be kewale kɛ u be minunw kɛ walima muna u be kalanikɛ u b'a kɛ cogomina walima u ka mɔgɔbayara cogo nin tɔ ta tɛ kelen ye."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, munna Jatekɛminɛbaliya Bana bɛ denmisɛnni minnu na u bɛ to ka farati walew kɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka dɔ bɔ u ka boliboli damatɛmɛna
mc_answer2: K’u dɛmɛ ka jɛ n’u tɔw ye
mc_answer3: U masaw ka se k’u jate

flores_passage: Rũrenda rũrĩa rwa gatatũ kũmenyekana mũno nĩ ta MySpace bũrũri-inĩ wa Amerika, na rũtũmagĩro nĩ arũmĩrĩri matanyihĩirie millioni mĩrongo ĩtano na inya. Ngenda ta icio nĩ irarũmbũyanio nacio mũno, na makiria ciikaro inĩ cia mathomo. Kwĩna maũndũ mega metanĩtio na rũrenda, ta guthondeka irathi mĩtamboini kũrĩa mathomo maraheano na njĩra cia mbica, video,  maandĩko na mangĩ ta macio. Page ĩno no ĩkinyĩrĩke na ihenya na njĩra ya kũheana rũrenda o rũmwe, ũndu ũrĩa ũhotithagia kũririkana kwa na ihenya, na gũteithia arutwo arĩa mena thĩna wa gũtũmira keyboard kana gũthondeka maritwa. No ĩthondeko nĩguo ĩhũthie mathomo, na cĩĩkĩro marangi na kũringana na wendi wa ene.

flores_passage: O n'a bɛɛ Zuyekalo la san 1956, Kruschev ka lahiduw gɛlɛyara k'a sabu kɛ Pɔlɔɲi mankanw min senfɛ baarakɛlaw murutila balokodɛsɛ ni sara jiginni na, k'a laban foroba murutili la Kominizimu kama. Hali ni labanna Kruschev ye mugucimɔbili bila ka ta basigilanati, a dɛsɛra sɔrɔsira gɛlɛya dɔw la an'a sɔnna ka jamatigi Wadyslaw Gomulka kɛ Minisiri Ɲɛmɔgɔ kura ye.

flores_passage: Alimaɲi kun bɛɛ jugu ye Diɲɛ Kɛlɛba filan waatila, min USSR ani USA nati ka bolodoɲɔgɔma kɛ. Nin kɛlɛ bani ye, maracogo kɛlɛw, baara tabolo ani tabolo y'a to jamanaw bilaraɲɔgɔna. San fila tɛmɛnikɔ kɛlɛ bani kɔ, jɛnɲɔgɔn kɔrɔw kɛra juguw sinsan ani Dengɛrɛfɛ Kɛlɛ daminɛna. A tun kan ka mɛn ka se san 40 nataw ma ani kun bena kɛlɛkɛ tiɲɛla, yɔrɔjan kɛlɛ nin kɛlɛbolo wɛrɛw ye, kɛlɛkɛnɛw ka ta Afiriki ka ta bila Asie, Afghanistan, Cuba kɔnɔ and yɔrɔ cama wɛɛrɛw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn de ma fɛn kɛ USSR ni USA ka jɛɲɔgɔnya la?

flores_passage: Fasajuru sira b'a cogoya mara nin fasa cikanw cilile ka ta farikolola walasa ka joli bolili t'o cogola ani o ciyɛnli. Nin fasa cikanw be seka ci jɔna jɔna farikolo fɛ min be farikolo lakana kabɔ kɔlɔlɔ dɔ ma.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de tɛ fasa cikanw cili ka ta farikolola kun ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ?
mc_answer4: Ka tangali kɛ ka bɔ bagabaliw ma minnu bɛ se ka kɛ farikolola

flores_passage: "Kabakoyɔrɔ wolonfila cɛman, Gise PiramidiBa dɔrɔn de bɛ ye hali bi. A jɔra Misira jamana denw fɛ kɛmɛsi sabanan na ka kɔn Yesu bangeli ɲɛ, Piramidiba ye piramidibelebelew dɔ ye minnu tun jɔra ka tasibila kɛ ka ɲɛsin Farawuna su ma. Giza Kulu, walema ""Giza Kaburukulu"" Misira jamana Suw ka Lɛ kɔnɔ ye piramidiw caman ( minnu cɛman piramidiba ye a bɛɛra belebele ye), kaburumisɛniw caman, sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ caman, ni Dasiriba ta. Piramidiba jɔra ka Farawuna Khufu tasibila, ani piramidideniw, kaburuw, ni sɔnnikɛyɔrɔw cama tun jɔra ka taasibila kɛ ka ɲɛsin Khufu musow ni dudenw ma."

flores_passage: Artemis sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ Ephesus tun cɛnna zuwekalo tile 21, san 356 ka kɔn Yesu bangeli ɲɛ tasumadonwale ye Herostratus fɛ. Tariku kɔnɔ, a ka cɛsiri tun ye a tɔgɔ bɔ cogo bɛɛ la. Ephesuskaw ye nɛnini kɛ, ni ka fɔ ko Herostratus tɔgɔ kanna lase bele. Girɛsi kokɔrɔwɲɛɲinibaga Strabo y'a tɔgɔ sɛbɛn, i n'a fɔ anw y'a dɔn cogo minna bi.Sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ cɛnna don min su Zulu Kara Nani bangera. Zulu Kara Nani, k'a to masaya la, y'a ɲini ka mɔgɔw sara ka sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ in kurakuraya, ɲa ban kɛra a ka laɲini ma. kɔfɛ, Zulu Kara Nani saalen kɔ, sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ kurakurayara san 323 Yesu Bangelen kɔ.

flores_passage: Tamali fɔlɔ kodɔnlen kun ye tamali ye, adamaden y'a tamali daminɛ ka tilen san miliyɔn fila tɛmɛnikɔ nin Homo Erectus nali (min kɔrɔ mɔgɔ tilen ni). Minunw tɛmɛnuɲɛ, Australopithecus kun tɛ tama ka tilen inafɔ sinsan waatibɛla. Tamali sen fila kan cogoya sinsinlen sɔrɔla Australopithecus kaburuw la kabɔ san miliyɔn 4.2 ka ta bila san miliyɔn 3.9 tɛmɛni, ali na sɔrɔ Sahelanthropus kun tamara lala a sen fila kan inafɔ miliyɔn wɔlɔnwula tɛmɛni damina la.

flores_passage: Batɔnw natili ka ferefɛnw taayɔrɔ dɔra ka ta n'o ye yɔrɔ wɛrɛla ye fo sisan sira bɛka ɲɛmanan ba ye walasa ka mɔgɔ ani ferefɛn camanw latigɛ kɔkɔji sanfɛ. Kɛlɛkɛ bato kulu ka baara ye fɔlɔfɔlɔ ka kobɛkɛ walasa i ka jamana ka seka mɔgɔw ani ferefɛnw cili se sɔrɔ, ani u waatikelen na, ka juguw bali walas'u ka se k'u mɔgɔw ani ferefɛnw cili ɲagamu. O misali nafan ma kelen suruman nin kan kun ye North Atlantic kɛlɛbolibloli ye Diɲɛ Kɛlɛba filanan waatila. Lamerikɛn kun be ka laɲinin ko ka mɔgɔw ani kɛlɛkɛminɛnw mobilize Oseyan Atlantic sanfɛ walasa ka Grande Bretagne dɛmɛ. O waatikelen na, Alimaɲi kɛlɛkɛ bato kulu, ye U-boats nati kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, kun beka laɲinin ka bato boli jɔ. Nin jɛnɲɔgɔnw kun dɛsɛla, lala Alimaɲi kun be seka na Grande Bretagne minɛ inafɔ a kun ye Erɔpu fan tɔw.

mc_answer1: Feerefɛn minnu bɛ ka Biritaɲi k’olu minɛ

mc_answer4: Ka Ameriki bali mɔgɔw ni feerefɛnw sɔrɔli la

flores_passage: Babylonekaw kun ye sofɔlɔ dɔ jɔ u ka jow kelenkelenna bɛ ye min kun jatera ka kɛ ala ka so ye. Waati dɔw la sojan jɔnjɔnw munuw bɛ i ko pyramides, ni u tɔgɔ ye Ziggurats, kun dilanna i n'a fɔ sɔnnikɛyɔrɔ fan dɔ. Towɛri in balen tun ye  ala in bato kɛ yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye.
question: Nin fɛn jumɛn kelen tun dabɔlen do sɔnnikɛlaw kama kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la?

flores_passage: "Awɔ! Masa Tutankhamun, min tun be  wele tuma dɔw la ko ""Masa Tut"" walima ""Masa Cɛni"", ye Izipiti kɔrɔ  Masa dɔnnen ba dɔ ye waati kura nunu na. A kaɲi a ka fɔ k'a tun m'a jate kaɲɛ lawale la w'a tɔgɔ tun te tuma caman masa kɔrɔw fɛ. Nka a kaburu yeli san 1922 y'a kɛ tɔgɔtigi ye. Tuma minna kaburu cama wɔgɔbɛra,  se ma kɛ ni kaburu in ma. Minɛw fanba minnuw su dona Tutankhamun fɛ  tora u cogo la, fɛnɲuman  dilanenw nɛgɛw ni cɛnindenw la be u cɛ la."
question: Waati jumɛn Masa Tutankhamun ye tɔgɔtigiya sɔrɔ?
mc_answer4: A tɔgɔ jateli lawale masa kɔrɔw fɛ

mc_answer1: A kaburu min tun tora a cogo la o kɛli
