flores_passage: An be Gɛrɛki politiki mɔgɔ, dɔnnikɛla ni seko ni dɔnko mɔgɔ  caman dɔn,  Holmer de kakan ka kɛ u bɛɛ la tɔgɔtigi ye, ni fiyɛntɔ poyi bɔla dagabana  in, min ye dagabana sɛbɛnni fila kɛ Gɛrɛki sɛbɛnniw la : Iliad ni Odyssey poyiw. Sophocoles ni Aristophanes ye hali sisan sɛbɛnnikɛla tɔgɔtigiw ye wa uka sɛbɛnniw be jate diyɛn sɛbɛnni baara baw cɛ la. Gɛrɛki Jatekalanba tɔgɔtigi dɔ wɛrɛ Pythagoras, min dɔnna kɔsɛbɛ aka kumayira dɔnnen ba in fɛ min be kɛrɛsaba dakɛnyɛlen fanw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ kan.
question: Gɛrɛki poyi bɔla Homer tun tese ka mun kɛ?

question: Gɛrɛki tɔgɔtigi jumɛn dɔnna fɛn wɛrɛ sababu la min tɛ sɛbɛni baara ye?

flores_passage: Futeni waati in na Azi kɔrɔnseleke camancɛyɔrɔ la, so nafa tun man bɔn. Izirayɛli kaw ka diyɛnlatigɛ fanba bɛɛ tun be kɛ kɛnɛma fiyɛn na. Musow tun be tobili kɛ dukɛnɛ na; feerekɛso tun yɔrɔda bɔlen ye ka ɲɛsin nbeda ma. Kabakurun tun be kɛ ka sow jɔ. Kungobaw tun te Canaan dugukolo kan, wa lɔgɔ tun ka gɛlɛn kosɛbɛ.
question: Izirayɛli denbayaw tun b’u ka waati fanba bɛɛ kɛ yɔrɔ jumɛn?

flores_passage: "Greenland jaman tun ka dɔgɔn. Norse maanaw la u b'a fɔ ko Erik Bilen bolila ka bɔ Isilandi jamana kɔnɔ ka sabu kɛ mɔgɔfaga dɔ ye, wa tuma minna a tun be ka  taama tilebin yɔrɔ jan fɛ, a ye Greenland ye k'a tɔgɔda ko Greenland. Nka aka yeli in kɛrɛfɛ, Eskimo kabilaw tun sigilen be yen o waati in na kaban. Ka kɛ  o jamana kelen kelen tun ye ""Sikandinavi kaw"" ye, danfara caman tun be  Danemariki, Suwɛdi, Nɔriwɛzi ani Isilandi  mɔgɔw, masaw, laadaw ni tarikuw ni ɲɔkɔncɛ."
question: Nin fɛnw jumɛn kelen ɲɛfɔlen tɛ ka kɛ Sikandinavi jamanaw danfara ye?

flores_passage: mɔgɔw delilen u dumuni tilan bɛɛ la waati minna, sika t'a la Romains iyɔrɔ kun bɛ ɲɛnagɛdumuniw la munuw kun man deli mɔgɔw la, ka fara njɛ, paon, kɔtɛw ni bakan misɛni sukuw kan n'u ye gɛlɛninunkuruni ye. danfara dɔ wɛrɛ kun ye ni fantanw ni musow kun bɛ dumuni kɛra u sigilen sikilanw kan, waritigiw kun bɛ dumunidumanw dun ɲɔkɔn fɛ ni la to k'u waso u ka fanna u dumuni kɛ tɔ. Romankɔrɔ ka dumuni kun bɛ talikɛ dumuniw la munuw bɛ taa Europu ka bɔ Ameriki walima Arabula san kɛmɛ caama kɔfɛ. Misaliya la, u kun tɛ kaba, ni tɔmati, ni woso, ni kakawo dun, ani Romainskɔrɔw fɛnɛ kun tɛ kulokulo nɛnɛ.

question: Nin fɛn jumɛnw kelen tɛ Romain kɔrɔw ka ɲɛnagɛdumuni ye?
mc_answer1: Dunan fantaw ka dumuni kɛ u sigilen sigilan sanfɛ
mc_answer2: Kɔtɛ dumuniw minnuw bɛ kɔkɔn lawuli

flores_passage: Hadamadenyataabolo ye seko ni dɔnko fandɔ ye min be jama kulu ba dɔ bolo minnuw be ɲɔgɔn kan w'u be baara kɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ, sigida dɔ. Diɲɛ 'civilisation' be bɔ Latɛn kan 'civilis' la, min kɔrɔ ye mɔgɔ gansan ye, min be tali kɛ Latɛn civis la, min kɔrɔ ye jamanaden, ani civitas, min kɔrɔ ye duguba walima dugu-jamana min fana be sigida bonya kofɔ cogo dɔ la. Dugu-jamanaw ye jamana ɲɛbilaw ye. Sigida seko ni dɔnko be tali kɛ dɔnni latɛmɛli la lamɔkuluw cama fɛ, sigida seko ni dɔnko jɛnsɛnni ɲuman latɛmɛli la. Seko ni dɔnko fitiniw be tunu tuma dɔw la k'a sɔrɔ u ma  nɔ ɲɛnama to tariku la wa u te se ka lakodon inafɔ hadamadenyataabolo yɛrɛyɛrɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsira in ye, nin fɛnw jumɛn kelen te se ka wolo nafa sabatilen na?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni nin tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de bɛ kɔn jamana ɲɛ?

flores_passage: Drukgyal Dzong ye tarakogo ni Budawdelikɛyɔrɔ ye Paro faaba kɔnɔ (Phondey dugu kɔnɔ). A fɔra ko san 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel ye taracogo jɔ ka hakilijigi kɛ ka ɲɛsin a ka se ma Tibɛti-Mɔngɔlikaw ka kɛlɛcɛw kan. San 1951, tasuma dɔ mɛnɛni kɛra sababu ye Drukgyal Dzong jasɛbɛnfura damadama dɔrɔn tora, i n'a fɔ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ja. Tasuma banni kɔ, tarakogo marala ni k'a lakana walasa a ka kɛ Bhutan ninkansaramayaw yɔrɔ dɔ ye.
question: Kuma jumɛn kelen fɔlen be Drukgyal Dzong kan n’o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: A tun jɔra walasa ka hakililajigin kɛ ka kɛ ɲɛsin a ka se ma Tibɛti-Mɔngɔlikaw ka kɛlɛcɛw kan
mc_answer3: Tasuma dɔ ye jasɛbɛnfuraw canma jeni
mc_answer4: A jɔra Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel fɛ

question: Nin kuma jumɛn kelen bɛ tasuma kɔlɔlɔ ɲɛfɔ Drukgyal Dzong yɔrɔ la?
mc_answer1: Jasɛbɛnfura kelen min tora o tun ye Zhabsdrung Ngawang Namgyal ja ye
mc_answer2: Tibɛti-Mɔngɔlikaw ka kɛlɛcɛw tun ye se sɔrɔ
mc_answer3: A ma fosi bɔ filifɛn in diyaɲɛ la
mc_answer4: A tun maralendo Zhabsdrung Ngawang Namgyel fɛ

flores_passage: Kɛmɛsi 18na la Kanbɔji y'a yɛrɛ mɔsɔni sɔrɔ sigiɲɔgɔn setigijamana fila ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ, Tayilandi ni Viyetinamu. Tayilandikaw ye Kanbɔji minɛ siɲɛ caman kɛmɛsi 18na la ani san 1772 u ye Phnom Phen. Kɛmɛsi 18na labanw na Viyetinamukaw fɛnɛ ye Kanbɔji minɛ.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛn kelen fɔlen do Kanbɔji kan n’o ye tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Viyetinamukaw ka ye Phnom Phen filenkolonci ka dakolonci
mc_answer3: Kanbɔji tun minɛna Viyetinamukaw fɛ san kɛmɛsigi 18na na
mc_answer4: Tayilandikaw ye Phnom Phen filenkolonci ka dakakolonci

mc_answer1: Viyetinamukaw ye Kanbɔji minɛ siɲɛ canma
mc_answer2: Tayilandikaw ani Viyetinamukaw ye Kanbɔji minɛ san 1772
mc_answer3: Viyetinamukaw ka ye Phnom Phen filenkolonci ka dakolonci
mc_answer4: Tayilandikaw ye Kanbɔji minɛ siɲɛ canman

flores_passage: Tayiwani  daminɛ y'u ka seginni daminɛ yɔrɔ la, minna Farajɛkurunbolilaw tun bɛ tɛmɛ kulu ni kulu n'o gun tɔgɔ ye IIha Formosa, walema gun cɛɲi. 1624 san, Peyiba cakɛda East India Company ye jujɔn dɔ sigi Tayiwani worodugutilebinyanfan na, ka bayɛlɛmani dɔ judon ka ɲɛsin sumakisɛlakika-labaaraliw ma ani ka Sini baarakɛraw ta k'a malo ni sukarofoorow labaara. 1683 san, Qing fangabolokɛlɛcɛw (1644-1912) ye Tayiwani badagolo tilebin ni kaɲɛka yɔrɔw minɛ ni ka Tayiwani kɛ Qing fangamara ka marabolo dɔ ye san 1885. 1895 san, a dɛsɛni kɔ ka sebagaya sɔrɔ Sinuwa-Zapɔnɛkɛlɛfɔlɔ la (1894-1895), Qing marabylon ye bolonɔnbila kɛ Shimonoseki bɛnkan na, min kɔnɔ a jɛnna Tayiwani tigiya kɔ k'a si Zapɔn ma, min ye gun mara fo san 1945.
question: Peyiba cakɛda East India Company ma nin fɛnw jumɛn kelen kɛ k’u to Tayiwan kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka jujɔn dɔ sigi gun worodugutilebin-yanfa na
mc_answer3: Ka Sini baarakɛlaw ta forow kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Ka jɛn ka Tayiwani mara di Qing fangabolokɛlɛcɛw ma

question: Shimoneski Bɛnka ye mun sigi senka?
mc_answer1: Zapɔn dɛsɛni ka sebaya sɔrɔ Sinuwa-Zapɔnɛkɛlɛfɔlɔ la
mc_answer2: Tayiwani lahalaya min b’a kɛ Qing fangabolokɛlɛcɛw ka mara kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Tayiwani seli k’a ka mara kuraya a ka badabolow kan

flores_passage: A bɛ fɔ ni ma dannifɛnw bayɛlɛman. i bɛ se ka jiralikɛla dilan ni supɔmibileman ji ye. Supɔmibileman ji bɛ a ɲɛ yɛlɛma ni asidi walema basiki  (alkaline) ŋakami len be cogo minna. PH kundaman jirara ni Hydrogene hakɛ ye (H PH la)    ɲɛɲini i na. Hydrogene ions ye protons ye munu ka electrons samanra ka bɔ ( ka kugu proton kelen ni electron kelen de bɛ Hydrogene kisɛw la.
question: Danifɛnw bayɛlɛman kundama be suman cogo di?
mc_answer1: Asidi walima basiki ŋakaminlen be bayɛlɛma la cogo min
mc_answer3: Hydrogene ions kundama nin be bayɛlɛma kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Electrons kundama joli be bayɛlɛma kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Waraw ye jakumaw de ye minw ka jɛɲɔgɔnya ka nɔgɔn ni fɛn bɛ yɛ, minw bɛ balo jɛkulubaw la a bɛ fɔ minw ma kɔ kuluba. kuluba bɛ talikɛ cɛmankɔrɔlen kelen ka taa saba la, musow denw munu bɛ taa bisaba la. Musomanw kɛ kadi ka fara ɲɔkɔn kan, bawo u ye balimanmuso ni denmuso'duba ye. waranikulubaw bɛ kow kɛ i n'a fɔ bakɔlɔwulukulu walima wulukulu, bankan munuw dabaliban bɔlen do warabaw fɛ ( nka jakumakunba tɔw kɔ tɛ) kɛcɔgɔ la, ani u b'u balo faka.

mc_answer4: U bi fakali kɛ ani hadamadenya

Hindi kan ni Urudu kan daɲɛw ye kelen ye nka u sɛbɛncogo te kelen ye don o don kumaw la, kan in fila fɔbaw be se ka ɲɔgɔn faamu.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mɔgɔ minnu fakan ye Hindi ye olu bɛ falen ka da fɛn jumɛn de kan?
mc_answer1: Kan bolofara minnu ka surun Hindi la kosɛbɛ n’olu bɛ ka jate
mc_answer2: Ni Urdu fɔlaw bɛ ka jate
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ kan famu n’olu bɛ ka jate
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ se ka kan kalan, n’olu be ka jate

mc_answer3: U ye kelen ye daɲɛw ni sɛbɛnni na

flores_passage: Hangeul dɔrɔn de ye siginiden labɛnnen ye  don o  don foroba waleyali kama. Siginiden in labɛnna san 1444 Masa Sejong ka masaya waati (1418-1450). Masa Sejong tun ye  Joseon masasi masakɛ naaninan ye, ani ani a jatelen do kosɛbɛ. A y'a tɔgɔ fɔlɔ da ko Hangeul siginiden Hunmin Jeongeum, min kɔrɔ ye ''Mankan bɛnnen mɔgɔ kalan ma''.
question: Ninnu jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye Hangeul siginidenw kan?
mc_answer1: A dilanna Masakɛ Sejong ka mara daminɛ waati la
mc_answer2: Siginiden in tɔgɔ yɛrɛyɛrɛ tun ye Hunan Jeongeum ye
mc_answer3: A dilanna Joseon Masasi masakɛ naaninan fɛ

flores_passage: Hakilinasira caman be ka jira  Sanskrit bɔra cogo minna. U dɔ la kelen ye ko Aryan dɔ ka taali senfɛ k'a bɔ Ɛndi jamana tilebin fɛ a taara ni kan in y'a bolo. Sanskrit ye kan kɔrɔba dɔ ye ani a be sanga Latɛn kan fɔta ma Erɔpu. Diyɛn gafe fɔlɔfɔlɔ dɔnnen sɛbɛnna Sanskrit kan de la. Upanishad kaw ka faraɲɔgɔnkan in kɔfɛ, Sanskrit binna ka a sabu kɛ fanganasira ye. Sanskrit kan ka misɛn ani kan   nafama do, min kɛra Ɛndi kaw ka kan kura caman ju ye, inafɔ Latɛn kɛra Erɔpu kanw ju ye inafɔ Faransi kan ani Ɛsipaɲi kan.

flores_passage: Lo bɛ munumunu cogo jumɛn nɛ kɛrɛfɛ? ni yi jɔ lo kan, i fanka giriya tɛ dugukolo sanfɛla ta bɔ. mɔgɔ fanka ye kilogiramu (90) ye dugukolo kan, a bɛ kɛ kilogiramu (16) ye lo lan. o kɔrɔ ye a munutɔ bɛ i fanka dɔkɔya
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kumasen jumɛn ye tiɲɛ ka ɲɛsin lo munumunu cogo ma?
mc_answer1: Dugukolo ka munumununi bɛ samani dɔgɔya i kan ka tɛmɛ lo ka munumununi
mc_answer2: lo ka munumununi be samani kɛ kosɛbɛ, o de b’a to dɔ bɛ bɔ i girinya la
mc_answer3: lo ka munumununi be samani kɛ kosɛbɛ, o de b’a to dɔ bɛ fara i girinya kan
mc_answer4: Dugukolo ka munumununi b’i sama kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ lo munumununi kan

flores_passage: kalu sanfɛra dilan neno ni farakuruw ani cɛncɛn ye. Kalo kɔfɛra be wele ko kɔfarajalen. Kɔfara jalen bɔɲan be kilomɛtiri 70 bɔ nin gɛrɛra la ani kilomɛtiri 100 bɔɲa nin ka jan la. A ka dɔgɔ nin be tasumajisisikulu gɛrɛfɛ ani ka bɔn nin be sanfɛra legelegew la. Tasumajisisikuluw camaw be sɔrɔ fan gɛrɛlen na bari kɔfara jalen ka min sen. A kun ka nɔgɔ tasumajima ka yɛrɛ fo sanfɛla la.

mc_answer3: A be se ka kɛ tasumajisisikulu ka dɔgɔn kɛrɛ jan fɛ
mc_answer4: A be se ka kɛ tasumajisisikulu ka dɔgɔn legelegew duguma

flores_passage: "Mɔgɔ camaw be suko dɔn mina adamadenw be seka ta lolo wɛrɛla ani ka diɲɛ wɛrɛw ɲɛɲini, mɔgɔw dɔw b'u yɛrɛ ɲininka ko mun b'o yɔrɔla; dɔw daleno ala ko aliyɛniw walima ɲɛnɛmaya wɛrɛ be balola lala dugukolo wɛrɛ kan. Nka, nin o ye can ye fiyɛn fiyɛnw, lala tɛna kɛ fo waatijan na. Lolow carileno ka caya ko kilomɛtiri  tiriliyɔn camaw de be lolo nin ɲɔgɔncɛ minunw ye ""sigiɲɔgɔn maw"" ye. Lala dɔn dɔla, i mɔden bena sen jɔ tiɲɛ dogolen dɔra k'u yɛrɛ ɲininka u kulosamaw tɛmɛniw kuna?"
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira in kan, mɔgɔdɔw dalen bɛ jumɛn na?
mc_answer1: Adamadenw tara tamana na dolo wɛrɛw la
mc_answer2: Adamadenw te se ka diɲɛ wɛrɛw ɲɛɲini
mc_answer4: Dolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ janya ka dɔgɔn ni kilomɛtiri tiriliyɔn ye

flores_passage: "farajalan tɛ tile la a bɛ jɔ min kan. tile kuturu dilanna ni sisiw, tasuma ani plasma ye. Gazi bɛ dɔkɔya ka taa a fɛ n'i bɛ ka i ma janɲa tile camancɛ la. Anw bɛ tile kɔkanna fan min ye n'an bɛ tile lajƐ tɔgɔ ye fotɔsefƐre, min kɔrɔ ye ""yeelen kuru""."

flores_passage: a bɛ san baasaba bɔ kɔ, san 1610, dugukolokoɲɛɲinikɛla ka bɔ Italie Galileo Galilei ye jateminɛ kɛ telescope la ka ye ko kɛrɛw bɛ Venus la, i n'a fɔ kalo. kɛrɛw bɛ kɛ yi k'a d'a kan Venus fanmi durɔn (walima kalo ta) sinna Tile ma jɛlen do. Venus kɛrɛw jateminɛna  Copernicus hakilina fɛ min ko dugukolow bɛ Tile munumunu. Ola, san daman-daman o kɔ 1639 san, Angilɛ dugukolokoɲɛɲinikɛla min tɔgɔ ye Jeremiah Horrocks ye Venus yɛlɛma-yɛlɛma jateminɛ.

mc_answer3: Tile ni Venus ye kelen ye minnu na
mc_answer4: Tile ni Kalo ye kelen ye minnu na

flores_passage: Amazoni ba ye diɲɛ ba jamujan fila ni ani ba beleba ye. A be ji ta siyɛn 8 min ka ca nin ba belebele filana ji ye. Amazoni de  fɛnɛ kabon ni dugulo kɔw bɛ ye, a bɔɲan be  kilomɛtiri kɔnɔntɔ bɔ  waati dɔw la. Ji purusan 20 ba min be bɔn kabɔ diɲɛ baw la ka ta kɔkɔjiwla be bɔ Azononi na. Amazoni ba yɛrɛyɛrɛ ye kilomɛtiri 6387 (3980 miles). A be sɔrɔ kabɔ ba bayirikaw fitiniw la.

flores_passage: Kɛmɛsarada Venezuwelaka 18 tɛ baara la, minnu bɛ baara la u tilankɛ bɛ wari ɲini sira nɔgɔni kan. Venezuwelaka mɔgɔ sabasabasaraw minnu bɛ baara la, fila b'a kɛ forobacakɛda la, naani masuruɲa bɛ baara kɛ bayɛlɛmacakɛda la ani duuru masuruɲa bɛ baara kɛ  sɛnɛda la. Venezuwelakaw fɛ bayɛlɛmacakɛda nafama dɔ ye taji ye, minna jamana ye kɔkanfeerekɛraba ye, hali n'a sɔrɔ kɛmɛsarada kelen dɔrɔn de bɛ baara kɛ tajibayɛlɛmacakɛda la.

flores_passage: Dolow be yeelen ni funteni di  k'a sabu kɛ fanga bɔ ta ye ni idorozƐne kisɛw bɔra  (walema ka ɲagami) ɲɔkɔn fɛ ka kɛ dengirimanw ye. Ɲininikɛlaw bɛ baara la walasa ka yelendimansin dɔ dilan min be yelen di o cogo la. A mana kɛ cogo o cogo, ni ye baara gɛlɛmanba de ye ka baara, ani a bɛ na san caama ta sani anw ka yeelendimansindorokolen ŋuman dilanni ye.

flores_passage: Fɛnw ani Kuluw be seka bolika bɔ cogoya kelen na ka ta cogoya wɛrɛla ani tɛ yɛlɛma. Nitorozɛni inafɔ gazi b'a cogoya kelenw de ta inafɔ nitorozɛni jiman. Jima cogoya ka girin nka u molekiliw bɛ ye kelen alisa. Ji y'o ɲɔgɔna misali wɛrɛ ye. Ji kulu dilan neno nin idorozɛni ani ɔkisiziyɛni atomi ne ye. A b'a molekili cogola kelen ne ta ali na sɔrɔ a kɛra fiyɛn, ji walima jalen ye. Alina sɔrɔ a farikolo cogoya be seka falen, a dilan cogoya simila be t'a nɔna.
question: Ji dilannen do ni simi fɛn jumɛnw ye?
mc_answer1: Idorozɛni kisɛ kelen ani ɔkisizɛni kisɛ fila
mc_answer2: Idorozɛni kisɛ kelen ani ɔkisiziyɛni kisɛ kelen
mc_answer3: Idorozɛni kisɛ fila ani ɔkisiziyɛni kisɛ fila
mc_answer4: Idorozɛni kisɛ fila ani ɔkisiziyɛni kisɛ kelen

flores_passage: Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Kɛlɛ waati la, jamanabolo tannisaba nunuw ye cɛmacɛ marabolo fɛgɛman dɔ sigi senkan—Bɛɛjɛ Sariyasenw hokumu kɔnɔn—Kurufanyɔya Sariyaseng kɔrɔ. Fanga foyi tun te Wasabulon bolo ka nisɔngɔ sigi senkan, wa k'a sabu kɛ ɲɛmɔgɔ fanga walima Kiiri fanga tanɲa ye, a tun be a sinsin jamanabolo ɲɛmɔgɔw kan,  minnuw tun te son tuma dɔw la k'aka sariya labaara. Fanga fana tun te ala walasa ka nisɔngo kow ni songɔw labaara jamanabolow ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. Sariyasen nunuw tun kakan ka yamaruya sɔrɔ jamanabolow bɛɛ fɛ yani uka yɛlɛma wa jamanabolow tun ma cɛmancɛ marabolo in jate kaɲɛ fo ka kɛ uka wasadenw tun te ye yen tuma dɔw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn tun tɛ gɛlɛya ye jamanabolo tannisaba kan kuma min a tun b’a fɛ ka sariya dɔw jagoya sigi?
mc_answer1: Kɔlɔsili gɛlɛn ka bɔ fanga ɲɛmɔgɔw yɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Yɛlɛmali minnu bɛ jamanabolow bɛɛ ka yamaruya jagoya

flores_passage: Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Kɛlɛ waati la, jamanabolo tannisaba nunuw ye cɛmacɛ marabolo fɛgɛman dɔ sigi senkan—Bɛɛjɛ Sariyasenw hokumu kɔnɔn—Kurufanyɔya Sariyaseng kɔrɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kumasen jumɛn de bɛ cɛmacɛ marabolo ka jamanabolow jira ka ɲɛ yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Kɛlɛ waati la?
mc_answer1: Ninsɔngɔnw tun jagoyara Wasabulon ni fanga ɲɛmɔgɔw fɛ
mc_answer2: Sariyasenw Falenni jigi tun bɛ Wasabulon ɲɛmɔgɔw de kan
mc_answer4: Cɛmacɛ marabolo tun ye fɛn koloman fila ye

flores_passage: N'aw ye National Treasure filimu in lajɛ, aw be se ka miiri ko waribon ja dɔ sɛbɛnnen do Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Ɲɛfɔli Gafe in kɔkan. Nka o te tiɲɛn ye. Hali ni o y'a sɔrɔ fɛn dɔ sebinnen be gafe in kɔkan, o te waribon dɔ ja ye. Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya  Gafe in kɔkanna Sebɛnniw tun ye ''Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya Ɲɛfɔli Gafe Yɛrɛyɛrɛ  min dansigira Zuyekalo tile 4 nan san 1776''. Masalabolo in be ye gafe in dugumala la, a  ɲɛjugu kan. flores_passage: "Kĩbindi kĩa PBS kĩna ngerenwa cia Emmy itanyihĩire mirongo ĩrĩ na inya, na nĩ gĩkuhĩ kurĩ Saseme Street na Mister Roger's Neighborhood. O kihingo gia kĩbindi kĩu nĩkĩahinyagĩrĩria ũndũ ũmwe ibukuinĩ rĩmwe na gĩkatabania ũhoro ũcio na ng'ano nyingĩ. Hamwe na John Grant, amwe metĩkĩtie atĩ ũnyihu wa mĩcara na ũgarũrũku wa mwĩcirĩrie wa gĩthomo kĩa tafaarĩra nĩgĩcangĩire gũthira kwa kĩbindi kĩu."

Zapɔn jamana Sɔrɔ, Jakɔ ani Dilanni Minisiriso (METI) y'a fɔ k'a lasɔmina kasaraw 27 la minnu dulolendo ni mansinmafɛnw la. Dɔgɔkun tɛmɛnnen na METI ko Apple y'a kunnafoni kalayali kojugu kasara 34 wɛrɛ la, cakɛda in ko minni ma ko''u man jugu'' Minisiriso in ye jaabili kɛ ka Apple ka sɛbɛn in bɔlibaliya wele ko '' tiyɛnna nimisa do''
question: Jɔnni tun y’a fɔ ko kalaya kojugu kasaraw tun ma juguya kosɔbɛ?
mc_answer3: Zapɔn jamana tasuma ko ɲɛnɛbɔ yɔrɔ

flores_passage: Ni jɔnjɔn tannisegin dɔrɔn ye tile kɔnɔ, jamanaw hakɛdɔw ma se ka jɔnjɔn kɛnɛ in  sɔrɔ . U tun ye Holandi Anna ye Jochemsen min kɛra jɔyɔrɔ kɔnɔtɔnnan ye  muso ka ɲɔgɔndan Super-G  in na kunu, wa ani Fɛlandi Katja Saarinen min kɛra mɔgɔ kɔnɔtɔnnan ye ni ɲɔgɔndan kelen in na. Ɔstarali kaw ka Mitchell Gourley kɛra jɔyɔrɔ tannikelennan ye ni cɛw ka  Super-G ɲɔgɔndan na. Czech sankaɲɔgɔn Oldri h Jelinek  kɛra mɔgɔ tanniwɔrɔnan ye Suɔer-G ɲɔgɔndan na. Mɛkisiki Arly Velasquez tilala jɔyɔrɔ tan ni duurunan la cɛw ka Supper-G senfɛ. Niwu Zelandi Adam Hall tilala jɔyɔrɔ kɔnɔtɔnnan na cɛw ka Super-G ɲɔgɔndan sen fɛ. Polandi suranfiyɛn cɛw ka jikurubolila Maciej Krezel n'a ka yiralikɛla Anna Ogarzynska tilala jɔyɔrɔ tan ni saabanan na Super-G ɲɔgɔndan la. Sudi Kore Jong Seork Park tilala jɔyɔrɔ mugan ni naaninan na cɛw ka Supper-G ɲɔgɔndan la.

flores_passage: "Nigeria y'a lase kɔsala in na k'a kun bɛ k'a ɲɛsigi ka don AFCFTA la dɔgɔcɛ kɔnɔ min ye lajɛnba sigi senkan. mc_answer2: Don min sanifere tun bɛ se ka daminɛ

flores_passage: Tɛgɛrɛ ɲuman fɔr'a ye aka Atlanta waati senfɛ w'a donna duguba kalanko nɛkurayali la. San 2009 Jamana ka San  Ɲɛmɔgɔ Jɔnjɔn dir'a ma. Jɔnjɔn in waati, Atilanta kalansow ye ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw la. Waatini o kɔfɛ,  Atilanta Sariyakolo Kunnafonidila ye sɛbɛn dɔ bɔ min be gɛlɛya yira sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw la. flores_passage: "Minisiri Ɲɛmɔgɔ Stephen Harper sɔnna ka jamana ɲɛmogow ka "" Fiyɛn Jɛlen Sariyasen"" ci  tɔn-bɛɛ-jɛkulu dɔ ma yasa ka lajƐkura  ye tugun yani a kalan ko filana cɛ, Taratadon sanga 25 ɲɔgɔnye kɔfɛ ni NDP ɲɛmogo Jack Layton ye PMO la. Layton tun ye KɔnsƐrvateriw ka Tɔn ka sigida sariyasen in yɛlɛmani laɲini ani PM ka ɲɔgɔnye senfɛ ka laɲini kɛ  ka sigida sariyasen ""bɛɛ segikanni dafalen"" kɛ. Nka Minisiri Ɲɛmɔgɔ John Howard ye a fɔ ko sariyasen in tun ye dɔrɔn marabaaw kana  kɛnɛyaso in daraja jigin ni AUD$ miliyɔn 45 farakan dili ye."

flores_passage: Baara kɛlen in fanba tun ye hakilinakow ye, nka taabolo in sɛbɛnna walasa ka Sagittarius dolokulu filɛliw sankɔrɔta. flores_passage: "Jabaranisohakilinaw, minnu dira o yɔrɔ in bɛɛ, kɛra sabu ye Iran jamana kunafoniɲinijɛkulujoniw sɔnna ko nafanba tun man ye ɲangi la. O tun bɛ talikɛ sɔrɔɲangiliw ani ɲangili tajibayɛlɛmanbaliw labɔli kan jamana kɔkan Erɔpu jamana jɛkulu fɛ, minnu tun jɔlen tun do ni Irankaw ka sɔrɔ 80% ye. OPEC ka kɔsa da kunafonigafe min bɛ bɔ kalo o kalo, ko jamanakɔkantajilabɔ jigira kojugu fɔ kana barikon miliyɔn 2,8  tile kɔnɔ ni san muganlaban in na. Jamanakuntigiba, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ko u ka sirili taji la ye ikomi ""jan"" min bɛ sena kabi Irankaw ka silamɛyayɛlɛma ma daminɛ 1979 ani jamana ka kan k'a a yɛrɛ bɔ o siri in kɔnɔ."

flores_passage: Faransi kɔnɔ, kalata furadama tun bɛ kɛ ni diɲɛyɛlɛmakuraɲɛdɔn fitini ye: kalatalaw kelen bɛ taa gundosoni kɔnɔ, ka u ɲɛnamɔgɔsubantikalatasɛbɛn don foroko kɔnɔ. O kɔ ɲɛmɔgɔw bɛ kalatalatɔgɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ gafe kɔnɔ, kalatala bɛ forokoni lajigi kɛsu kɔnɔ ni ka sɔrɔ ka a tɛgɛnɔn bila tɔgɔgafe kɔnɔ. Faransi kalatasariya ye gundo don a kɛcogow la sisan. Kabi san 1988, yeli bɛ kɛ kɛsu fɛ walasa kalatalaw ni jateminɛkɛlaw k'a sereya ko forokoni tɛ ye kalata daminɛna ani ko forokoniwɛrɛw ma fara n'a bɔra minnu jatera ani kalatayamaruyalenw. Cɛbɔw bɛ se ka cidenw bila ka taa kow bɛɛ tɛmɛcɔgɔ sereya. su fɛ, jateminɛba kɔnɔ min bɛ taa sira kɛrɛn-kɛrɛnni fɛ, kalatalaw bɛ jatɛ kelenkelen.

flores_passage: "Dr Tony Moll bɔra sɔgɔsɔgɔnijɛ banasugu kura in kan furaw te se ka min kɛlɛ joona (XDR-TB) Farafinna woroduguyanfan fɛ KwaZulu-Natal. Ɲininkali dɔ senfɛ, a ko banasugu kura in tun ye ""gɛlɛma ba ye wa kamanagan ko ye ka d'a kan aka fagata ka ca."" San kelen kɔnɔna na, banabaatɔ kelen be se ka banakisɛ in yɛlɛma a masurunna mɔgɔ 10 k'a se 15 ma. Nka, XDR-TD sɔgɔnijɛ minɛ jamakulu ka dɔgɔn hali sisan; sɔgɔnijɛ banabaatɔw la ni mɔgɔ 6,000 ye mɔgɔ 330,000 kuuru la minnu ye bana in sɔrɔ waati dɔ kɔnɔ Sidi Afiriki."

flores_passage: Baana kɔlɔlɔ fɔlɔw lasera Zuluye kalo laban tƐmƐlen. Baana nin bɛ lɛw dɛ la, min tilala tuguni ka yɛlɛma mɔgɔw la sosow fɛ. Balinanko in ye Ɛndi jamana maraɲɛmɔgɔw bila ka fɛrɛw boloda minw ye ka mɔgɔw bila ka lɛw minɛ yɔrɔw la yɔrɔ minw na baanakisɛ caarila kosɛbɛ, ni ka sosokɔnɔnjɔ waa caman dilan ani fɛnɛ ka bagaji fiyɛ. Encephalitis-bolocifura miliyon caman fɛnɛ layidu tala maraɲɛmɔgɔw fɛ minnu bɛ na kɛnɛyajɛkuluw dɛmɛ baana in ɲɛsigili la san wɛrɛ. flores_passage: """Panama Papers"" ye kumafocogo de ye panamaka Mossack Fonseca ka  soronnadonnaw ka cakƐda sƐbƐnw min be surunɲa miliyon tan na, min lakalila 2016 tilemafƐ kibarodisƐbƐn na. SƐbƐn olu ye a jira ko waribɔ tan ni naani ye sannikƐla nafolotigibaw dƐmƐ ka Ameriki dolari waari miliyari caman dogo yasa ka kisi nisɔngɔ ani sariyawƐrƐw ma. Britanikiw ka kunafonigafƐ The Guardian ye a do maw kun na ko Deutsche warimaraso tun be a janto cakƐda guwansan 1200  tila sabanan na minw tun talen do ni ka nin ko in kƐli kan ma. Muruti tun kƐlendo duniya fan tan ni naani, sariya nɔminƐli bara caman tun kundora ani islandi ni paskistan fila bƐƐ jamana ɲƐmɔgɔw  demisiyɔnnera."

flores_passage: Sanfɛsira kasara ka ciya Iran, min ka panfɛnw be ka kɔrɔ wa u  ma minɛn ka kaɲɛ, mɔgɔ gansanw ni kɛlɛbolo walew la. Diyɛn ɲangiliw b'a to pankurun kuraw te se ka san. Ka kon nin dɔgɔkun in ɲƐ, lakanabaw ka pankurunni kasara ye mɔgɔ saaba faaaga ka saba wɛrɛw bana. Salo Iran ka pankurun kasaraw bɛɛ la juguman kɛra kabini san caman tuma minna taama pankurunni dɔ kun dalen Arameni kan binna k'a kunna mɔgɔ 168 faga. Kalo tɛmɛnen in na taama pankurun wɛrɛ ye sira bila ka gosi koko dɔ kun, ka mɔgɔ tanniwolonwula faga.

flores_passage: Iraki kalan jɛkulu y’u ka gafe kɔnɔfɛn yira bi nɛgɛ kan 12 cɔyi. A be lasɔmini kɛ ko mɔgɔ Si te sek'a sɛbɛntiya ko ko be senna Iraki jamanan kɔnɔ ni waati in na min be se ka tilannikɛlaw ka kɛlɛ lajɔ, ni binkanni cayali ye walima cɛrɛtin ka sin ciyɛnni ma. Gafe in be dayɛlɛ ni sankɔrɔta ye k'a ɲinsin foroba baro ma ani fɔkabɛn Lameriki jamann kɔnɔ minnu be talikɛ mara taabolow la Azi bangu kɔrɔfɛ jamanaw la. Gafe in be lagosili ba kɛ ɲɛnmɔgow ka ni waati mara taabolo fan bɛɛ la k'a ɲɛsin Iraki jamana ma wa ka taabolo yɛlɛmali laɲini kƐ tuma ni tuma jona-jona. A ka laɲini 78 cɛla fɔlɔ ye ka jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔcɛ hakilina kura dɔ ka kan ka ta yani ni san in ka ban walasa ka Iraki jamana dancɛw lakana ka bɔ ladorokoli juguw la walasa ka lasigidenyjuruw lakuray'a na dafɛ jamanaw ni ɲɔgɔcɛ.

mc_answer2: Lase dɔ min b’a fɔ ko yɛlɛma dɔw be se ka binkanni cayali bali Iraki kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Laɲiniw walasa ka Iraki jamana dancɛw lakana
mc_answer4: Sankɔrɔta dɔ ka ɲɛsin Lamerikɛn jamana ka fɔkabɛn ma

flores_passage: "Jamanaɲɛmɔgɔsokumakɛra Newt Gingrich, Texas guvɛrɛnɛri Rick Perry, ni wasadenmuso Michele Bachmann tun tara ka tugu ɲɔgɔn kɔ, naaninan, duurunan, ani wɔrɔnan. Perry ko a tun bɛ na "" segin ka taa Texas walasa ka su in na kalataɲɛnɛbɔbagaw ka jabi jateminɛ, ka a lagɛ ni a sɔrɔla ɲɛtaga bɛ ne bolo ni ɲɔgɔndan in na"", nka a o kɔfɛ a ko a bɛ na to ɲɔgɔndan kɔnɔ ka wasadenya ɲini worodugu fɛ Zanwuye kalo tile 21. flores_passage: "The Northern Rock Bank tun kɛra jamana warimaraso ye san 2008 kuma dɔ mɛnni k'a fɔ ko cakɛda tun ye dɛmɛ balini sɔrɔ ka bɔ Angilɛ jamana marabulon yɔrɔ. Northern Rock mako tun bɛ dɛmɛ na k'a sababu kɛ a ka lakanabaliya ye san 2007 a ka lahawotafarankan min ye u bila dingɛ kɔnɔ. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group tun banan laɲini dɔ la sani warimaraso in ka kɛ jamana ta ye. San 2010, a kɛni kɔ jamana ta ye, o waati warimaraso min tun bɛ siraba kan, Rock plc, farala ka bɔ ""warimaraso kolon"" Northern Rock (minɛkoɲuma) la. Virgin ye "" warimarasoɲuma"" dɔrɔn san Northern Rock fɛ nka a ma kɛ minɛkoɲumajɛkulu ye."
question: Waati jumɛn na Northern Rock Bank mako tun bɛ dɛmɛ na jamana marabulon yɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Banki in kɛlen kɔ jamana ta ye
mc_answer2: Waati jumɛnna banki farala ka bɔ warimaraso minɛkoɲuma na
mc_answer3: Virgin Group kɛlen ka warimarasoɲuma sannen kɔfɛ

flores_passage: "San 1956 Slania taara Suwɛdi jamana na, minna a ye baara daminɛ Suwɛdi Nɛgɛjuru-ni-batakiciso la n'a kɛra o yɔrɔ batakimarasoɲɛmɔgɔ ye. A ye bolonɔnbilana 1000 ni a kunkanfɛn dilan Suwɛdi ni jamana 28 wɛrɛw ye. Mɔgɔw tun sɔnna a ka baarakɛcogo ye fo encephalitisdɔkɔtɔrɔ caman y'a tɔgɔ da u ka duw kɔnɔ. Dɔw y'u ka kalan sinsi a ka baarakɛniw farali ye ɲɔgɔn kan daman. A bolonɔn 1000na tun ye "" Suwɛdi masakɛ ka kobacɛɲinkɛlenw"" ye minnu sɛbɛra David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl fɛ san 2000, n'u kofɔra Guinness Book ka  Diɲɛjɔnjɔnw kɔnɔ. A fɛnɛ tun bɛ ka a yɛrɛ di kosɛbɛ waribolonɔnbila la  jamana caman ye, o baaramisalisurunw dɔ ye mankuntuw ye ka ɲɛsin jamana marabaɲɛmɔgɔ ma Kanada dolariwaari bulukuraw 5 ni 100 sanfɛ."
question: Bolonɔnbilanaw joli tun dilanna Słania jamana caman ye?

flores_passage: Trans-Alaska ka nɛgɛburu-sira mayili 800 tun  datugura k'a sabu kɛ taji kɛnɛ bara ba camaw bɔnni ye, Fairbanks baniyan fan fɛ, Alasika. Kuran tigɛ kɛra tasuma sɛgɛsɛgɛli gansan dɔ senfɛ min ye  bɔlidaw yɛlɛ wa taji kɛnɛ poyira ka bɔn Fort Greely tajisamaniso 9 kɛrɛfɛ. Bɔlidaw yɛlɛli ye yɛlɛli fanga jiginni dɔ waleya tɛmɛsiriyaw kan wa taji bolira yɔrɔ dɔ fɛ k'a se taji barakƐyɔrɔ dɔ ma min be se ka barogon 55,000 ta (galon miliyɔn 2.3 ta). Araba wuladayanfan fɛ bondowoniw tun bɛ ka bɔn walema a tun bɛ ka bɔ +D301:D400fiɲɛbilada fɛ bondo kɔnɔ. Marayɔrɔ filana wɛrɛ bɛ bondo in duguma barikonw 104.500 bɛ don min kɔnɔ n'o tun man fa ka s'a daan na.

mc_answer4: Tasuma sɛgɛsɛgɛli Fort Greely tajisamaniso dɔ kelenna

flores_passage: Ŋɔgɔndantolonkuncɛ senfɛ, Williams ye kuru sɔrɔ suɲɛ fila, ka a sababu kɛ sanmusɔnmusɔni tun daminɛ na. O ani kɔsalatolon tun gɛlɛya la, ni tɔmi fila ye ka tugun ɲɔgɔnna. Jifunufunubile sababu ye faraɲɔgɔnkanba min tɛ deli ka kɛ Karenia brevis fɛ, min ye kɔkɔjikuruso ye min bɛ bɔ a yɛrɛ ma. Yɛrɛlapoyisababuw bɛ se ka nerotokesine dii min bese adamadenw ni jƐgƐw fila bƐƐ fasaw ja. Jɛkɛ waatidɔlaman bɛ saa k'a sababu kɛ baga cayani ye jiw la. Adamadenw ninakilitɔ bɛ se k'a sɔrɔ ji fɛ min bɛ se ka sanfɛla sɔrɔ fiɲɛ ni jilonbolabatɔ fɛ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn ti jate Karenia brevis sɔn fɛ?
mc_answer2: A bi se ka adamadenw fasaw ja

flores_passage: Ŋɔgɔndantolonkuncɛ senfɛ, Williams ye kuru sɔrɔ suɲɛ fila, ka a sababu kɛ sanmusɔnmusɔni tun daminɛ na. O ani kɔsalatolon tun gɛlɛya la, ni tɔmi fila ye ka tugun ɲɔgɔnna. Jifunufunubile sababu ye faraɲɔgɔnkanba min tɛ deli ka kɛ Karenia brevis fɛ, min ye kɔkɔjikuruso ye min bɛ bɔ a yɛrɛ ma. Yɛrɛlapoyisababuw bɛ se ka nerotokesine dii min bese adamadenw ni jƐgƐw fila bƐƐ fasaw ja. Jɛkɛ waatidɔlaman bɛ saa k'a sababu kɛ baga cayani ye jiw la. Adamadenw ninakilitɔ bɛ se k'a sɔrɔ ji fɛ min bɛ se ka sanfɛla sɔrɔ fiɲɛ ni jilonbolabatɔ fɛ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn ma se ka kɛ Karena brevis fɛ?

flores_passage: Felicia, Sen dɔ fiɲƐkolɔnbaci dɔ min sigiyɔrɔmalen be Saffir-Simpson sanfiɲƐba hakƐ 4 bɔ, ye depresiyɔn tropical dɔ fƐgƐya ka kɔn a tunnuli ɲƐtaratadɔ. A tɔ minw tora ye sanjiiba lana gunw fanba kan, hali ni a ye a sɔrɔ fo bii, kasara walima jiiwalagatali kuma ma fɔ. SankisƐw, sera fo 6,34 pusew ma ni suguya dɔ ye Oahu kunna, lakalira i na fɔ ‘’ ko nafama’’. SankisƐw dɔw nana ni sanfiɲƐbaw ni tunma ni tunma sanpƐrƐn.

flores_passage: O be a sɛnbɛntiya dɔrɔn ko jolo tun be dinozɔr nunu dɔw la, kumakan min caarilen don ka ban, ɲa a be ɲƐfɔli dɔw dii ni ni fɛnkɔrɔ te se ka o dii tu ma bɛƐ, ina fɔ suguya ani kƐcogo sigiyɔrɔmasaba hakɛ. DɔnnikƐlaw ko ko nin datanfƐn faarikansi tun ɲƐ  ye worojiima de ye a kan ani ɲƐ  ladibilen walima ɲƐ  karotenoyide a kɔrɔla yanfa. Nin lakodonni fƐnnƐn be a to kɔnɔw siiko ɲƐtaa ka faamu kaɲƐ kɔsɔbƐ. Sabula dinosoriw sikalaw ma janya ka ɲƐ, min ni a be wele ko rasi, ɲa siiw kƐcogo wƐrƐw be a ala – siikisƐ ni sii - ɲinninlikƐbaw ye a famu ko rasiw tun be janya ka bɔ u yƐrƐla a cogoya tow kɔfƐ. Siiw dancogo be mɔgɔ bila ka miiri ko u tun te kƐ ka pannikƐ ɲa ka funteni hakakƐ bƐrƐbƐnni walima ka a jirali.Ɲinnililaw ye u ka halikilina jira ko, halini dinɔsɔridenni de kukala ko do, esantiyɔn in be a kɔrɔbalen sii de jira ɲa jƐgƐfara tƐ. Ɲinnilaw ye hakilina do fɔ ko, hali ni dinɔsɔridenni de kodo, nin sugu be kɔrɔbalen sii de jira ɲa jƐgƐfara a tƐ jira.
question: Ninnu jabi jumɛn ma sɔrɔ jolo sɛnbɛntiya fɛ?
mc_answer2: Faamuyali min ba jira ko jolo tun ma kɛ ka pannikɛ
mc_answer4: Sɛnbɛntiyali ka fɔ ko jolo bɛ dinozɔri caman fɛ

flores_passage: Tuma nin ni pikiriji sƐgƐsƐgƐta dɔ be I na fɔ ka bese ka dɔ bɔ Ebola banakisƐ ka maa faa tala, fura fosi ma sɔrɔ  hali sisan fura foyi ma lakodɔn fɔlɔ ka an senkɔrɔ banakisɛw in kɛlɛ. Faarikolo dƐmƐlan jii dɔ, ZMapp, ye jiira ka bese ka nɔbɔ  fɔlɔ kƐnƐkan ye, ɲa kalanw ye a jira ko a nafasɔrɔlen be dɔgɔya ni hakili  be min ma saaya kunbenniko la. Ni kɛwale in ka ca UK fan yɛrɛw fɛ nka Ekɔsi kiiri be baara kɛ cogo wɛrɛ la wa Kiirisow ye jaw jɛnsɛnni ye k'a kɛ  ɲangili ko ye. Dundee Sanfɛ kalanso Pamela Fergus Karamɔgɔ Porofesɛri Pamela Ferguson b'a fɔ ""Inafɔ Kunnafonidilaw be ka taama farati sira dɔ kan ni siganamɔgɔ in ka jaw ani fɛn wɛrɛ jɛnsɛnni ye."" Sɛbɛn in, bɔrɔtɔli in fɛ, bena ɲɛsin dancɛ kow ma,  Palɛstini be min fɛ a ka sinsin  yani 1967 Azi bangu kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ kɛlɛ dancɛw kan."

flores_passage: Waatijan ka kɔn Daily Show ni The Colbert Report ɲɛ, Heck ni Johnson carili dɔ fɛɛrɛ sigi min ye kunafoniw ni kunafonilase ladegi k'u to kalandenya UW sanfɛkalanso la san 1988. mc_answer4: Lagosiliw tun ka farin tuma dɔw la

flores_passage: USA Jimenasitigi be u ka Komite Olympik ka bataki in jukɔrɔmado ni ka sɔn u ka sigida lakana waleyaw carinin ma an ka farikolo ɲanajɛlaw bɛ kɔsɔ. An sɔnna USOC ka laseli ma min be a yira ko an ka farikolo ɲanajɛlaw ni tɔnw ka nafa, ani u ka farikolo ɲanajɛw, ka kan ka waleya ni yɛlɛmali sira nafamaw ye an ka cakɛda kɔnɔ, ka tɛmɛ jɔyɔrɔ tanɲa ma. USA Jiminasitiki be dƐmƐdo ɲinnin kƐrƐnkƐrƐnnen dɔ ma min be na se ka tiɲƐ bange cogo kan  min ka damatƐmƐwale lakalira mabalolenw fƐ ni timinandiya ye cogo min ni Larry Nassar sera ka tƐmƐ ka mƐƐ kasɔrɔ a ma ye  ni ka se ka falenniw kƐ minw tun ka kan ka kƐ. Ameriki Jimnastiki ni USOC ka laɲini bɛ ye keleŋ ye - ka ziminasitiki farikoloɲanajɛ, ani a tɔw bɛ lakanda cogobɛla farikolo ɲanajɛlaw bɛƐ ye walasi u ka se ka u ka miirinaw waleya yɔrɔ jɔnjɔn, ɲuman ani tanɲɛ la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni kumasen in ye, USA Jimnastiki ma dɛmɛdo fɛn jumɛn ma Nassar ka dantɛmɛ wale min kɛra farikoloɲɛnajɛlaw la kɔfɛ?
mc_answer3: Falenniw minw tun kan ka kɛ jɛkulu in kɔnɔ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Amir Khan bɛna ninnu jumɛn dɛmɛ hali n’a hakilina tɛ?
mc_answer2: A ɲɔgɔndanɲɔgɔnw ka bɔ 2004 Olɛnpiki la

flores_passage: Peter Lenz, san 13 den mɔtɔtulonkɛra dɔ, saara a sen yeni kɔ kasara dɔ la Indianapolis Motor Speedway kan. A ka labɛn senfɛ Lenz bɔra a ka mɔtɔ kan ka bin, ni ka gosi a tulonkɛɲɔgɔn Xavier Zayat fɛ. O yɔrɔni bɛɛ, sirakankasarakɛnɛyamaakulu dɔ ye dɛmɛ don a ma ka taa dɔkɔtɔrɔsodeni dɔ la a saara yɔrɔ minna kɔfɛ. Zayat ma madimi kasara la.
question: Peter Lenz sara tuma jumɛn?
mc_answer2: A binnen kɔ ka bɔ a ka moto kan
mc_answer4: Tuma min na a ni sirakankasarakɛnɛyamaakulu tun do

flores_passage: Woyasikɛlila pankurula be seka siranya fɛn ye mɔgɔw sisanw ani suguw sugsuw bɛɛ fɛ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala nin u be ma delika woyase pankurula kaye walima ye siranya ko dɔ ye. A tɛ maloyala ko ye: a mabɔ siranya tɔw la ani fɛn kanu baliyaw minunw be mɔgɔ camaw la. Dɔw fɛ, famuyalila pankuru be marise cogomina ani min be kɛ pani kɔnɔ be sek'u dɛmɛ ka siranya kɛlɛ min sigileno dɔnibaliya kan walima yɛrɛminɛn baliya.
question: Cogoya jumɛn na panikɛla hamitɔ bɛ se ka faamuyali sɔrɔ pankuru kɔnɔna marise cogo la?
mc_answer1: Ni taamakɛla be maloya n’a ka siran ye
mc_answer2: N’u ka panni hami bɛ munumunu dɔnbali siran dafɛ
mc_answer3: Ni taamakɛla bɛ hami bolifɛn sugu bɛɛ kɔnɔdonni na
mc_answer4: N’u ka jɔrɔ ju bɔra jatigɛwale dɔ la min ni panni tɛ ɲɔgɔnsira la

flores_passage: Bibi nin na, sanfɛ woyasi sigiyɔrɔ marali ka gɛlɛ pankuru baarakɛyɔrɔw fɛ kasɔrɔ ɲɛɲininli ma kɛ fɔlɔ ani piri sumani. Waatidɔw la, piri baw camaw be seka kɛ woli kelen kɔnɔ kunafonisow camaw la ani ɲininli jaabi sumani ye ɲɔgɔna be sara kaɲɛ ani ka pankuruso baarakɛyɔrɔ ka ɛntɛrɛnɛti siti lajɛ fɛnɛ yani marali cɛ kabila.
question: Ka da ni tɛmɛsira in kan, paseko dɔnni bɛ taamakɛla o bɛ mun de laban kɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka taama barayɔrɔ caman ka fɛn di taw ɲini
mc_answer2: Ka marali kɛ ka bila pankuruso ka baarakɛyɔrɔ la
mc_answer3: Ka barayɔrɔ caman ka pasew sanga ɲɔgɔnna
mc_answer4: Ka pankuruso ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ka siti lajɛ

flores_passage: Bibi nin na, sanfɛ woyasi sigiyɔrɔ marali ka gɛlɛ pankuru baarakɛyɔrɔw fɛ kasɔrɔ ɲɛɲininli ma kɛ fɔlɔ ani piri sumani. Waatidɔw la, piri baw camaw be seka kɛ woli kelen kɔnɔ kunafonisow camaw la ani ɲininli jaabi sumani ye ɲɔgɔna be sara kaɲɛ ani ka pankuruso baarakɛyɔrɔ ka ɛntɛrɛnɛti siti lajɛ fɛnɛ yani marali cɛ kabila.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, dugutaalaw k’an ka mun de kɛ walasa ka pankuru pase bɛ la daduman sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka pankuruso ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ka siti lajɛ
mc_answer2: Ka kunafonisow ka pasew sanga ɲɔgɔn ma
mc_answer3: K’a mara bila pankuru cakɛda ka siti ɛntɛrinɛti kan
mc_answer4: K’a mara bila duguta ko ɲɛnabɔbaga dɔ ye

flores_passage: Posuw be sara kaɲɛ walasa ka fɛnw ci teliyala. Waaticamana. waati nafan kabɔn nin baarakɛ sɛbɛnw ye, feerefɛnw walima bolimafɛn fanw min kan ka dilan teliyala. Sira dɔw kan, cili baarakɛyɔrɔw ka pankuruw b'u yɛrɛw bolo, nka nin sira wɛrɛ ani izini fitiniw fɛ, kunbalan kun beyi. Nin u kun ye fɛnw ci dɔnita pankuru fɛ, sira dɔw fɛ a kun be seka tile camaw ta ka se jigili ma ani duwani. Sira kelen min beyi ka cili teliya kun ye ka ci inafɔ minɛn tɔgɔ sɛbɛnlen. Pankuruso sariyaw t'u yamariya ka minɛnw jalan kelenw ci, i bena do yɔrɔ mina.
question: Tuma jumɛn tɔɲɔgɔn bɛ jaguya ka taa fɛn di ta nɔfɛ?
mc_answer1: Nin fɛnw cira donnita pankuru fɛ
mc_answer2: Ni cakɛda y’a yɛrɛ ka pankuru ta
mc_answer3: Nin fɛnw bɛ ka ci inafɔ minɛn tɔgɔ sɛbɛnnen
mc_answer4: Nin cili bɛ ka kɛ cakɛdabaw fɛ

flores_passage: I kan k'i ka pɔnyin sɔrɔ pankuru kulu sugandi ɲamajɔla. Ali na sɔrɔ i be seka miri k'o ye miriya ɲuman ye ka ta pankuruso la i be woyase mina ka caya, i kan ka dɔ ko tɔnɔn minunw di tɛ kelen ye waatidɔw la ani pankuruta waatibɛ pɔnyin be seka kɛ ɲuman ye pankuruso dɔ wɛrɛla o kulu kelen kɔnɔ.
question: Ka da tɛmɛsira kan, Frequent Flyer pankurun cakɛda sugandi tɔn jɛkulu dɔ kɔnɔ, ninnu na jumɛn kan ka kɔn ka kɛ?
mc_answer1: Pankurun cakɛda min bɛ kuru caman ni
mc_answer2: Pankurun cakɛda mun bɛ jɛkulu bɛ la kunbaba kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: I bɛ taama pankurun cakɛda min bolo ka caya
mc_answer4: Pankurun cakɛda min bɛna sɔn ka kɛ farankan bɛrɛbɛrɛliw dili la

flores_passage: I kan k'i ka pɔnyin sɔrɔ pankuru kulu sugandi ɲamajɔla. question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira ye, jɔn bɛ sɔn ka pankuruta waatibɛ pɔnyin caman di?
mc_answer1: Pankurun cakɛda wɛrɛ jɛkulu wɛrɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: I ka taama fanba pankurun cakɛda sira min fɛ jɛkulu kelen in kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: I ka taama fanba pankurun cakɛda sira min fɛ jɛkulu wɛrɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Pankurun cakɛda wɛrɛ jɛkulu kelen in kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Alikɔlimanfɛn min hakɛyala. Alikɔ tɛ mɔgɔw bayɛlɛma cogoya kelena, ani i dandɔli nafan kabɔn kosɛbɛ. Keneya kunbalan kuntagalajan sɔrɔli alikɔli minli damatɛmɛ wale fɛ be seka kɛ fogofogo cɛnliye ani ali fiyɛn ani saya. Farati be taɲɛ min be alikɔli kɔniw min. Jama jama camaw be seka sɔrɔ sipiriti kɔnlenw la minunw be seka kɛ metanɔli ye, min be seka fiyɛn nati walima saya ali a fitini minli.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira ye, dusukuntayɔrɔ jumɛn bɛ dugan k’a kɛ dɔlɔ minko juguya sababu ye?

flores_passage: Alikɔlimanfɛn min hakɛyala. Alikɔ tɛ mɔgɔw bayɛlɛma cogoya kelena, ani i dandɔli nafan kabɔn kosɛbɛ. Keneya kunbalan kuntagalajan sɔrɔli alikɔli minli damatɛmɛ wale fɛ be seka kɛ fogofogo cɛnliye ani ali fiyɛn ani saya. Farati be taɲɛ min be alikɔli kɔniw min. question: Inafɔ a fɔra cogo minna ni tɛmɛsira kɔnɔ, mun de tun be se ka dɔlɔ kɔlɔlɔ juguw baga faga?

flores_passage: Canal District (Olandɛkana: Grachtengordel) ye siyɛkili 17 nan dugu ye min kɛnino ka Binnenstad min be Amsterdam munu mun. Dugu in bɛɛ jiraleno inafɔ UNESCO Diɲɛ Cɛnma Yɔrɔ ko sababu ka k'a ladala ani tariku nafan kelen ye, ani a sow walɛri be jamana so walɛribaw cɛla.
question: So walɛribaw Amsterdam sow cɛla bɛ min?
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la min sugandira ka kɛ UNESCO Diɲɛ Cɛnma Yɔrɔ ko ye
mc_answer3: Yɔrɔ minnu tun bɔlen don Binnenstad la

flores_passage: Canal District (Olandɛkana: Grachtengordel) ye siyɛkili 17 nan dugu ye min kɛnino ka Binnenstad min be Amsterdam munu mun. Dugu in bɛɛ jiraleno inafɔ UNESCO Diɲɛ Cɛnma Yɔrɔ ko sababu ka k'a ladala ani tariku nafan kelen ye, ani a sow walɛri be jamana so walɛribaw cɛla.
question: Munna Canal District sungandira ka kɛ UNESCO Diɲɛ Cɛnma Yɔrɔ ye?
mc_answer1: Tariku nin danbe walɛri b’a la
mc_answer3: A yɔrɔ bɛ ka Binnenstad la kolilen

flores_passage: Phnom Krom, kilomɛtiri duuru  Siem Reap worodugu ani tileben yanfan fɛ. O kulusanfɛla tanpulu kun jɔla siyɛkili 9 laban na, Masakɛ Yasovarman ka fanga kɔnɔ. Tanpulu yɛlɛ ani nisondiya cogo ani  Tonle Sap Lake lajɛli be kulu yɛlɛ in kɛ fɛn nafama. O yɔrɔ lajɛli be seka fara ɲɔgɔnkan lafiyala nin batɔɔn woyazi ye ka ta laki la. Angkor Pass mako kabɔn ka dn tanpulu kɔnɔ, ola kana ɲina kana n'i ka pasipɔri ye i fɛ nin be ka ta Tonle Sap.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jemɛn bɛ ka Phnom Krom lajɛli kɛ fɛn nafama ye?
mc_answer2: Taama nin Angkor Pass ka sira ye
mc_answer4: Batɔɔn woyazi ka taa laki la

mc_answer1: Ka yɛlɛ ka tɛmɛ Yasovarman alabatoso la
mc_answer4: Batɔɔn woyazi Tonle Sap laminin na

flores_passage: Antarctica nĩkuo kũndũ kũrĩa kwĩ heho mũno thĩ ng'ima, na ĩthiũrũkĩirie South Pole. Gũcera kũu kwĩ goro, kwendaga ucamba, kũngĩhanĩka tu mĩerinĩ ya summer Nov-Feb, na mũngĩcerio o Peninsula, islands na Ross Sea. Andũ ngiri ciganona aruti wĩra nĩmaikaraga gũkũ ihinda rĩa summer thĩini wa kambĩ mĩrongo ĩtano; andũ anini nĩmaikaraga kũu ngina ihinda rĩa winter. Antarctica thĩ nyũmũ ni njaraganu na ikaarirwo 2-3 km nĩ barabu. Rĩmwe nĩkũrĩ aceri ngũthi a rĩerainĩ nĩmathiaga thĩ nyũmũ kũhaba irĩma na gũkinya Pole, ĩrĩa ĩkoragwo na kambĩ nene.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn tun be bɛ turisiw bali ka ta bɔ Antarctica la?
mc_answer2: Nafa kelen pewu Ross Sea sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Baara waati min b’a to i bɛ taama Desanburu nin Zanwuye kalo kɔnɔ

question: Turisi min tun mako donnen do kulukan yɛlɛ la tun bɛ ka Antarctica yɔrɔ jumɛn lajɛ?

flores_passage: Lajɛkɛyɔrɔ minunw ye bi kɔn depasela bibi in na, ani tɔleno mizew kɔnɔ, walima kalankɛyɔrɔw. Inafɔ polisiyɔn ftitni u waati sangalenw la kun tɛ kunbalan suguya ye inafɔ a be bibi in na cogomina, u be sɔrɔ waaticamala duguw walima kanpisiw la, min ka nɔgɔ ka sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ minunw jɔla waati kura ninunw kan. Sisan ɲɛɲinlini lajɛlikɛlaw camaw ye yɔrɔw bele belebaw ye yɔrɔ yanw la nin waati cogoya ɲuman ye.
question: Lajɛkɛyɔrɔ minunw ye bi kɔn ma teli ka kɛ yɔrɔ jumɛn?

flores_passage: Lajɛkɛyɔrɔ minunw ye bi kɔn depasela bibi in na, ani tɔleno mizew kɔnɔ, walima kalankɛyɔrɔw. flores_passage: Nĩkũrĩ icũa nyingĩ, nĩũndũ wa Aukland gũtaganĩria harbour igĩrĩ. Iria ciũĩkaine mũno ciĩ matũrainĩ matatũ. Icũa cia North Shore (thĩinĩ wa district ya North Harbour) cĩa irianĩ rĩa Pacific na ciĩbangĩte kuuma Long Bay rũgongo wa Devonport mwena wa mũhuro. Ciothe Nĩ ta icũa cia mĩthanga na gũthambĩra nĩgwĩtĩkĩrie, na nyingĩ nĩcirĩ ciĩruru cia mĩtĩ ya pohutukawa. Icũa cia Tamaki Drive ciĩ thĩinĩ wa Waitemata Harbour, ĩrĩa ĩrĩ thĩinĩ wa icegerera cĩa Mission Bay na St Heliers thĩinĩ wa Central Aukland. Icũa ici rĩmwe nĩikoragwo na andũ aingĩ a nyũmba na ĩna mĩthemba mĩega ya duka ciĩbangite icũainĩ. No wĩthambĩrĩ gotarĩ gaja.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira in ye, jidawolo jumɛn bɛ sɔn ka ɲɛ kosɔbɛ tile kelen lafiya ma?

Icũa ici rĩmwe nĩikoragwo na andũ aingĩ a nyũmba na ĩna mĩthemba mĩega ya duka ciĩbangite icũainĩ. No wĩthambĩrĩ gotarĩ gaja.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira in ye, nɔnni cogow jumɛn te tɛli ka kɛ lakana kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Hakɛto hakilito ala k'i beka kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala kaburu camaw yɔrɔ de lajɛ, ani fɛnɛ yɔrɔw min nafan tɛ dɔn kaban diɲɛ mɔgɔ fan dɔw fɛ. Cɛw ni musow camaw beyi alisa balola minunw y'u ka waatikɛ yan ninɔ, ani camaw minunw kanu baw fagala walima ye baara fo saya yan, Ziwufuw ani minunw tɛ Ziwufuw ye bɛɛ. Hakɛto yɔrɔw bɔɲan nin bɔɲancogo bɛɛ ye, sɛbɛ ani dambe a ni min kakan. Kana tulɔnkɛ Holocaust kuna walima Naziw. Kana yɔrɔ cɛn nin sɛbɛli walima desin cɛnliw ye sojɔlenw la.
question: Ni tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ yɔrɔ lakalilen tun lajɛtɔ, ninnu jumɛn tun bina jate inafɔ kɔnnen ye?
mc_answer2: Ka taamasiɲɛn to kɛnɛ kɛrɛ dɔ fɛ

flores_passage: Gɛrɛfɛ kanw ye kan dilaniw minunw dilana walasa ka kuma waleya nɔgɔya mɔgɔw nin ɲɔgɔncɛ min bena kunbalan sɔrɔ kuma siratigɛ fɛ. U danbɔɔleno forobakanla, mɔgɔ ma min dilan walima kɔnɔna kanw min bena kɛ kan min sera tɔw ye kun kelen na walima kun wɛrɛ inafɔ kuma siraw kan wɛrɛw fɔbaw nin ɲɔgɔncɛ.
question: Ninnu jumɛn bɛ forobakanw lakali?

flores_passage: Gɛrɛfɛ kanw ye kan dilaniw minunw dilana walasa ka kuma waleya nɔgɔya mɔgɔw nin ɲɔgɔncɛ min bena kunbalan sɔrɔ kuma siratigɛ fɛ. U danbɔɔleno forobakanla, mɔgɔ ma min dilan walima kɔnɔna kanw min bena kɛ kan min sera tɔw ye kun kelen na walima kun wɛrɛ inafɔ kuma siraw kan wɛrɛw fɔbaw nin ɲɔgɔncɛ.
question: Nunnu kumasen jumɛn tɛ gɛrɛfɛ kanw lakali tigitigi?
mc_answer1: U ye kɔnɔna kanw ye minnu tun labaarala ka kumaɲɔgɔnya nɔgɔya mɔgɔw cɛ minnu be se ka dɛsɛ ka ɲɔgɔn faamuya cogo wɛrɛlama
mc_answer2: U ye kanw ye minnu dilan wa u ladilalen fana
mc_answer3: U ye kanw ye minnu ladilana yaasa ka kumaɲɔgɔnya yɔrɔw gɛlɛnmanw lanɔgɔya
mc_answer4: K'an dilalenw don minnu fɔli ka ca mɔgɔw minnu tɛ k'an kelɛn fɔ

flores_passage: Nin be Northern Baltic tikɛ nɛnɛ fɛ, kabini yɔrɔ lajɛ bari dɔni gilasi cɛra be seka mankan ba bɔ ka ɲɛsin mɔgɔ tɔrɔlen ma. Saint Petersburg mɔgɔta batɔn be dugu waati ta. Batɔn woyazikɛlaw baleleno ka bɔ wiza tali laɲininw ma (Benkanw lajɛ).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ nin tɛmɛsira in ye, taamaden tun be se kakan ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ n’a ya sɔrɔ u ka jikuru bɛ bɔ fonɛnɛ fɛ?
mc_answer4: Waati min tun tɛmɛna k’i to dugu kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Barcelone kan sariya sirafɛ ye Catalan ye ani Ɛsipaɲɔli ye. Mɔgɔ tilancɛ ɲɔgɔna b'a kanu ka kuma Catalan na, mɔgɔw camaw b'a famuya, ani kumafɔlila bɛɛ be Ɛsipaɲɔli dɔ. Nka, tamaisiyɛnw camaw be Catalan dɔrɔn de la bari a sigileno siriya fɛ inafɔ kan dagalen fɔlɔ.s Nka, Ɛsipaɲɔli be itilize alisa jamama tiransipɔriw la ani yɔrɔ wɛrɛw. Waatibɛɛ kunafɔni Meturo kɔnɔ be Catalan dɔrɔn dela, nka kobalenliw bolodabaliw be fɔ cogoya dilane kabila kan camaw la inafɔ ɛsipaɲɔli, angilɛ, faransɛ, arabu ani zapɔnɛ.
question: Munna Catalan tun talen do ka caya tamaisiyɛnw kan ani kunafɔniw sen fɛ Barcelona?
mc_answer1: A bɛ faamu yɔrɔ caman na ka tɛmɛ Ɛsipaɲɔli ka
mc_answer2: Dugu sariya kan fɔlɔ kun don
mc_answer4: Meturo ani jamana yɔrɔ wɛrɛw ka caya sigidenw fɛ minnu bɛ Catalan kan de fɔ

question: Ninnu kanw jumɛn bɛ itilize waatibɛɛ kunafɔni na Barcelone Meturo fɛ?

flores_passage: Jamana minunw talenoɲɛ bibi in na, dilan ɲuman ba ani daraka yɛlɛna ka kɛ ari cogoyaye. Sanfɛ yɔrɔ dan na, B&B be fasafili  tiɲɛla fɛnw fila dɔrɔn na: dilan ani daraka. O cogoyala, o cogoɲuman ba la nin yɔrɔ suguw be seka dilan ɲuman ba sɔrɔ, lala tikɛdilane nin filiw ye walima fɔlɔfɔlɔ dilan. Daraka ye lala marayɔrɔ waati nisondiya dumuniw ye walima jiginso dumuni kɛrɛnkɛrɛniye. Yɔrɔ be seka kɛ fɔlɔfɔlɔ so kɔrɔlen nin fɔlɔ so masiriw ye, dugumakolo desɛnma ani pisini.

flores_passage: Beijing dugu Siniwajamana kɔnɔ bena kɛ Olymic Winter Games san 2022 kun bɛ baga ye, min bena kɛ dugu fɔlɔ ye min be tilema ani nɛnɛ zuye olɛnpiki kun bɛ. Beijing bena dayɛlɛli ani tuguli tulɔnkɔ kun bɛ ani sɔkɔnɔna gilasi zuyew. Sikiboli zuye wɛrɛ bena kɛ Taizicheng sikilkɛ yɔrɔla Zhandgjiakou kɔnɔ kilomɛtiri 200 ɲɔgn nin Beijing cɛ.

flores_passage: Mura bana walima kumasɛbɛfɔlila giripu, be seka kɔnɔw ani bagan minunw be sindi minɛ. Hakɛ min ka dɔgɔ nin ka bakelen ye yera adamadenw la, nka o dɔw labana sayala. Mɔgɔ minɛnw camaw be siyɛ baarakɛ, nka kɔnɔlajɛlaw fɛnɛ be faratila.
question: Jɔn bɛ farati danna ka kumasɛbɛfɔlila giripu sɔrɔ?
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ minnu bɛ baara kɛ ni sindi ye
mc_answer4: Banakisɛ ye mɔgɔ minnu sɔrɔ ta tɛmɛ

mc_answer1: Siyɛ baarakɛbagaw dɔrɔn de ye mura bana sɔrɔ
mc_answer2: A ɲɔgɔnko caman yera adamadenw na ka tɛmɛn kɔnɔw kan

mc_answer4: Minnu tun yera adamadenw na bɛɛ labana sayala

flores_passage: Vikings kun ye Russie jisiraw itilize ka Black Sea la ani Caspian Sea. Nin sira fan dɔw be seka itilize alisa, Jɛndili sɛbɛnw ɲinin lala min mako beyi, min sɔrli be seka gɛlɛya lala. White Sea - Baltic Canal be Artic Ocean ani Baltic Sea tuguɲɔgɔna, nin tɛmɛli ye Ladoga ani Saint Petersburg fɛ, cogoyala nin baw ani lakiw ye. Laki Onega fɛnɛ tuguleno fɛnɛ Ŋolga la, ola nalila kabɔ Caspian Sea ka tɛmɛ Russie be seka kɛ alisa.
question: White Sea-Baltic Canali bɛ tugu ɲɔgɔnna?

flores_passage: Siginfɛli fuyɛli kɛyɔrɔ ye waaticamana jɔ yɔrɔ fɔlɔ tumamina jigili bɛka kɛ pankuru kɔnɔ, batɔn walima bolimanfɛn wɛrɛ. Furɔntiyɛri dɔw la, tirɛ kontureliw be kɛ tirɛ bolitɔ ani i kan karididantite ɲuman bila i kun tumamina i bena dɔ nin tirɛn  ninunw la kelen kɔnɔ. Sufɛ tirɛnw minunw dabɔla sunɔkɔ kama, tirɛ bolila be seka pasipɔriw faraɲɔgɔnkan walalsa i ka sunɔgɔ kana tikɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, bolimafɛn jumɛnna pasipɔriw bɛ seka fara ɲɔgɔn kan walasa bolimafɛn kɔnɔmɔgɔw kana jɔ?

mc_answer1: I jiginen ka bɔ tirɛ kɔnɔ

flores_passage: "Singapore ye waaticama yɔrɔ lakanalen ye cogoyala ani a bolili ka nɔgɔn anui i be seka fɛnw bɛɛ san i nalen kɔ. Nka nin bilala ""jimayɔrɔ belebelebala"", fitini dɔrɔn ka ekuwatɛri kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛ, i bena ɲɛnɛbɔ ni funtɛni (waatibɛɛla) ani tile ye (tumamina sankolo jɛleno, cogoya gɛlɛ dɔgɔmanila)."
question: Ninnu gɛlɛya jumɛnw de bɛ se ka sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ ni i sigilen bɛ Singapore jimayɔrɔ belebelebala?

flores_passage: Alinaɲi patiseriw kaɲi kosɛbɛ, ani Baviere kɔnɔ, witaminiw b'ula ani u suguya ka cɛ, cogoyala inafɔ u worodugu yanfan sigiɲɔgɔn taw, Autriche. Pate yiridenmanw be fanbɛ, nin pate dilani ye nin pomu ye san mumɛ bɛɛ kɔnɔ, ani pomufiniw suguyaw natili ye tileman waatila. Alimaɲi dumuni jɛniniw camaw la fɛnɛ la, amandiw, nuwazɛtiw ani jiri kolow dɔwɛrɛw b'u cɛla.Gato kodɔnlenw be ta kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala waatidɔw la kosɛbɛ nin kafe fɔrini bɔlini kelen ye. Nin  i be pate fitiniw nka witaminima fɛ, a lajɛ, min depan maarayɔrɔ, nin a wele Berliner, Pfannkuchen wlima Krapfen.
question: Jɔnni tun bɛ fɛ ka Alinaɲi patiseriw dunni dabila?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min ni alɛrizi kolow juguman bɛ ɲɔgɔnna
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ min bɛ dezɛri nafamaw fɛ
mc_answer4: Ksa fɛgɛmani duman ani kasa mɛnta duman kadi mɔgɔ min ye

flores_passage: Nin i be fɛka diɲɛ ye nɔgɔyala, fɛn nafan dɔ kama, balolocogo walima yɛrɛkɔrɔbɔ, cogoya camaw beyi k'o kɛ. Kumafɔlila, u be dɔn kuluw fila kɔnɔ: walima ka baara kɛ nin i be woyase walima a ɲinin ka dansigi i ka waaridɔnta la. Nin sɛbɛn in be sinsin nin laban in kuna. Nin mininw be fɛka jɛn lafiya kɔ, waati ani jateminɛlajɛli ka waaribɔtaw ɲɔnti ka jigi fo fu masurunyala, waari fitini woyasi lajɛ. Ladilikan b'a jigiya ko waoyasikɛlaw mankan suyɛnlikɛ, dansagoli, sendɔn suku kɔnlen dɔ la, delili walima cogoya wɛrɛ la ka min mɔgɔw la u ka nafan kama.
question: Ka da nin tɛmɛnsira in ka, ninnu jumɛn tɛ fɛnyamariyalen ye duguta musaga la?
mc_answer1: Ka baara dɔ sɔrɔ i ka dugutaga senfɛ
mc_answer2: Ka i janto i ka hɛra tuma la
mc_answer4: Ka dɔbɔ dumini ni siyɔrɔ musaga la

flores_passage: Nin i be fɛka diɲɛ ye nɔgɔyala, fɛn nafan dɔ kama, balolocogo walima yɛrɛkɔrɔbɔ, cogoya camaw beyi k'o kɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jɔn tun bɛ seka gɛlɛya sɔrɔ dugutaga waati musaga fitinini ye?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min bɛ gɛlɛya kun bɛ
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ hali waati dɔnni tɛ a bolo
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ min bɛ labɛn kɛ baara kɛli yɔrɔjan fɛ dugutaga senfɛ
mc_answer4: Sira dɔ minnɛni kadi mɔgɔ ye

flores_passage: Sirafurancɛ Point Marion ani Fairmont ni ɲɔgɔncɛ de ye sira boli cogo gɛlɛmaba ye Buffalo-Pittsburgh siraba sanfɛ, nin tɛmɛli ye waaticamana kunkofin sira ye. Nin i ma deli kunkokɔnɔna siraw bolilila, i janto kosɛbɛ: yɛlɛ ka jigi garo garolen, sira fitiniw, ani sirafaran tileninw be fan bɛɛ. Witesi dan tamasiyɛn ka dɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ fanw tɛmɛniw tɔw kan - waaticamana 35-40 kilomɛtiri lɛri kɔnɔ (56-64 kilomɛtiri lɛri kɔnɔ) - ani u batoli kan ka kɛ kɔsɛɛbɛ cogoya ka tɛmɛ alisa tɔw kan. Kabakoko kɔni, nɛgɛjuru sira fagan ka bɔn yan ka sira yɔrɔ tɔw camaw kan, misalila, the Pennsylvania Wilds.
question: Ninnu kumasen jumɛnw tɛ ɲɛfɔli kɛ tigitigi Mariyɔn ni Fairmond sira boli cogo cɛ?
mc_answer1: Sirafurancɛ janw bɛ sɔrɔ jamana yɔrɔjan sira la
mc_answer3: Boli teliya hakɛw sigili ka suma
mc_answer4: Nɛgɛjuru sira baara ma kan ka kɛ basi ye

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, nin jumɛn ka kɛn ka dabɔ yɛrɛyɛrɛ bolimafɛn bolilaw ka boli la Buffalo-Pittsburg siraba kan?

flores_passage: Bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛ (walima bolili kulufulancɛɛ jira sanfɛ) ye ka kulu dugumalara, min be seka ja walima faleno jila. Bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛ be nɔnili, yɛlɛli ani pani fɛnw faraɲɔgɔnkan - nka mako be antirɛneman dɔni na walima forimu walasa ka daminɛ (sumanila nin kulula yɛlɛli ye, jila filili walima kulula siki, misalila).
question: Ninnu jumɛn ma jagoya ka bolili kulufulancɛɛ jira sanfɛ daminɛ?

flores_passage: Bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛ (walima bolili kulufulancɛɛ jira sanfɛ) ye ka kulu dugumalara, min be seka ja walima faleno jila. Bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛ be nɔnili, yɛlɛli ani pani fɛnw faraɲɔgɔnkan - nka mako be antirɛneman dɔni na walima forimu walasa ka daminɛ (sumanila nin kulula yɛlɛli ye, jila filili walima kulula siki, misalila).
question: Ninnu jumɛn bɛ se ka nafa kɛ bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛ boli la?
mc_answer2: Famuyali fɔlɔw sumarɛn ka nɔɔni kan
mc_answer3: Bolili kulufulancɛ jira sanfɛdɔnni bugunatigɛ sɛbɛn

flores_passage: "Ka dɔn i ka mɔbili kɔnɔ ani k'a woyazi sira jan dɔ ta be kɔnɔna nɔgɔya wele. Mɔbili baw kontirɛri, lala i degin neno ala kaban k'i ka mobili boli ani k'a danw dɔ. Tanti sigili wali yɔrɔla walima dugu dɔ kɔnɔ be seka mɔgɔ ɲɛsin i ma nɔgɔyala. Kuma surun na, i ka mɔbili natili ye cogoyaɲuman ye k'a woyazi jan kɛ nka ""kɔlisigili"" ka gɛlɛ. Mobili jɔlensigili be seka kɛ nin mobili kɔnɔfɛrɛlen ba b'i bolo, SUV, Sedan walima Wagon Station nin sigiyɔrɔw minunw be kari."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jumɛn de bɛ seka kɛ dɛmɛ ye mɔgɔ min bɛ ka fɛrɛ kɛ ka to a ka mɔbili kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Famuyaba i ka bolima fɛn danw kan
mc_answer2: Bolimafɛn min sigilanw bɛ se ka t’i bi da
mc_answer4: Wali yɔrɔ dɔ la ka jɔlensigili kɛ

Tanti sigili wali yɔrɔla walima dugu dɔ kɔnɔ be seka mɔgɔ ɲɛsin i ma nɔgɔyala. Kuma surun na, i ka mɔbili natili ye cogoyaɲuman ye k'a woyazi jan kɛ nka ""kɔlisigili"" ka gɛlɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, mobili jɔlensigilibaw bɛ fɛ ka fɛn jumɛn kɔtɛrɛma bɔ nu bɛ k’a ɲini ka to yɔrɔ dɔnnen dɔ la?
mc_answer1: Bolimafɛn belebeleba dɔ bolili, i n'a fɔ SUV dɔ walima mobili kɔnɔfɛrɛlen
mc_answer3: Tanti dɔ turuli dugu kɔnɔ walima wali yɔrɔ dɔ la
mc_answer4: Delinabaliya u ka baarakɛ bolimafɛn na

flores_passage: Casablanca dugu kura jɔla Bɛribɛri jɛgɛminɛnaw fɛ siyɛkili 10 yani Yesu nalicɛ, ani kun natila Phoenecie ka fɛn, Rome mɔgɔw ani Merenids mɔgɔw inafɔ pɔri ɲafan ma min be wele ko Anfa. Portugal mɔgɔw y'o ci ani k'o jɔ duguni nin Casa Branca tɔgɔ, ka ban alan dɔrɔ dugukoloyɛrɛyɛrɛ dɔ kɔfɛ san ba 1755. Maroc masakɛ kun ye tugu in jɔ inafɔ Daru I-badya ani Casablanca tɔgɔ kun dir'a ma Ɛsipaɲɔli ferekɛlaw fɛ minunw kun ye fere kɛ yɔrɔw sigi yen. Casablanca kun ye yɔrɔ nafan ma fitini yɔrɔ ye sanila Maroc kɔnɔ. Medina kɔrɔlen gɛrɛfɛ, a ka nɔgɔ ka yɔrɔ sɔrɔ Maroc ladala fɛnw be fere yɔrɔminan inafɔ sokojalan, bɔgɔdagaw, goloman fɛnw, tabataganinw, ani fɛnw nafandan camaw wɛrɛwn nka a da bɔlen no turisiw kama.

Scotturb bisi 403 be ta tumacamana Sintra, nin jɔli ye Cabo de Roca la. Kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛnɛ, Sanctuary of Lady of Fatima (Alabatoso) ɲumanba lajɛ, yɔrɔ min kodɔnleno diɲɛ fan bɛɛ kada Mari ka bɔliw kan.s

flores_passage: San 1994, Azerbajan maarayɔrɔ Armenie-Nagoro-Karabakh siyakuku ye kɛlɛ tikɛ Azeriw la. Nin Amernie ka jukɔrɔma dɔndɔnli ye, jamana kura dɔ dilana. Nka, jamana jɔlen si, ali Armenie yɛrɛ - ma sɔn k'a kodɔn kɛnɛna. Politiki `mankanw maarayɔrɔ kuna be bek'alisa Armenie ani Azerbajan ka  cɛw cɛn.

flores_passage: Hakilina jɔlen kelen kabɔ Charlotte yɔrɔ, Caroline du Nord, ye ko a nafan ɲuman baw cogoya se denbayaw ma. Yɔrɔ wɛrɛw sigibaw ye du teriya nisondiya fɔ waatidɔw la  inafɔ kun fɔlɔ ka ta yen, ani lajɛlikɛlaw be dugu in lajɛli nisondiya sɔrɔ nin denmisɛniw ye gɛrɛfɛ. San 20 tɛmɛni kɔ, denmisɛni teriya hakɛya cogow Uptown Charlotte kɔnɔ yɛlɛna kɔsɛbɛ kɔsɛbɛ. Takisi be itilize waaticamana duw fɛ Charlotte kɔnɔ, ali na sɔrɔ u nafan be seka kɛ yi siratigɛ dɔw fɛ. Sirisarizi beyi nin a tɛmɛ mɔgɔ fila kan, o la o cogoya in be seka gɛlɛya ka tɛmɛ a nafan kan.

flores_passage: Yani Ɛsipaɲɔliw nali cɛ siyɛkili 16 kɔnɔ, Chilie kɔkɔdugu yanfan kun be Incaw ka mara kɔnɔ tumamina Araucanians sigibaw (Mapuche) kun sigilen Chilie camancɛra ani worodugu yanfan fɛ. Mapuche kun ye fɛnɛ Ameriki sigiden kulu laban yɛrɛ maralaw dɔ ye, min kun ma seka minɛ ka dɔn Ɛpaɲɔli fɔrɔyɔrɔ maraw kɔn fo Chilie ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya talen kɔ. Ali na sɔrɔ Chilie y'a ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya fɔ san 1810 (Napoleon ka kɛlɛw waatila min Ɛsipaɲi to gofɛrɛneman tan san fila kɔnɔ), sebaya jɔnjɔn kun ma seka sɔrɔ Ɛsipaɲɔli sanfɛ fo san 1818.
question: Yani Ɛsipaɲɔliw nali cɛ, Chilie kɔkɔdugu yanfan tun bɛ jɔnni ka mara kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Cinque Terre. min kɔrɔ ye Dugu Duuruw, minunw ye jidala wulakɔnɔna fitini duuruw ye kabɔ Riomaggiore, Manarola, Nernazza ani Monterosso min be Italie Liguria maarayɔrɔla. U tɔgɔ sɛbɛnleno UNESCO Diɲɛ Cɛn lisila. Siyɛkili tɛmɛlenw kɔnɔ, mɔgɔw ye jateminɛlila terasiw jɔw dugukolo jalen ani garonin sanfɛ fo kuluw la min ɲɛsinleno kɔkɔji ma. Nin cɛɲan fan dɔ ye sɔrɔ taɲɛ baliya ye. Siraw, tirɛnw ani batɔnw be wulakɔnɔnaw tukuɲɔgɔna, ani mɔbiliw tɛ sek'u sɔrɔ kabɔ kɔfɛ.

flores_passage: Sirabakasara kosi kodɔnlen baw nɛnɛ fɛ ye sira tɛrɛntɛnlen ye, sena tamasiraw ani kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala tamasiraw. Fitini fɔlila, i mako be samara la nin jo ɲuman ye. Tilema samaraw be tɛrɛntɛn waaticama kosɛbɛ gilasi ani nɛzi sanfɛ, ali nɛnɛ samarabaw dɔw de sɔn. Sira kan ka dunya fitini, milimɛtiri 5 (1/5 puse) walima cama, ani dilanfɛn mankama fitini nɛnɛ waatiw la. Kiranpɔn be samaraba dɔw la ani kiranpɔn farakan dɔ beyi tɛrɛntɛn waatiw la, min ben samaraw ani samarabaw camaw ma, o talɔnw walima talɔnw ani samarajuw. Talɔnw kan ka surunya ani boɲa. Cɛncɛn, bɛlɛ walima kɔkɔ (kiloridi de kalisiyɔmu)be yɛrɛkɛ waatidɔw la gudɔrɔn walima siraw kan walasa ka samali taɲɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, samara suguya jumɛn de kaɲi tɛrɛntɛnni waati cogoyaw la?

question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen tɛ dɛmɛdo walasa ka samali taɲɛ sira gilasi manw kan nɛnɛ waati la?

flores_passage: "Cook Islands ye gun jamana ye min tugulen yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyala Nouvelle Zelande la, be Polynesie, Ocean Pacific worodugu yanfan camancɛla. O ye gun kuluw ye min ye gun 15 ye min yɛrɛkɛleno kɔkɔji sanfɛyɔrɔ kilomɛtirikare 2.2 sanfɛ. Nin waatibɔnda kelen nin Hawai ye, gun ninunw be miri inafɔ ""Hawai tukuma yɔrɔ"". Ali na sɔrɔ a togɔ, a be lajɛkila kɔrɔbalen hakilijigi hawai la yani ka kɛ jamana ye ani yani turusi ɔtɛli ba ani taɲɛ wɛrɛw cɛ. Dugu tɛ Cook Island nka a dilan neno ni gun 15 ye. Gun belebelebaw ye Rarotonga ani Aitutaki ye."
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen bɛ talikɛ tigi tigi Hawaii ni Cook Gun ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ?
mc_answer1: Dunanjigisow baw b'u fila bɛɛ bolo
mc_answer2: Jamanaya jɔyɔrɔ t’u fila si bolo
mc_answer3: U fila bɛɛ bɛ waatibɔnda kelen na

flores_passage: Sɛbɛn kan ka ɲinin ka mara ka kɔn. I kan ka dɔni sɛbɛn sɔrɔ ka su kɛ Sirana kɔnɔ. Sirena ye lakɛli sigiyɔrɔ kelen dɔrɔn de yemin be siyɔrɔ di ani dumuni kalamaw kafara sigili kan. La Leona, San Pedrillo ani Los patos be sigiyɔrɔ dɔrɔn de di nka dumuni tɛyi. Pariki dɔn sɛbɛn be seka minɛkabila jɔna jɔna Ranger Station la Puerto Jimenez kɔnɔ, nka u tɛ sɔn juru karitiw la. Park Service (MINAE) tɛ pariki dɔni sɛbɛn di ka tɛmɛ kalo kelen kan yani nali waaticɛ. CafeNet El Sol be sɛbɛni minɛnikaliba baara kɛ dolari 30 la, walima dolali 10 nin tile kelen sɛbɛn ye; kunafoniw tɔw b'u Corcovado pazi kan.

flores_passage: Sakidɔnkɔla ka siki kɛ: Nin baara in be wele fɛnɛ ko wulakɔnɔ siki, yɔrɔmunu mununi siki walima tama tama siki. A tuguleno nka waatidɔw la te kɛ komi sanfɛyɛlɛli siki cogoya walima kululayɛlɛ, laban ninunw be kɛ sira garo nin kan ani mako sikikɛ samaraw jalen la. I miri siki kɛ sira inafɔ ma surunyala kuluyɛlɛ sira. Cogoya ɲumanw na, i bena seka yɔrɔ camaw boli cogoyala min tɛ tama ye - nka cogoya gɛlɛna i bena seka dugufulancɛ boli siki witɛsi sɔrɔ nin kɔlasaki girin ma tɛ sira dilaniw kan.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, siki nasuku jumɛn bɛ kɛ sira garo nin kan?

flores_passage: Kĩmako kĩa gũcoka gĩukaga bere ya kĩa ũdũire (kĩnyihĩire rũracio), na nĩgĩikaraga na nokĩmũtorie kurĩ kĩa udũire. Athii arĩa makoretwo na ihida rĩhũthũ kuiguana na ũdũire mweru nĩmakoragwo na ihida iritũ makĩingĩranwo na udũire wao rĩngĩ. ũgĩcoka mũciĩ kuma bũrũri wa nja nĩũkoragwo ũmenyerete ũdũire mwerũ na ũgateanĩria maudũ mamwe ma ũdũire waku. Rĩrĩa wathire bũrũri wa nja rĩa bere, adũ nĩmarĩ na wetereri na ũmenyo wa atĩ adũ mathiĩ burũri mwerũ nĩmaagĩrĩirwo kũmenyera maudũ ma bũrũri ũcio mwerũ. Adũ nomage kũmenya atĩ wetereri na ũmenyo nĩũkoragwo wĩ wa bata kũri athii magĩcoka muciĩ
question: Taamaden minnuw bɛ seginyɔrɔnkan jatigɛ sɔrɔ u bɛ ka gɛlɛya sɔrɔ mun kɛli la?
mc_answer1: K’i bɛn yɔrɔ kura danbe ma
mc_answer2: Ka kɛ sabalibaa nin faamubaa ye

flores_passage: Kĩmako kĩa gũcoka gĩukaga bere ya kĩa ũdũire (kĩnyihĩire rũracio), na nĩgĩikaraga na nokĩmũtorie kurĩ kĩa udũire. Athii arĩa makoretwo na ihida rĩhũthũ kuiguana na ũdũire mweru nĩmakoragwo na ihida iritũ makĩingĩranwo na udũire wao rĩngĩ. ũgĩcoka mũciĩ kuma bũrũri wa nja nĩũkoragwo ũmenyerete ũdũire mwerũ na ũgateanĩria maudũ mamwe ma ũdũire waku. Rĩrĩa wathire bũrũri wa nja rĩa bere, adũ nĩmarĩ na wetereri na ũmenyo wa atĩ adũ mathiĩ burũri mwerũ nĩmaagĩrĩirwo kũmenyera maudũ ma bũrũri ũcio mwerũ. Adũ nomage kũmenya atĩ wetereri na ũmenyo nĩũkoragwo wĩ wa bata kũri athii magĩcoka muciĩ
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, seginyɔrɔnkan jatigɛ bɛ sɛn ka kɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la gɛlɛya ye taamaden suguya jɔn ma?
mc_answer1: Taamaden minnu ye gɛlɛya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnw sɔrɔ danbe yɛlɛma kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Taamadenw minnu y’u bɛrɛbɛn teliya la k’u to kɔkansigi la
mc_answer3: Taamaden minnuw bɛ nisɔndiya kɔnɔ halibi inafɔ k’u bɛ kɔɲɔso la
mc_answer4: Taamadenw minnu ka sabali ka dɔgɔn

flores_passage: Minɛn (min dɔnlen fɛnɛ inafɔ minɛn) man fari te dancogola, nka bena u yɛrɛ defan nin u ye farati ye. Nin mɔgɔw ma minɛn ye inafɔ lala farati fɛn, u bena gɛrɛ a la ka damatɛmɛ kosbɛ ani k'u yɛrɛw bila faratila.
question: Ninnu jumɛn tun kɛli ka kan ka toye mɔgɔw fɛ nin minɛn ye?
mc_answer1: Ka kɛ i n'a fɔ u tɛ yen
mc_answer3: K’u ka siran kow hakɛ dɔgɔya

flores_passage: Minɛn (min dɔnlen fɛnɛ inafɔ minɛn) man fari te dancogola, nka bena u yɛrɛ defan nin u ye farati ye. Nin mɔgɔw ma minɛn ye inafɔ lala farati fɛn, u bena gɛrɛ a la ka damatɛmɛ kosbɛ ani k'u yɛrɛw bila faratila.
question: Ka kɛɲɛn ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu mankutu jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye minɛn kan?
mc_answer1: U ye daaba jamannenw ye u dan cogo la
mc_answer2: U tɛ jati waati dɔw la nin farati sɛbɛ ye
mc_answer3: U bɛ sɛn ka muruti nin jama gɛrɛlen ye kojugu
mc_answer4: U bina u yɛrɛ lakana n’a ya kun bɔ

flores_passage: Funteni dɔn la, woyasikɛlaw be seka  hakili wasu wasu ye min bena jira ola ko ji beyi (walima fɛn wɛrɛ). O be seka farati ye nin woyasikɛla be kontiniye ka hakiliwasu wasu ye, fagan ɲumaba cɛnlila ani ji tɔ. Ali dezɛri kalama baw be sumaya tɔntɔn sufɛ. Farikolo tanperatiri jiginle ye farati ba ye nin fani kalama teyi.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira ye, ninnu na jumɛn farati ka dɔgɔn n’a bɛɛ ye dezɛri woyasikɛla ma?
mc_answer1: Funtenima fini tanɲa sufɛ nɛnɛ bɔ don
mc_answer2: Ka hakili wasu wasu ye min bena jira ko ji beyi
mc_answer3: K’i yɛrɛ sɛgɛn fu hakili wasu wasu ɲininni la
mc_answer4: Ka ji tiɲɛn fu hakili wasu wasu ɲininni la

question: Ninnu jumɛn ma kofɔ inafɔ farati sɛbɛ don dezɛri woyasikɛlaw ma?

flores_passage: Republic ya Dominica (Spanish: Republica Dominicana) ni bũrũri wa Caribbean ũrĩa ũkoragwo nuthu-inĩ ya irathĩro island ya Hispaniola, mahakanite na Haiti. Thengĩa icua cia mĩthanga mierũ na mĩarĩro ya ĩrĩma, bũrũri ũcio warĩ mũciĩ kũrĩ athũngũ arĩa a tene mũno Amerika, ĩrĩa rĩu rĩ thĩinĩ wa Santa Domingo Island  ĩyo yaikarĩtwo nĩ mĩhĩrĩga ya Ataino na Akaribe. Akaribe marĩ adũ maaragia mwario wa Arawakan arĩa makinyĩte kũu ĩhida rĩa 10,000 BCE Thĩinĩ wa mĩaka mĩnini kuuma gũkinya kwa mũthũngũ mũguturi, ũingĩ wa andũ wa mũhĩrĩga wa Atiaino nĩwanyihĩtio mũno nĩ Aspania atahi Kũringana na Fray Bartolomé las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) gatagatĩ ka mwaka wa 1492 na 1498 atahi a Spain nĩmoragĩte andũ ta 100,000 rũrĩrĩ-inĩ rwa Ataino.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, jamakulu jumɛn mɔgɔw tun ye gɛlɛya caman sɔrɔ ka tɛmɛ jama wɛrɛw kan tubabu sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛlaw nali kɔ?

question: Ka kɛɲɛn ni tɛmɛsira in ye, Kan jumɛn tun bɛ fɔ Caribes fɛ?

flores_passage: "Kuluduguma nɛzifarikoloɲɛnɛjɛw, minunw ye siki ani nɛzi sanfɛ pani ye, ye farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ kodɔnlen min ye fili ye ka jigi nɛzi man yɔrɔ fɛ nin siki ye walima nin nɛzikuna jiri ye min sirileno i senw na. Siki ye woyazi baara ba dɔ ye nin mɔgɔ ɛntereseni baw ye, waatidɔw la min kodɔnleno inafɔ ""siki kɛba jɔnjɔnw"", minunw b'u ka konze boloda ka ben siki ma yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen dɔla. Siki kɛli hakilina ye hakilina kɔrɔlen ba ye - desɛnw kuluw sanfɛ minunw be sikikɛla desɛn be ta fo san 5000 yan Yesu nali cɛ. Kuluduguma siki inafɔ o farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ be sekɔ ka ta fo siyɛkili 17 na, ani san 1861 kɔnɔ siki tulɔnkɛyɔrɔ fɔlɔ da yɛlɛla Norvege jamanaden dɔw fɛ Ɔsitirali kɔnɔ."
question: Jɔnnin bɛ sɛn lakodɔn nin mɔgɔw ladɔnniyali ye siki la ko farikolo ɲɛnajɛlan don?

question: Ka kɛɲɛn ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ka gɛrɛ waati jumɛn na siki lakodɔnna fɔlɔfɔlɔ inafɔ farikolo ɲɛnajɛ?

flores_passage: Farafina Kɔrɔn yanfan gunw be Ocean Indien kɔnɔ Farafina kɔrɔn yanfan dugukolo kɔfɛ. Magasikari ye ula belebele ba ye, ani a dama tɔgɔla kɔntinan ye nin na kɛra kunkokɔnɔ siratigɛ fɛ. Gun fitiniw camaw ye yɛrɛmahɔrɔn jamanaw ye, walima tugulen Faransi la, ani kodɔnlen no inafɔ kɔkɔjida ɲɛmanbaw yɔrɔw. Arabu ye Silamɛya na fɛnɛ gun ninunw na, ani a tara siraba fɛ Comore ani Moyotte kɔnɔ. Ɛrɔpu mɔgɔ ka se ani jagoyafaganmarali daminɛ siyɛkili 15 la, waatimina Portugal ɲɛɲininkɛla Vasco de gama ye Cape Route sira ye kabɔ Erɔpu ka ta Inde.
question: Ninnu jumɛn cogoya tugulen bɛ gun bɛɛ la belebele la Farafinna gun kɔrɔnfɛla fɛ?

question: Mun tɛ farafinna gun kɔrɔnfɛla gun dɔgɔmanw taamasiyɛn ye?
mc_answer4: Yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya sɔrɔ ka bɔ jamana wɛrɛw bolo

flores_passage: Ladala dɔ beyi ka Paki su si ka bɔtɔla lajɛ. Awɔ Kiretiyɛn ya dinɛ ɲɛfɔliw beyi nin lada in kan, nka o be seka kɛ fɛnɛ ka kon Kiretiyɛnya nali pirɛntan ani ɲɛli sarakabɔ ye. Ladala egiliziw camaw waatidɔw la be Paki Susili kɛ sibiri sufɛ Paki dɔgɔkun kɔnɔ, nin dinɛ kuluw ka Yesu ɲɛnɛmayali kura fɛteliye minuwi waati mana se.
question: Ka kɛɲɛn ni tɛmɛsira in ye, pakiseli bɛ kɛ cogo di kerecɛn laadala kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen tigi alabatoso dɔw bolo?
mc_answer3: Ka tilema ɲɛnajɛ labɛn kerecɛn jama ye

flores_passage: Equateur b'a jagoya Cuba dugudenw ka weleli sɛbɛn sɔrɔ yani u ka dɔn Equateur kɔnɔ diɲɛ ayeropɔriw fɛ walima duguma siraw danw fɛ. O sɛbɛn in kan ka legalize Equateur Kɔfɛ Ko Ɲɛnɛbɔba Minisiriso fɛ, ani be tugu fɛn dɔw la. U jagoya fɛnw ninunw dabɔra ka taka seginw dilan senkan jamana fila ni ɲɔgɔncɛ. Cuba jamanadenw Ameriki Green Card be minunw bolo kan ka tagabɔ Equateur lasigidenso la walasa ka jɛn  sɔrɔ  kabɔ nin laɲini in ma. I ka pasipɔri kan ka da,ga kalo 6 ka tɛmɛ i ka woyazi waatiw kan. Tani ka segin/tali tike mako beyi k'i ka toli janya jira pirewu jira.
question: Ka sɛn k’i fɔrin sariya dɔw kɔrɔ i dontɔla Ecuador, mun fɔlɔ ka Kan ka kɛ Cuba sigiden bolo?
mc_answer1: Jamana kɔnɔdon sɛbɛn ɲuman kalo 6 kɔnɔ taama donw kɔfɛ
mc_answer3: Taanikasegin taama sɛbɛn mun bɛ taama janya jira

question: Ecuador taama sariyaw ma labɛn mun kama?
mc_answer3: Ka taamadenw ka taama janya sɛmɛntiya
mc_answer4: K’i hakililatigɛ jamana donni sɛbɛnw numanya kan

flores_passage: Lunɛtiw sɔkɔn be seka nɔgɔya kofɛ jamana dɔ kɔnɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala jamana minunw kɔnɔ sɔrɔ ka dɔgɔ yɔrɔ minunw na baarakɛ waari ka nɔgɔ. A jateminɛ ka ɲɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛliw kɛ i ka jamana la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala nin asiransi b'a ta, ani nan'i ka ɔridiansi ye i fɛ fan bɛɛ la. Kunbalan fila be ariki tɔgɔbaw minunw be sɔrɔ yɔrɔ sugu ninunw la; o dɔw be seka ladegi ye, ani ɲuman ɲuman `minunw bena kabɔ kɔfɛ daka gɛlɛ lala ka tɛmɛ jamana kɔnɔ taw kan.
question: Ninnu na jumɛn sɔngɔ bɛ caya walijamanakɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ faso Kan?

question: Mun bɛ sɛn ka na nin nunɛti kala dakabana sannin ye yɛrɛyɛrɛ walijamana kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ɲɛkili sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ bɛ sɔn ka wajibiya
mc_answer2: Furasansɛbɛn tɛna sɔn ka bɛn nunɛti kala dɔw ma
mc_answer3: U bɛ sɔn ka kɛ ladegen ye
mc_answer4: A bɛ sɛn ka kɛ asuransi tɛna jɔ musaka kɔrɔ

flores_passage: Falklands dugu waari ye Falkland pound ye (FKP) min walɛri tugulen no British pound walɛrila (GBP). Waari be seka falen banki kelen dɔrɔn de la gunw kɔnɔ min be Stanley kɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ kabɔ FIC West butiki kɔnɔ. British pounds bena minɛ waaticamana gunw fanw bɛɛ la ani kɔnɔ Stanley juru kariti ani Lameriki dolari fɛnɛ be minɛ waatidɔw la. Gɛrɛfɛ gunw la, a be seka kɛ juru kariti tɛna minɛ, ali na sɔrɔ Grande Bretagne ani Lameriki waari be seka minɛ lala; a ɲɛnini nin o tigiw fɔlɔ ka dɔn warisara cogoya in dangalen no. A ka gɛlɛ ka Falklands waari falen gunw kɔfɛ, ola waari falen yani ka bɔ gunw kɔnɔ.
question: ka tali kɛ nin wari labaara ye Falklands, mankutu jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Warita karati nin angilɛ liwuru dɔrɔn bɛ minɛ kɔfɛ gunw kan
mc_answer2: Stanley yɔrɔ dɔrɔn dɛ bɛna lamerikɛn dolari minɛ
mc_answer3: Falkland pounds ka kan ka falen i kɛlen kɔ ka gun bila
mc_answer4: Falkland pound bɔlen a la, British pound y wari ye sɔn kɛlen do min na kosɛbɛ

flores_passage: Tanpuluw camaw be San Fɛti kɛ ka daminɛ Nowanburukalo laban na ka ta bila Mɛkalo camancɛ la, min be falen ka da tanpulu kelen kelena bɛɛ ka waatijateminɛcogola. Tanpulu camaw ka fɛtiw be kɛ inafɔ tanpulu ka aniwɛrisɛri walima Maa dɔ bangeli o kumu kɔnɔ walima tulɔnbaaraw wɛrɛw minw tugulen tanpulula. Keraa tanpulu fɛtiw lajɛli nafan ka bɔn, nin sama masirili, tanpulu fɔlikɛɛlaw ani nisondiyawɛrɛw.

question: Sama masirilenw bɛ ye yɔrɔ jumɛn?
mc_answer1: Yɔrɔ bɛɛ ka daminɛ Nowanburukalo laban na ka ta bila Mɛ kalo camancɛ la
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔw ni bagan ɲɔgɔn nɔfɛ Tanpulu fɛtuw la

flores_passage: Njĩra ya mbere ya kũũmbũka na dege first kana business class nĩ kũhũthĩra beca nyĩngĩ (ona kana wega makĩrĩa ũrĩhĩrwo nĩ kabuni yaku). No marĩhi maya timanini. Nowĩkore ũkĩrĩhio nginya maita mana ma marĩhi ma kawaida ma economy thĩinĩ wa business class na ngina maita ikũmi na ĩmwe thĩinĩ wa first class! Na njĩra ndaya, hatirĩ bata wa kwenda kũnyihĩrio marĩhi ma itĩ cia business kana first class ũkiuma A nginya B Kabuni cia ndege nĩciũĩ ni kũrĩ andũ meharĩirie kũrĩha mbeca nyingĩ nigetha mathiĩ ihenya na mwĩgangaro, na makarĩhia ũrĩa kwagĩrĩire.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nin fɛn kelen jumɛn ye fɛɛrɛ bɛɛ la ɲuman ye walasa ka wari bɔ ta dɔgɔya pankurun business class sigiyɔrɔw walima first class sigiyɔrɔ la?
mc_answer1: Ka wari sara i ka cakɛda ka sira fɛ
mc_answer2: Ka first class tike mara sanni i k’a kɛ business class ta ye
mc_answer3: Ka first class tike mara pankurun na min tɛ tile a taayɔrɔ la

flores_passage: Pankurusow inafɔ Emirates, Etihad, Airways, Quatar Airways and Turkish Airways y'u ka sɛriwisiw bɔɲa kosɛbɛ ka ɲɛsin Farafina ma, ani be tuguliw kɛ ka ta Farafina dugu baw la nin piri nɔgɔmaniw ye ka tɛmɛ Erɔpu pankurusow kan. Turkish Airlines be ta yɔrɔ 39 de la Farafina duguw 30 kɔnɔ inafɔ san 2014. Nin woyasi waati wɛrɛ b'i bolo, a ɲinin ka lajɛ cogomina i ka tike waari faralenɲɔgɔn kan ka ta Farafina be suma nin diɲɛɛ turu kɛli tike waariw ye. Kana ɲina ka wiza waari fara depansi wɛrɛ kan, tali takisi, tuma tiransipɔri, dɔ wɛrɛ nin yɔrɔ ninunw bɛɛla Farafina kɔfɛ.
question: Mun de man kan ka jate ni tike wari faralen ɲɔgɔnkan ka taa farafinna n’o bɛ suma ni diɲɛ tuuru kɛli tike wari ye?
mc_answer1: Farankan wiza wari ka ta yɔrɔ minnu bɛ Farafinna kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Tuma taransipɔri ka ta yɔrɔ minnu bɛ Farifinna kɔfɛ

flores_passage: Dumuni sani sipɛrimarisela ye waaticama sira nɔgɔma ka balo. Nin tobili ɲɛ tɛka sɔrɔ, o la sugandili dan ye dumuni dilaninw ka ban. Taɲɛkumana, sipɛrimarisew be seka dumuni dilaninw ka ban yɔrɔ camaw bila sekan. Dɔw b'ali furudeni walima cogoya wɛrɛw ka dumuni kalaya di. Dugu walima butiki dɔw la, dumuni kɛyɔrɔ kelen dɔ be sɔrɔyi, waatidɔw la kodɔnbali dɔ sariya siratigɛ piri danɔgɔla,

flores_passage: Faransɛ suguyaw  minunw be fɔ Belgique kɔnɔ ani Suisse danbɔnleno cogoya fitinila faransɛ min be fɔ Faransi kɔnɔ, ali n'u ka surun ɲɔgɔna fitini famuyalila. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, jate cogoya Belgique faransɛ la ani Suisse ta danfara bɔleno Faransi t'a la dɔni, ani daɲɛ dɔw fɔli tɛ kelen ye dɔni. Nka, Belgique ani Suisse faransɛfɔlaw bena seka faransɛ nɔrɔmali kalan kalansola, ola u bena sek'i famuya ali nin i ye faransɛ nɔrɔmali jate cogoya itilize.
question: Nin fɛn juman kelen tɛ se ka famuya Belgique ani Suise faranfɛsɔlaw?
mc_answer4: Faransɛ fanba min bɛ fɔ Faransi

flores_passage: Pankuruso dama damaniw dɔrɔn be alisa sudɔnli waari di, min be dɔni dɔrɔn bɔ teliya sudɔnli woyasila waari la. Pankurusow minunw ni kɛ ye Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa nin pankuru woyasiw minunw kabɔ Ameriki walima Canada ani WestJet. Cogoya bɛɛ la, i kan ka tike maralikɛ dirɛkiteman nin pankuruso ye u ka nɛgɛjuru sifa fɛ.

mc_answer3: N’i bɛ ka ta Lufthansa pankuruso fɛ ka bɔ Paris ka ta Ameriki
mc_answer4: Ni bɛ ka ta Delta pankurunso fɛ

flores_passage: Yɔrɔɲinin apilikasiyɔn itilizeli i ka telefɔnila be seka kɛ sira nɔgɔmani ani lafiyalen b ye ka yala tumamina nin t'i ka jamana kɔnɔ. A be seka t'i be waari mara nin kariti sani ye GPS kama, walima GPS jɔlen a yɛrɛ ye walima kelen luweli mɔbili luwe baarakɛɛda dɔ fɛ. Nin ɛntɛrɛnɛti kiredi t'i kun telefɔnila, walima nin a tɛ sɔn o yɔrɔla, u ka baarakaɲɛ be ka dɔgɔya walima tɛ sɔrɔ.
question: Waati juman GPS jɔlen a yɛrɛ ye o utilizeli bɛ se ka kɛ sira lafiyalen ye ka tɛmɛ yɔrɔɲini GPS apilikasiyɔn kan?
mc_answer1: Waati min ’i bɛ ka lajɛ ka wari mara
mc_answer2: Waati min i dan b’a la ko ɛntɛrinɛti keredi bɛ na k’i kun
mc_answer3: Waati ti min i bɛ talen yɔrɔ la a tɛ sɔn yɔrɔ min
mc_answer4: Waati min i tɛ fɛ ka baara masin dɔ luwanse

mc_answer4: Mako jɔbaliya kariti kura sani na

flores_passage: Galapagos nin yɔrɔw ani kunkow yeli kaɲi ka tɛmɛ batɔn de la, cogomina inafɔ Charles darwin y'a kɛ cogomina san 1835 kɔnɔ. Lajɛlikɛbatɔn min ka nin 60 ye de be boli Galapagos jiw kan - k'o boɲan daminɛ mɔgɔ 8 ka ta bila mɔgɔ 100 talila. Mɔgɔ camaw b'u sigiyɔrɔ minɛ ka bila waatijan ka bila (Komi batɔnw falen be kɛ waaticamana lajɛli gani waatila). I d'ala k'i be i tike ta baarakɛla min fɛ ye Galapagos dɔnba jɔnjɔn ye nin batɔn suguya camaw dɔniya ye. O b'a to i be fɛla kɛrɛnkɛrɛnew  ani/walima balinaw be ta nin batɔnw ye minunw b'o jateminɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye,cogoya juman na i bɛ se ka danganiya sɔrɔ k’i bɛnna batɔn hakika ma?
mc_answer1: Ka kulu dɔ tike lamara taamaden 8+ walima u kan ka can n’o ye o bɛ min kɔnɔ wa minnu ka laɲiniw ka surun ɲɔgɔn na
mc_answer2: Ka lamarali kɛ sɔngɔ ka nɔgɔn waati min
mc_answer3: Ka lamarali kɛ baarakɛla dɔ fɛ min ye Galapagos woyasi ɲɛdɔnba ye

flores_passage: Kazonow be baara camaw kɛ walasa ka dunanw ka waati ani waari cama sɔrɔ. Finɛtiriw ani monturu tɛyi waatcamanan ani bɔ wɔrɔw yeli be seka gɛlɛya Dumuniw, minfɛnw ani tulɔnw kɛrɛnkɛrɛniw b'u bolo ka dunanw marakato nisondiyala ani k'u minɛkato u ka yɔrɔ la. Yɔrɔ dɔw be minfɛnw alikɔliman di yɔrɔla. Nka, gulɔminkojuguya be halikilina sɛgɛsɛgɛli wasu wasu, ani zuyekɛla baw bɛɛ be hakilidafalen nafan dɔ.

flores_passage: Tɔgɔw bɛɛ, nin Sie daɲɛ ye i fɛ, be daminɛ waatibɛla nin Siginiden kunba ye, ali nin kumasen camancɛla. O ye sira ɲuman ye ka waleyakɛlanw ani tɔgɔmankuntulanw danfarabɔ ɲɔgɔna. Nka, Malaisie kɔnɔ, kɔni malɛw cɛla burusi kɔnɔnaw la, o kɔrɔ ye ""na yan"" ka surun digɛndɛnɛ deni naanina kuruli kana farikolo fanfɛ, wale min be nati Ɛrɔpu jamana dɔw kɔn, ani kan ka itilize o kun dɔrɔn de kama. Surunyakumala, Grande Bretagne woyasikɛlaw  Ɛsipaɲi kɔnɔ be seka fili tikɛwili kanbɛn miny tikɛkɔnɔna silinye folibama (ka tɛmɛ tikɛ beka wili mɔgɔ mina) inafɔ seginli waleya."

flores_passage: Gilasi kuluw jɔlen tɛ kaɲɛ, nka be wolowolo ka jigin kulu fɛ. U bena karilidaw nati, gilasisanflacili, min be sekana dɔgɔ nin gilasikuru pɔnan manw ye. Kuluwo gilasi kokow ani sanfɛlaw be seka ben ani karilidaw be seka datugu. Gilasikuru bele beleba sanfɛlala be ci fitini, ka ben ani lala ka pan walima ka kɔnlɔnkɔnlɔn yɔrɔjan kabɔ sanfɛlala.

flores_passage: Goma nĩ itũra rĩa atarii rĩa Democratic Republic of Congo rĩrĩa rĩhakanĩte na Rwanda mwena wa itherero. Mwakainĩ wa 2002 Goma niyaanangirwo nĩ lava kuuma kĩrĩma kĩa Nyiragongo ĩ rĩa yathikire matũra maingĩ ma town ĩ yo, mũno Town centre. OOna Goma rĩ itũra rĩ thayũ, icera orĩothe nja wa Goma nĩrĩagĩrĩirwo gũthuthurio kũmenywo haro ĩrĩa ĩkoretwo gĩtarũ kĩa North Kivu ĩikaire atĩa. Itũũra rĩu norĩo rĩarĩ ihabĩro rĩa volcano ya Nyiragongo hamwe na imwe ya thabarĩ cia kuona Gorilla cia kĩrĩma-inĩ iria nĩcia raithi mũno gĩkĩro kĩa Africa. Noũhũthĩre boda-boda (duthi) gũthiũrũrũka Goma. Marĩhi ma (kawaida) nĩ 500 Congolese Francs gucerio handu hanini.
question: Ka da ni temɛsira in ye, taamadenw ka kan jantoyɛrɛla wɛrɛw ta ka kɔn yɔrɔ jumɛn lajɛli?

mc_answer3: Moto takisiw ye fɛrɛ ɲuman ye ka s’i seyɔrɔ la

flores_passage: Camping oyothe rungu wa rim ya Grand Canyon nĩĩrabatara marũa ma backcountry. Marua cinyihagĩo kũgitĩra Canyon na cionekaga kuma mũthenya wa 1 wa mweri, mĩeri ĩna mbere ya mweri wa kwanjia. Nĩkĩo marũa ma backcountry mweri-inĩ wa gatano monekanaga mweri ĩmwe mweri-inĩ wa mũgaa. Nabaathi cia matũra marĩa moĩkaine, ta Bright Angel Campground ĩrĩa ĩ hakanĩtie na Phantom Ranch, ihũragio nĩ mahoya ma mũthenya wa mbere kũhingũrwo. Kwĩna marũa nini cĩa kũingĩra na magũrũ ĩrĩa ciheanagwo kũrĩ a mbere gũkinya.
question: Waati jumɛn n’a dugukɔfɛ b’a yamaruya tile daminɛna Utikalo kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Camping oyothe rungu wa rim ya Grand Canyon nĩĩrabatara marũa ma backcountry. Marua cinyihagĩo kũgitĩra Canyon na cionekaga kuma mũthenya wa 1 wa mweri, mĩeri ĩna mbere ya mweri wa kwanjia. Nĩkĩo marũa ma backcountry mweri-inĩ wa gatano monekanaga mweri ĩmwe mweri-inĩ wa mũgaa. Nabaathi cia matũra marĩa moĩkaine, ta Bright Angel Campground ĩrĩa ĩ hakanĩtie na Phantom Ranch, ihũragio nĩ mahoya ma mũthenya wa mbere kũhingũrwo. Kwĩna marũa nini cĩa kũingĩra na magũrũ ĩrĩa ciheanagwo kũrĩ a mbere gũkinya.
question: Labɛn jumɛn be sena Kaniɲɔn lakanan na?
mc_answer1: Sariya min bi mɔgɔ fɔlɔ nalenw mako dilali yamaruya
mc_answer3: Yamaruyaw bi se ka sɔrɔ taama laɲiniw senfɛ

flores_passage: Tiɲɛ be otɛli dɔw bolo kabɔ sisi tirɛnbolisiraw ani mɔgɔtabatɔnw waati dɔn ma na; yani Diɲɛ Kɛlɛba filana cɛ, siyɛkili 19 ani siyɛkili 20 daminɛna. Nin otɛliw kun ye yɔrɔ ye famaw ani mɔgɔ kodɔnlenw kun jigin yɔrɔmina ani kun be waatidɔw la sura ɲuman dɔn walima sufɛgitan kɛ. Ɛnsitalasiyɔn kɔ kɔrɔw, ekipeman labanw tanya ani kɔrɔli suguya dɔ y'u kɛcogo ye. Ali na sɔrɔ waaticamana u be ta mɔgɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛniw fɛ, u be kɛ waatidɔw la jamana ɲɛmɔgɔw walima mɔgɔba wɛrɛw jiginyɔrɔ ye. Woyazikɛla min be yala nin waari mugu ye be seka diɲɛ turu kelen jateminɛ, min tilaneno jɔyɔrɔ fitiniw cɛ nin otɛliw camaw na.
question: Ninnu jumɛn de b’inafɔ sɔrɔli ka dɔgɔ ninnu dunanjigisow nasugu minnu ɲɛfɔlendon ni tɛmɛsiran in na?
mc_answer3: Tɔɲɔgɔn dunanw minnu dɔn bɛ ka ɲɛn walima lakodɔnnen
mc_answer4: So labɛnnenw sisannen ni labɛn minɛ kuraw ye

mc_answer3: Sufɛ ɲanajɛ kɛli ɲanajɛli kɛyɔrɔla dunanjigiso la

flores_passage: "Nin kɔkɔjiduguma ɛntɛrɛnɛti filijuruw ye, fili dugulen Erɔpula ani satelitibaw la, Greenland tugulen na kaɲɛ nin u yɔrɔ mɔgɔ 93 kɛmɛ sarala akisɛsɔrɔli ɛntɛrɛnɛti la. I ka otɛli walima jiginyɔrɔ (Nin be ka to dunajiginso kɔnɔ walima yɛrɛtɔgɔla so) bena seka lala wifi walima ɔridinatɛri konɛkitenin sɔrɔ, abi ɛntɛrɛnɛti sɔrɔ bɔn be sigida bɛɛ la walima jamana wifi yɔrɔ dɔw la. Ota ũria hekũgwetetwo hau kabere, ona korwo kiugo ""Eskimo"" nĩgĩtĩkĩrĩtwo bũrũrinĩ wa United States, nĩgĩkuagwo rĩnaihũthia kũrĩ andũ a Arctic arĩa matarĩ a bũrũri wa U.S, mũno mũno Canada. Ona waigua kiugo kĩu gĩkĩhũthĩrwo nĩ aikari a Greenland, ũhũthĩrĩ wa kĩo niwagĩirwo gũithemwo nĩ oki. Aikari ambere a Greenland meĩtaga Inuit bũrũrinĩ wa Canada na Kalaalleq (uingĩ kalaallit) Greenlander thĩini wa Greenland. Fagali ani nkɛniɲɛ juguya ka ɲɛsin dunanw ma bakurubafɔlila, ma dɔn fɔlɔ Greenland kɔnɔ. Ali duguw kɔɔnɔ, ""yɔrɔ jugumaw"" foyi si tey. Nɛnɛ waati de ye lala farati yɛrɛ yɛrɛ min bena mɔgɔ labɛnlen baliw sɛgɛn. Nin i be Greeland lajɛ nɛnɛ waatiw la (Jateminɛna i be ka kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛ cogomina, nɛnɛ be juguya o cogo kelen na), a nafan ka bɔn kana ni fini futeni dama damaniw ye. Tile janba tilema fɛ be seka sunɔkɔbaliya kaɲɛ kunbalan nati ani kɛnɛya kunbalanw. Tilema waatila, janto fɛnɛ Nordique sosow la. Ali na sɔrɔ u tɛ bana foyisi yɛlɛma, u be seka tɔrɔlikɛ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun de ma kan ka kɛ Greenland lajɛli taamakɛlaw fɛ?
mc_answer1: Yɔrɔ minnu dɔnnen do kosɔbɛ kojugu kɛ la ka caya
mc_answer2: Fini girinmanw nali i fɛ, inafɔ waati ka kala tuma cama san kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Ka laɲini ka bara kɛ k’i to ye, sabula kɔnɛkisiyɔn faga bi se ka yɛlɛ ka jigi

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn b’inafɔ gɛlɛya Greenland lajɛli taamakɛla labɛnbaliw fɛ?

flores_passage: Jardin de la Union. Nin yɔrɔ in dilana inafɔ masabɔndayɛlɛlen siyɛkili 17 dine yɔrɔ fɛ, minunw na Templo de San Diego kelen dɔrɔn de ye so balolen ye. A be baara bibi in na inafɔ jamankafoyɔrɔ, ani fɛn dɔ be ka kɛ yi waatibɛɛla, su ni tile. Dumuni kɛyɔrɔ dama damaniw be zariden gɛrɛfɛlara, ani tileganiw fɛ ani sufɛ konsɛriw fulama be kɛ yi kabɔ Central Gazebo fɛ. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Balokɔn fila tilanlen nin santimɛtiri 69 ye kanu mɔgɔ kɔrɔ do ka so ye. Nin waariminsɛni dama damani ye, denmisɛni dɔw bena tariku f'i ye.
question: Ninnu jumɛn bi ka labaara sisan inafɔ jamankafoyɔrɔ?
