question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn ma sɔrɔ Jardín de la Unión kɔnɔ?
mc_answer2: Kanu kɔrɔ baabu be so min kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Nakɔ min ɲɛsinnen do dumunikɛyɔrɔ ma

flores_passage: Tama yɛlɛ ye kɛrɛma farikoloɲɛjɛ ye min ye ka tama kunkokɔnɔnaw la, waatidɔw la tama wotorow kɔnɔ. Tilefɛtama ye kilomɛtiri kelen walima min ka jan nin o ye yɔrɔw tamaw min be seka tama dile kelen kɔnɔ. Tile tama sira ɲɔgɔn ma gɛrɛfɛ mako labɛniw dɔni na, ani mɔgɔ min galabu ka kɛnɛ hakɛyala be sek'o kɛ nisondiyala. Denbayaw nin den fitiniw ye mako be lala labɛn camaw la, nka tile kelen kɛrɛma ɲɛnɛjɛbaaraw be seka kɛ nɔgɔyala ali nin denw ye ani denmisɛni minunw be zariden na.
question: Ka da ni sɛbɛn nin ye, ninnu kumasenw jumɛn tilefɛtaama kan bɛ se ka jate jɛlenbaliya fɛ?
mc_answer1: Labɛn dɔnni laɲininnendo tilefɛtaama na sira nɔgɔmaw kan
mc_answer2: Janyaw bi yɛlɛma, nka u ka kan ka bɛɛ taama tile kelen kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ min galabu ka kɛnɛ hakɛyala a ka c’a la olu kan ni wale diyabɔ
mc_answer4: Tilefɛtaama tɛ kɛnɛma wale ɲuman ye denbayaw minw bɛ nin den denyɛrɛninw ye

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, yɔrɔ jumɛnna be labɛn dɔnnin layini tilefɛtaama na?
mc_answer1: Na bɛ talikɛ taamakɛla galabu bɛ labɛnna
mc_answer2: Na bɛ talikɛ sira nɔgɔman na
mc_answer3: Na sɔrɔ denmisɛnw bi ta taama na
mc_answer4: Na sɔrɔ taama bi kɛ kunkokɔnɔnaw l

flores_passage: "Kuludigɛnw yɛlɛmali ka kɛ jidigɛnw ye ani kuludigɛnw ye Norŋege cogoya ye minunw balila sira di kulujan dɔw, bɔɲɔgɔngo dɔ ma. Nin kulu janw be jira waatidɔw la inafɔ ""Vidde"" min kɔrɔ ye jiridan yɔrɔ kɛnɛjɛ bele beleba, dan tɛ yɔrɔmina. Rogaland ani Agder kɔnɔ, u be wele waaticama ko ""hei"" min kɔrɔ ye ko filemayɔrɔ jididan min datugulen dɔn waatidɔw la nin biriyɛri ye."
question: Mun de bɛ Rogaland walima Agder kulujanw danfara ka bɔ Nɔriwɛzi ta tɔw ma?
mc_answer4: A datugulendo waatidɔw la nin biriyɛri ye

flores_passage: Kulumayɔrɔ sɔw lajɛli waati be yɛlɛ waaticamana Inde tilema waatila. Nka u cɛɲanw ani samalikɛlan tɛ kelenye nɛnɛ waatila, nin kulumayɔrɔsow camaw kɛniye ka nɛzi ɲuman baw sɔrɔ ani farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ bilale senkan inafɔ siki and nɛzisanfɛpani.
question: Waati jumɛn turisiw tun b’u mako don siki lajɛlila kulumayɔrɔw la?

flores_passage: Kulumayɔrɔ sɔw lajɛli waati be yɛlɛ waaticamana Inde tilema waatila. Nka u cɛɲanw ani samalikɛlan tɛ kelenye nɛnɛ waatila, nin kulumayɔrɔsow camaw kɛniye ka nɛzi ɲuman baw sɔrɔ ani farikoloɲɛnɛjɛ bilale senkan inafɔ siki and nɛzisanfɛpani.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, turisiw ka ca waati jumɛn kosɔbɛ kulumayɔrɔ la?

flores_passage: D'ala kafɔ ko waatimina nin batɔn jɔ yɔrɔw la fɛn bɛɛ bena jɛya kaɲɛ kosɛbɛ. I bena batɔn ɲinin na wɛrɛw ben ani u bena u ka kuanfoni d'ima. Fitinifɔlila, i bena kunafoni bila dɛmɛdilila, nin dɔnisarize yɔrɔ tamali, gɛlɛrila mɔgɔw la k'u ka yaciw jɔsi, kumaɲininlila mɔgɔw jisanfɛ baarakɛlaw fɛ minɛnfɛn miriyɔrɔla, dɔ wɛrɛ. A ɲinin ka kuma mɔgɔ camaw fɛ nin o be seka kɛ. Waati fitiniw tɛmɛni kɔfɛ bɛɛ bi n'i dɔn ani bena kunafonow d'ima batɔn minunw be mɔgɔ ɲinina kuna.
question: I man kan ka mun kɛ ni bi ka dɛmɛn ɲini bato fɛ?
mc_answer1: Ka taama ka ta ka segin dɔnisarize yɔrɔw la
mc_answer4: K’i tɔɲɔngɔ bato ɲinin na ye k’u to yi

flores_passage: Hong Kong Gun be Hong Kong marayɔrɔ tɔkɔ di ama ani ye yɔrɔ ye turusiw camaw be min lajɛ inafɔ sinsin nan yɛrɛ. Sojanw jɔlen ɲɔgɔnkɔ min be Hong Kong sanfɛla dilan sumana nin nɛgɛbari yɛlɛman dɔ ye min dilan neno nin Harbour Victoria jiw ka kɛli ye. Nin be fɛka Hong Kong lajɛli ɲuman ba kɛ, gun bila ani ɲɛsin Kowloon jibolo min ɲɛsinleno a ma. Hong Kong dugu fan baw yɔrɔ dilan ne faraleno ɲɔgɔnkan cogoyala dugukolo ɲininlen kan jidala. O ye yɔrɔ ye kolonizatɛri biritanikiw kun ye min ta inafɔ ou ta ani ola nin i bɛka pirewu ɲinin o yɔrɔ kunu kan kolonizasiyɔn waatila, nin ye yɔrɔ ɲuman ba ye ka daminɛ.

flores_passage: Sendalanw ye dɛmɛnan ye sobolila senw ma min be gulɔn sigilan fan kelen dɔ la. U be sitabilite ba di sobolilikɛla ma nka be seka lakana kunbala nati ko sababu kɛ sobolila senw be ka balan u la. Nin sobolila fili kabɔ so sanfɛ nak sen balanleno sendalan na, u be sekana fofo duguma nin so bolila. K'o farati dɔgɔya, lakana cogoya camaw be seka ta. Fɔlɔfɔlɔ, sobolila kura be soboli samara talɔn ma dɔn ani dugumala fɛkɛman ani fitinini. Nata, sosigilan dɔw beyi, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala Angilɛ sigilanw, lakana nɛgɛw bato sendala be ben kabɔ sosigilan na nin a sama ka ta kɔfɛ sobolila min be ka ben fɛ.

Fɔlɔfɔlɔ, sobolila kura be soboli samara talɔn ma dɔn ani dugumala fɛkɛman ani fitinini. Nata, sosigilan dɔw beyi, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala Angilɛ sigilanw, lakana nɛgɛw bato sendala be ben kabɔ sosigilan na nin a sama ka ta kɔfɛ sobolila min be ka ben fɛ.
question: Lahalaya jumɛn kelen bɛ soboli samara la min bɛ dɛmɛdo sobolila ka lakana ma waati min baara bɛka kɛ sendalanw na?

Sendɔnlila o erezo ɲɔgɔn nana b'a laɲinin dɔrɔn i ka ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ sɛbɛn dɔ dafa; ali na sɔrɔ erezo dɔw be sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ laɲinin. Dunanjigina labilalenw ka lisi be d'ima ola walima sɛbɛn cogoyala ani/walima ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ, waatidɔw la nin kunafoniw ye ani ɲɛfɔli kabɔ woyazikɛra wɛrɛ yɔrɔ. flores_passage: Dunajiginyɔrɔ be dumuni di fɔlɔ denmisɛniw ma - duna min be san mukan kɔnɔ - nka i be seka woyazi kɛla kɔrɔbalenw sɔrɔyen fɛnɛ. Duw nin denmisɛniw ye yeli ka dɔgɔ, nka dunajiginyɔrɔ dɔw b'a to ka dɔn suɲɛkɔnɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, dunan sugu jumɛn teli man di kosɛbɛ dunanjigiso den tila len dɔ kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Dunan minnu bɛ san mugan daminɛ la
mc_answer2: Dunan dɔ min kelen bɛ taama sira la
mc_answer3: Dunan dɔ min bɛ taama la ni denmisɛn fitiniw ye
mc_answer4: Dunan dɔ min bɛ san bisaba cɛmancɛ yɔrɔ la

flores_passage: Boomerang filili ye se kodɔnlen ye turisiw camaw be fɛka min kalan. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ni laseli ninnu jumɛn kelen bɛ boomerang filili bugunnatigɛ tigitigi?

mc_answer2: A kɛli ka can yɔrɔ sigibaw de fɛ katɛmɛ turisiw kan
mc_answer4: Boomerangs damadɔ dɔrɔn de bɛ se ka segin

flores_passage: Nin gun 17.000 cɛla sugandili ye, Indonesie dumuni ye tɔgɔ ye min be gɛrɛfɛ maarayɔrɔw dumuni kofɔ jamana kɔnɔ. Nka, nin a itilize ka sɔrɔ a pereperelatigɛ, tɔgɔ be seka dumuni jira kabɔ Java gun yɛrɛ camancɛ ani kɔrɔn yanfanw fɛ. Sinsin min be sɔrɔ gunkulu kɔnɔ, Java dumunitobicogo be dumuni nafɛn manw nɔgɔmani suguya camaw jira, kasajalan fɔlɔ Jaŋa mɔgɔw bɛɛ min fɛ ye kako ye, forɔnto bileman, sukaro (kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala Java kako sukaro) ani nafɛn farima cama wɛrɛw.

flores_passage: Nin mɔgɔ minunw deli dɔkɔtɔrɔw ka kumakanw kan, daɲɛw yɛlɛmali ani minɛli tɛ kɔrɔ kelenw ye. Bana yɛlɛmata ye bana ye min nati banakisɛ dɔ fɛ, inafɔ wirisuw, banakisɛ fitiniw, gololabanakisɛw walima banakisɛ tɔw. Bana mɔgɔ minɛta ye bana ye min be yɛlɛma nɔgɔyala gɛrɛlila banabatɔ dɔ gɛrɛfɛ. Gɔfɛrɛneman camaw b'a laɲinin lajɛlikɛlaw minun be dɔn fɛ, sigiba minunw be bɔ fɛ, jamanaw kɔnɔ k'u yɛrɛ boloci kabɔ bana dɔw ma. Nin laɲininɲ sirileno waaticama lala jamanaw la woyasikɛla bɔra minunw la walima be fɛka ta minunw lajɛ.

mc_answer1: A baara kɛla bɛfɛ ka ɛntɛrinɛti siraw bɛɛ falen

mc_answer3: A baarakɛla bɛ http sira de yɛlɛma fɔlɔ fɔlɔ
mc_answer4: A baarakɛla ka baara tɛ taa ni kunafoniw tɛmɛ ta bɛrɛbɛnenw fo ka se hakɛw caman ma

flores_passage: Bari weleliw sira be yɛlɛma ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ, i mako tɛ nɛgɛjuru baarakɛyɔrɔ dɔ itilize min b'i ka yɔrɔ la walima i be ka woyase ka ta yɔrɔmina. Jagoyalen tɛ fɛnɛ ka maarayɔrɔ nɛgɛjuru dɔ ta kabɔ i be ka balo kulu min cɛra la; i be seka sateliti ɛntɛrɛnɛti konɛkisiyɔn sɔrɔ Chicken, Alaska kunkokɔnɔnaw la ani ka nɛgɛjuru dɔ sugandi min b'a jira k'i be Arizona tile la. Waatidɔwla, i kan ka nɛgɛjuru san a dana min be weleli kɛ diɲɛ fan bɛɛ fɛ, min ba to PSTN telefɔniw be sek'i wele. Nɛgɛjuru be bɔ yɔrɔ min be danfara kɛɛ mɔgɔ minunw bek'i wele la.

flores_passage: Fɔli ka nɔgɔ cogoyala Italiyɛnla bari daɲɛ bɛɛ be fɔ cogoya inafɔ cogomina u sɛbɛnleno. D'ala fɛnɛ ki ye r ani rr kalan cogoyala minunw tɛ kelen ye: caro kɔrɔ kanuba, tumamina carro kɔrɔ ye wotoro.
question: Ninnu fɛn jumɛn kelen tɛ Italiyɛn daɲɛw fɔli cogo bugunnatigɛ tigitigi?
mc_answer1: R fila tugulen ɲɔgɔn kɔ fɔ cogo bɛ yɛlɛma ka tɛmɛ r kelen kan

mc_answer4: Daɲɛw fan ba fɔ cogo bɛ yɛlɛma kad'u ka dafalen nataw kan

flores_passage: Izmir de ye  Turquie duguba saban ye nin mɔgɔ miliyɔn 3,7 ɲɔgɔna ye, pɔri ba filana Istanbul kɔfɛ, ani tiransipɔri cogoya ɲuman baw. Kunun Smyrna dugu kɔrɔ kɔnɔ, a ye sinsin feere kɛyɔrɔ kuru dewelope nin ye, be jida ba dɔ gɛrɛfɛ ani munu munleno nin kulu ye. Sirafilancɛɛ belebelebaw, sojan ɲɛfɛra fitiri manw ani feere kɛ butiki kuraw dilane nin ladala sosanfɛla bilemanw ye, siyɛkili 18 suku, ani misiri ani egilizi kɔrɔw, ali na sɔrɔ dugu cogoya be komi Erɔpu mediterane ta ka tɛmɛ Turquie kɔrɔlen kan.

flores_passage: Jesusalem ye Israel faba ani tugu ba ye, ali na sɔrɔ jamana tɔw ani Diɲɛforobatɔnba ma sɛbɛntiya fɔlɔ inafɔ Israel faba. Dugu kɔrɔ Jude Kulu sanfɛ ka tariku ye kabakoman ye min ta bayiri kaw la. Dugu in ye dinɛ sabaw minunw Maa kelen kofɔ dinemayɔrɔ - Ziwifuya. Kiretiyɛnla ani Silamɛya, ani b'inafɔ tasili, diɲɛ ani seko nin dɔnko kɛ yɔrɔ. Ko sababu ko kɛ dugu in dinɛ nafan ye ani kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala Dugu Kɔrɔ mara yɔrɔ camaw, Jerusalem ye Israel lajɛli kɛ yɔrɔ baw dɔla kelen ye. Tariku, fuyeli ani seko ni dɔnko yɔrɔ camaw be Jerusalem, nin a sani kɛ yɔrɔw falen ba ani makananw, kafeminw yɔrɔw ani dumunikɛyɔrɔw ye.

question: Nin jumɛn de ma fɔ tɛmɛsiran in kɔnɔ ka kɛ fɛn ye Jerusalem dɔnnen bɛ min ye?

flores_passage: Kruger National Park (KNP) be Sud-Afiriki kɔkɔdugu ani kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ ani samalen no Mozambique furɔntiyɛri gɛrɛfɛ kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ, Zimbabwe kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛ, ani worodugu yanfan dan ye Crocodile River ye. Pariki ye kilomɛtirikare ba 19.500 ye ani tilaneno yɔrɔmara 14 ye, kelenw kelenw be kunko ani kunkosogow dɔw jukɔrɔma dɔndo. O ye Sud-Afiriki samalikɛyɔrɔw baw kelen dɔ ye ani  a be jateminɛ inafɔ South African National Parks dirapo (SANParks) ye. Inafɔ Sud-Afiriki Dugu Parikiw bɛɛ, dɔngodɔn marali ani paraki dɔn li waariw beyi. A nafan be seka bɔn mɔgɔ dɔ ma lala ka Kunko Kariti san, min dɔn niw danga Sud-Afiriki pariki sugandilenw kɔnɔ walima Su-Afiriki Dugu Parikiw bɛɛ.
question: Ka Kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, dugutagala sugu jɔn tɛna sani sɔrɔ ni Wild Card ye?
mc_answer1: Woyasikɛla min b'a boloda Ka SANParks caman lajɛ i ko a bɛ se cogo min
mc_answer2: Woyasikɛla min bɛ Kruger National Park dɔrɔn lajɛ
mc_answer3: Woyasikɛ tikɛmagɛlɛn min jɔrɔlen bɛ pariki musaka kow la
mc_answer4: Woyasikɛla min b'a boloda ka Kruger Park National lajɛ ani pariki kelen wɛrɛ a dɔgɔyalen ba

question: Nin kumasen jumɛn nin tɛ Kruger Park National ɲɛfɔ ka ɲa?
mc_answer1: A jatelen bɛ nafɔ Sudafiriku samalikɛyɔrɔba dɔ
mc_answer2: Kunko ani kunkosogow bɛ falen falen pariki yɔrɔmaraw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ
mc_answer3: Ale de ye Sudafiriki Parks National bɛɛ la dɔgɔmani ye
mc_answer4: Lajɛlikɛlaw bɛ yamaruya ka don a kɔnɔ Wild card sanni sira fɛ

flores_passage: Jolila Machu Picchu kɔkɔdugu yanfan sanfɛla dan na ye nin yɛlɛka jigin kulu in ye, waatidɔwla fotow kɔfɛla ja yɔrɔtɔw ye. A kabɔn ka tɛmɛ dɔni nin dugumalala, ani a yɛlɛli ka gɛlɛya ani a jaleno, nka famuyali cogola mɔgɔ kɛnɛmaw kan ka seka yɛlɛ miniti 45 boɲɔgɔngo kɔnɔ. Senbila kabakuruw bilaleno sira bɛɛ la, ani digɛn ma yɔrɔw la juru nɛgɛla maw beyi ka minɛ tikɛla. O fɔlen kɔ, sigi a kan k'i nɛnɛgiri bena durun ani i janto digɛndɔn ma yɔrɔw la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala nin u ɲikin neno, bari a be seka kɛ farati ye teliyala. Kulu dɔnda fitinini dɔ be kulu sanfɛlara min tɛmɛ kan ka kɛ min fɛ, a ka surun kosɛbɛ ani a ka dɔkɔ.
question: Nin jumɛn bɔlenba b’a fɛ ka kojugu lase kuluyɛlɛnnaw ma ka sababu kɛ ni kulu kɛrɛw dakɛɲɛni ye?

mc_answer1: Hali kuluyɛlɛna kɛnɛmanw ninakili bɛna se ka durun
mc_answer2: Juru min bɛ minɛ tikɛ la o fosi tɛ dingɛmayɔrɔw la
mc_answer3: I ka kɛn ka tɛmɛn kulu donda fitini dɔ fɛ sanfɛlala
mc_answer4: dingɛmayɔrɔw bɛ kɛ farati waati min n'u ɲiginnen don

flores_passage: Mayorque toboli inafɔ Mediterane yɔrɔ tɔw ta sinsinleno burukuna, nankɔkɔnɔ fenw ani sogo (kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala lɛ), ani be olive tulu itilize a bɛɛla. Sura kodɔnlen nɔgɔma dɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala tilemakɔnɔ, ye Pa amb Oli ye: buru nin olive tulu, tomati, ani nanfɛnw inafɔ foromazi, ton, dɔ wɛrɛw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsiran in ye, ninnu jumɛn de tɛ Majorikaw ka duminitɔbita fanba dɔ ye?

flores_passage: Hangi Meal be tobi digɛn dun dɔ kɔnɔ dugukolo jukɔrɔ. Hangi be labaara waatidɔw la ka ladala sura cɛnini dilan. Hangi be itilize waatidɔw la ka ladala sura cɛnini dilan. Yɔrɔ camaw Rotorua kɔnɔ be digɛn kalama nin dugufutɛnti ye di tumamina nin digɛn kalama dɔw be seka sɔrɔ Christchurch, Wellington kɔnɔ ani yɔrɔ wɛrɛw.
question: Ka da kunafoniw kan minnu bɛ tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ, kuma jumɛn fɔlen bɛ hangi meal kun kan n’o tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Dingɛ kalaman funteni bɛ tasuma ka fara kalayalenw itilize walasa ka dingɛ dun kalaya
mc_answer2: Dingɛ kalaman min bɛ fara kalamanw itilize o bɛ sɔrɔ Wellington
mc_answer3: Hangi bɛ labaara waatidɔw la ka sura jeninenw dilan
mc_answer4: Digɛn kalaman bɛ seka sɔrɔ Rotorua kɔnɔ

question: Nin jumɛn de ma fɔ nafɔ hangi dingɛ kalayaya cogoya yɛrɛyɛrɛ dɔ?

flores_passage: Tumamina i beka monasitɛriw lajɛ, a ɲinineno musow fɛ u ka zupu do min be kinkiriw datugu ani kamakunw fɛnɛ. Monasitɛriw camaw be datugulan di musow ma minunw labeni bali nana, nka nin i nana nin i yɛrɛ ta ye, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala kulɛri camaw be minunw la, mowani bena yɛlɛ ifɛ walima ma sɛri dɔndala. O sira kelen fɛ, a ɲinineno cɛw fɛ ka pantalɔn do minunw b'u kinkiri kunw datugu. O fɛnɛ be seka sign kabɔ maara dɔndala nka nin fininw tɛ ko dɔnlikɛla bɛɛ kɔfɛ, ola i tɛna seka lafiya nin ni zupu ninunw ye. Bɔɲa kelen be dɔn cɛw bɛla!
question: Mun de bɛ seka kɛ Mɔwani walima masɛri ka lakodonni kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen jaabi ye?
mc_answer3: Ka dantugulan dɔ sigan monasitɛri la
mc_answer4: Ka zupu dɔ don min bɛ kinkiriw sanfɛ

question: Nin finidonta jumɛn sinka ta man telin ka sɔrɔ ka monasitɛri la?

flores_passage: Nin i ye Aritiki ani Antariki yɔrɔw lajɛ nɛnɛ fɛ, i bena poli su ye, min kɔrɔ ko tile tɛ bɔ kɔrɔnfɛ. O be okaziyɔn d'ima ka Aurora borealis lajɛn, bari sankolo bena fin cogoya monturu gɛrɛfɛ. Komi mɔgɔ caman tɛ a yɔrɔw la, ani polisiyɔn fitini dɔrɔn ne be yen ola ote problemoun ye tuma dɔw la, i be sekana nisondiya nin lolow ye.
question: Waati jumɛn lajɛlikɛla bɛna okaziyɔn ba sɔrɔ ka lolow ye tuma min na a bɛ ka Antarctic fanw lajɛ?
mc_answer2: Waati min yɔrɔw mɔgɔ man can ten
mc_answer4: Waati min polisiyɔn fanga ka dɔgɔn

flores_passage: Yɔrɔ janw la, erezo tɛ yɔrɔ miununw ka, telefɔni satelitiman be seka latigɛ kelen dɔrɔn ye. Telefɔni satelitiman tɛ waatcamana tɛlɛfɔni pɔritabulu nɔnabila ye, inafɔ i kan ka bɔ kɛnɛma yɔrɔjɛlen na yɔrɔ mina i be sateliti ye ka apɛlikɛ. O sɛriwisi in be itilize waaticama batɔn la, minunw ye tulɔnkɛ batɔn ye, ani jisanfɛyalaliw minunw kunafoniw ka jan ani mako be kumakanw la. I ka telefɔni mariseli di ba kan ka seka kunafoni camaw d'i ma tugulila nin sɛriwisi in na.
question: Waati jumɛn telefɔni satelitima tɛna seka kɛ tɛlɛfɔni pɔritabulu nɔnabila ɲuman ye?
mc_answer3: Ni a bɛna seka baara kɛnɛma
mc_answer4: Ni taa min bɛ sɔrɔ hakɛya dɔw ɲinni

mc_answer3: Waati min mago bɛ kunafoni jan na
mc_answer4: Waati min i ka telin ka erezo ma yɔrɔ sɔrɔ

flores_passage: Maldive faba ye Chisinau ye. Maarayɔrɔ kan ye Romanian, nka Russie be fɔyi cogoyabala kosɛbɛ. Maldive ye siya camaw jamana ye min sɛgɛ ko sababu kɛ siyako kɛlɛ ye. San 1994, nin kɛlɛ in kɛra sababu ye ka Transnistria jamana sigisenkan Maldive kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ, min ka gɔfɛrɛneman b'a bolo ani waari nka a ma kodɔn Diɲɛforobatɔnba jamana sifɛ. Sɔrɔ baaraw dilana nin Maldive fan filaw ni ɲɔgɔncɛ ali na sɔrɔ politiki sikafɔw ma taɲɛ. Dinɛ ba ye Moldive kɔnɔ ye Kerecɛn Katolikiw ye.
question: Nin jumɛn nɔfɛ mankan kɛra sababu ye ka Transnitria Jamana sigi sen kan?

question: Nin fɛn jumɛn kelen bɛ Transnistria Jamana bolo n’o ni Moldavvie fan tɔ tɛ kelen ye?

flores_passage: "Komi Montevideo be Equateur worodugu sanfa fɛ, tile de be kɛ o yɔrɔla nin nɛnɛ be kɔkɔdugu yanfan Emisifɛri la ani o cogoya kelen na. Monteŋideo be turopiki dugumataw kɔnɔ; tilemaw fɛ, goniyahakɛ yɛlɛli ka tɛmɛ degire 30 kan ka ca. Nɛnɛ damatɛmɛlen be seka kɛ nisongoyala: goniyajakɛ be jigin cogogɛlɛ jali duguma, nka fiyɛn ani sumaya be faara ɲɔgɔnkan ka nɛnɛ tɔ juguya ka tɛmɛ goniyahakɛ sumana be min fɔ kan. ""Samiya"" walima ""tilema"" waatiw kɛrɛnkɛniw teyi: sanji hakɛya be t'a cogoyala san munɛ bɛɛ kɔnɔ."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, waati jumɛ dugutaala ka kan Montevideo lajɛ ni u jigi bɛ a kan ka fuɲɔ fɛkɛn?

mc_answer2: Waati min tilema bɛ Bafɛla la
mc_answer4: Waati min fobonda bɛ Bafɛlan na

flores_passage: "Kokola desɛnw ani Sɛbɛniw dagan bali kodɔnleno inafɔ girafiti. Hali na sɔrɔ o tɛ ko kura ye, mɔgɔ camaw ba tugu lala denmisɛnniw la minunw b'a dabɔ a kama ka foroba ani mɔgɔw ka yɔrɔw cɛn nin pɛtiri fiyɛta itilizeli ye. Nka, bibi in na girafiti kɛlaw kodɔnlenw, girafiti tulɔnkɛbaaraw ani kokow ""dagalenw"" beyi, Girafiti desɛnw nin sira in fɛ boleno waatidɔw la desɛnbaaraw fɛ ka tɛmɛ  etikɛti kɔnlenw kan."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nin jumɛ de bɛ seka fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni garafiti aritisi sigilen ye, ni a vandalisimu bɛli?
mc_answer3: Sɛbɛnninakoko min ma kanu foroba ta la

flores_passage: Fɛti dɔw o kumu kɔnɔ, lajɛlikɛla badenw nali dɔngili fɛtiw la ba latigɛ ka sigi o yɔrɔla, ani lajɛlikɛlaw camaw b'o jateminɛ kakɛ ɲɛnɛbaara nafan ma ye. Nin i be fɛka ka kɛ tulɔnbaaraw gɛrɛfɛ, i kan kana jɔna walasa ka sigiyɔrɔ sɔrɔ dɔngili gɛrɛfɛ. Hakilito ala ko ali na sɔrɔ sanfɛ dɔngili bana, fɛti fanw dɔw be seka dɔngilida fo sufɛlala. Fɛti dɔw be sigiyɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlen di denbaya denmisɛni tigiw ma.
question: Fɔli ɲanɛjɛ fɛn jumɛn ni laminɛnikɛlaw bɛ a jaate koyelen kɔrɔ nafama fɛn dɔ ye?
mc_answer1: Ka na ni denmisɛnni fitiniw ye
mc_answer3: Ka Fɔli kɛ a la dugufilama

mc_answer2: Ka to sigiyɔrɔ dɔ la denbayaw kama

flores_passage: kadakan kaɲakɔnɔnaw janya kan, i tɛ seka na sufɛ tulɔn cama sɔrɔ nin ta Albuquerque walima Santa Fe. Nka, kazino minunw bɛɛ tɔgɔfɔla sanfɛ be mininfenw feere, ani u camaw be ɲɛnɛcɛ mariki tɔgɔ dɔ nati (Fɔlɔfɔlɔ bele belebaw be Albuquerque ani Sanfe gɛrɛfɛ). Janto ala: dugu fitiniw bariw yan tɛ waatibɛɛ yɔrɔ ɲumanw ye ka ɲɛsin lajɛlikɛla dunaw ma. Kuma kelen, kunbalan ba be Nouvelle Mevique nin mɔbili bolila sulen ye, ani a mɔbili bolila sulenw hakɛya ka surun kosɛbɛ dugu fitini barimanw la.

Kuma kelen, kunbalan ba be Nouvelle Mevique nin mɔbili bolila sulen ye, ani a mɔbili bolila sulenw hakɛya ka surun kosɛbɛ dugu fitini barimanw la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, lajelikɛla ka telin ka ɲɛnɛjɛ dɔnnenba sɔrɔ yɔrɔ jumɛn na Nouvelle Mevique kɔkɔdugu ya fan fɛn?
mc_answer1: Kazino dɔ min ni Albuquerque cɛ ye lɛri fila ye
mc_answer3: Kazino dɔ la Sante Fe kɛrɛfɛ

flores_passage: "Yɔrɔ gulɔ yɛrɛ yɛrɛ ye ""Number One"" ye, o tekɛ gulɔ gɛlɛ ye, nka a kadi ani a be farifoni. Yɔrɔ gulɔ wɛrɛ fɛnɛ we wele ko ""Manta"". Faransi gulɔw cama beyi i be seka minunw sɔrɔ, nka Nouvelle Zelande ani Ɔsitirali gulɔ woyaze be sɔn ka ja lala. Yɔrɔ orobinɛ ji lakana neno ka min, nka bidɔn kɔnɔ sɔrɔkadi nin i be siran. Ɔsiraliyɛn fɛ, kafe ""jɛman kankalen"" ye kɔfɛra hakilina ye.  Fiman fitini ye ""espresso"" ye, cappuccino bena ni kirɛmu ba y'a sanfɛ (musi tɛ), te be di a nɔnɔ tan. Sokola kalama be Belgique ka felaw jira. Jiriden nɔnɔ ka gɛlɛ nka ka di."

mc_answer3: Sauvignon Blanc ka bɔ Nouvelle Zeldande

flores_passage: "Guaraniw kun ye sigidenfɔlɔ kulu nafan ma ba ye minunw kun siginleno yɔrɔɔ min be wele ko Paraguay Kɔrɔnyanfan, n'u boliliye inafɔ dɔnsɔ yalalikɛlaw, minunw kun be sɛnɛ fɛnɛ kɛ ka balo . Chaco marayɔrɔ kun ye sigiden kulu tɔw ka so ye inafɔ Guaycuru ani Payagua, minunw balola nin dɔnsɔya ye, faaraɲɔgɔn kan ani jɛgɛmɔn. Paraguay siyɛkili 16  kɔnɔ, kun be wele fɔlɔfɔlɔ inafɔ ""Giant marayɔrɔw Antilles la"", bangela ko sababu kɛ Ɛsipaɲi kɛlɛlaw ani dugu sigiden kuluw bɛnɲɔngɔnyali ye. Ɛpaniɲɔliw kun ye kolonization daminɛ min janyala foka se san kɛmɛ saba ma. Kabini Asuncion jɔlila san ba 1537, Paraguay ka kɛcogobɛla ka tabolo kɔrɔ ani u kɛcogoya mara."
question: Kulu jumɛn y’e Kolonizasiyɔn daminɛ, min janyara fɔ ka se san kɛmɛsaba ma?

flores_passage: "Pari mɔgɔw kodɔnlen nin yɛrɛbaya ye ani kafalenya. Ali  na sɔrɔ o ye kuma sanga bali ye, cogoya ɲuma walasa k'i yɛrɛ sɔrɔ Paris ye ka tabolo ɲuman sira alisa, ka kow kɛ inafɔ ""mɔgɔ lamɔlen"" (min lamɔla kaɲɛ). O bena kow tabolo nɔgɔya kosɛbɛ. Paris kaw ka yɛrɛminɛ be tunu nin i ye taboloɲuman dɔw jira."

flores_passage: Kulu fila be MetroRail ka baarakɛyɔrɔ taa tirɛn la Capte Town kɔnɔ ani a kɔfɛ: MetroPlus (min be wele fɛnɛ Kulu fɔlɔ) ani Metro (min wele ko Kulu Sabana). Metroplus lafiyakabɔn ani tɛ fa ka damatɛmɛ nka daga gɛlɛn dɔni, ali na sɔrɔ ka nɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ meturo tike nɔrɔmali Erɔpu kɔnɔ. MetropPlus ani Metro kɔlɔsilibaw be tirɛn bɛɛ kɔnɔ; MetroPlus kɔlɔsilikɛlaw be waatibɛɛ tirɛn dan na Cape Town gɛrɛfɛ.
question: Kulu fɔlɔ nafa ye mun ye Cape Town MetroRail kan?
mc_answer3: A da ka nɔkɔn ka tɛmɛ Kulu Sabanan tike kan
mc_answer4: A ni meturo tike sɔnkɔ bɛɛ ye kelen ye

mc_answer2: Kulu fila ninnu bɛɛ tike wari ye kelen ye

flores_passage: Woyazikɛlaw be seka lala fɛnɲɛnɛmani kilinkɛraw bɛn u tɛ minunw dɔn u ka maarayɔrɔw la. Fɛnɲɛnɛmaniw ninunw be seka dumuni cɛn, nkɔnɲɛ nati, walima cogoya gɛlɛna seka alɛriziw nati, bana cari, walima banayɛlɛtaw yɛlɛma. Bana juguw yɛrɛw, walima bagan faratilenw minunw be seka mɔgɔw bana walima faga nin fagan ye, tɛ jate waaticama inafɔ fɛnɲɛnɛmani mɔgɔtɔrɔlaw.
question: Fɛnɲɛnɛmanin kinikɛla man telin ka nin fɛn juman kelen kɛ?
mc_answer4: Ka banadilidaw nati fan ni fanga la

flores_passage: Butuki wɔniw bɛɛ faleno telefɔni pisi pirepeye aranze ɲagamuniw la min be seka itilize telefɔni kirediman saralenw la walima telefɔni gansanw. Ali na sɔrɔ pisiw camaw kaɲi walasa ka weleli kɛ yɔrɔ bɛɛ la, dɔw sipesiyalizeleno wele nɔgɔmani dilila piriw la ka jamana kulu kɛrɛnkɛrɛni dɔw la. Sirasɔrɔli nin sɛriwisi dɔw la ye waatidɔw la tɛmɛli nɛgɛjuru sira folama fɛ min be seka wele kabɔ telefɔniw camaw la ka sɔrɔ ima dɔrɛ bɔɔ,

flores_passage: Plitvice Lakes dugu pariki ye kunko baye, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala nin hɛtiri ye, episeya ani sapɛn, ani ye Alipu ani Mediterane jiriw ɲagamuniw be yen. Jiri kuluw suguya camaw be yen, ko sababu kɛ waatiboloda fitiniw camaw ye, dancɛbɔlila dugukolow la ani canyaw cogoya camaw. Maarayɔrɔ in ye fɛnɛ banga ani kɔnɔ suguya camaw ka so ye. Kunkɔ soko sɔrɔbaliw inafɔ Erɔpu orisi sokolarama, kunkowulu, sɛgɛ, gingin, kunkowulu fitini, kunkokɔnɔ jakuma ani tetara belebele ba be seka sɔrɔ yen, nin kunkokɔnɔ fɛnw suguya kodɔnlen cama wɛrɛw ye.

flores_passage: "Kunafoni di baarakɛyɔrɔ be tilen ka kalɔn tikɛ nin kun lna, fɔlila ko a dabɔra ka ""suyɛnli kunbɛ"". Tiɲɛla, maarayɔrɔw kɔdiw tɛ kɔlɔlɔ foyi nati kopiyeli kɔnlen la; fitini fitini disiki dɔ kopiyeli be zuye kaɲɛ cogoyala aparɛlanfɛn dɔ la yɔrɔ mina a yɛrɛ yɛrɛ bena zuye. Nin kun ye ka se di baarakɛyɔrɔw ma u ka sukuw kuna; a bɛɛ be tɔnɔ sɔrɔ kuna."

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ imigirasiyɔn mɔgɔw ka lajɛliw tɛ yi waaticamana walima ye tɔgɔ dɔrɔn de ye tumamina nin i sera i ka jamanala, duwanɲɛ ka lajɛliw be seka kɛ gɛlɛya ye. D'ala k'i ba dɔn min ani min tɛ seka dɔn ani fɛnw bɛɛ kofɛ minunw tɛmɛleno sariya danakan.

mc_answer4: Ni bɛ ka na ni fɛn ye min yamaruyalen tɛ ka don

flores_passage: Cachamo Valley, Chilie soboliyɔrɔ fɔlɔ, min dɔnlen no inafɔ Sud Ameriki Yosemite, nin koko kabukuru jɛman suguyaw ani kulu nɛfɛraw ye. Kulusanfɛlaw be kulusanfɛ lajɛli ɲuman baw di kabɔ legelegela.Kuluyɛlɛlaw kabɔ diɲɛ fan bɛɛ fɛ beka sira kura dilan o kɔkɔw nafan dandɔbalila.

flores_passage: In i be fɛka woyase pankuru kɔnɔ diɲɛ fan bɛɛ worodugu emisifɛri kɔnɔ, pankuru woyasiw ani yɔrɔw danbɔleno ko sababu kɛɛ kɔkɔjiw siraw tugubali ye ɲɔgɔna. flores_passage: Diɲɛ fan bɛɛ, bolikɛ kuluw 200 ɲɔgɔn de beyi. u cama be marise nin u yɛrɛ ye. Nin ju ye Bacelonas Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, Running Tours Prague min sinisinleno Prague ani dɔ wɛrɛw ye sendɔ ala jɔna jɔna.

flores_passage: "Kunko lajɛliw ye lala Farafina turisi samakɛlikɛla baye ani yeta lajɛlikɛla camaw fɛ. Safari daɲɛ kodɔnlen min be kɛ ye sirakan woyazi ye ka Farafina kunkokɔnɔ ɲuman lajɛ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala bi suruniw be yɔrɔmina. Bagan dɔw, inafɔ samaw ani ntilenw, be gɛrɛ mɔbili la ani ekipeman nɔrɔmaliw ben'u lajɛliko ɲuman nɔgɔya. Waraw, waranikalaw be maloya waatidɔw la ani i bena sekana u ye kaɲɛ nin lupuw ye. Sena lajɛli dɔ (min be wele fɛrɛ ""kunkokɔnɔna tama"", ""kuluyɛlɛ tama"" walima tali ""tama tama na"") be kɛ kuluyɛlɛ ye, lɛri damadɔni dɔrɔn walima tile camaw."

mc_answer2: Ka taa senna yala dɔla kungokɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Mɔbili ta ani sariya minɛnw labaara

question: Ka sinsin nin tɛmɛ sira ye, kungokɔnɔbagan jumɛn nin turisi ka teli ka ɲɔgɔn ye farafinna kungofilɛ senfɛ k’u to bolimafɛn kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Turuw ka ɲɔgɔ nin kulubaw ye, ola nin nin i be kelen na walima nin terikɛ kelen ye, a ɲinin i ka mɔgɔ tɔw dɔn ani ka mɔgɔ naani walima wɔɔrɔ kulu dɔ dilan walasa ka mɔgɔ kelen piri ɲuman sɔrɔ. Nka, o manka kɛ jɔrɔnan koye bari waaticamana turusiw be kɛɲɔgɔn kan ka mɔbili fa. A be komi sinsin o cogo ka mɔgɔ kumayɛlɛma ka jir'ula u kan ka waari cama sara.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, mun tun bɛ sɛn ka taama musaka lajigin?
mc_answer3: Ka taa nin mɔgɔ wɛrɛ kelen ye
mc_answer4: Ka mɔgɔ wɔɔrɔ walima caman jɛkulu ɲinin

flores_passage: Turuw ka ɲɔgɔ nin kulubaw ye, ola nin nin i be kelen na walima nin terikɛ kelen ye, a ɲinin i ka mɔgɔ tɔw dɔn ani ka mɔgɔ naani walima wɔɔrɔ kulu dɔ dilan walasa ka mɔgɔ kelen piri ɲuman sɔrɔ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jɔnni ka teli ka taama siɲɛ hakɛ bɛɛ la caman sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Turisi minnu b’a fɛ ka mɔbili falen falen kɛ
mc_answer3: Terima fila bɛ ka taama ɲɔgɔn fɛ

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ San Francisco sɔrɔ sirileno o la nin o ye diɲɛ lajɛlikɛyɔrɔ ba ye, a sɔrɔda ka ca. Baarakɛbɔnda min be mɔgɔ camaw ta barala ye sɛriwisiw ye, gofɛrɛnema, waaribaarayɔrɔw, jako ani turisimu. Waatila dɔngili, filimuw ani sɛbɛeniw ɲɛfɔli ani tabolo kodɔnlen y'a dugu dɛmɛ ka ɲɛnɛmaya ani a tamasiyɛnw dɔnlen diɲɛ fanbɛɛ. San Francisco ye turusi infirasirikiti ba camaw dilan nin ɔtɛli camaw ye, dugunikɛyɔrɔw, ani yɔrɔbaw minunw be diɲɛ yɔrɔbaw jɔcogo bato. San Francisco ye fɛnɛ jamana yɔrɔba dɔ ye nin Asie dumuniw ye: Koree, Thailande, Inde ani Japon dumuniw.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun ye San Francisco tɔgɔbɔli dɛmɛn jiɲɛ kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Yeli sabatilen sekonindɔnko ani kunnafonidi sira caman na
mc_answer4: Azikaw ka dumuni ɲɛnajɛ sangatigi nata

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, mankutu jumɛn tɛ tiɲɛ ye San Francisco kan?
mc_answer1: A bɔra ka caya jaw nin gafew kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Azikaw ka dumuni fanga ka bon
mc_answer3: Dunanjiginsow nin jamalajɛrɛsobaw caman bɛ ye

flores_passage: Maralikɛlikabila jɔna be hakilisigi di woyazikɛla ma k'u bena siyɔrɔ sɔ waatimina n'u sera u seyɔrɔla. Woyazi ɲɛnɛbɔba baarakɛla be akɔriw ɲinin waatidɔw la nin otɛliw ye, ali na sɔrɔ i seka siyɔrɔ suguya wɛrɛw sɔrɔ inafɔ sigiyɔrɔw, nin tɛmɛliye i ka woyazi ɲnɛbɔba baarkɛla fɛ. Woyazi ɲɛnɛbɔba baarakɛlaw be kuluw jira ila daraka, tiransipɔri kabɔ/a,i ka ta ayeropɔrila be min na walima ali otɛli ani wɔli kuluw faralenɲɔgɔnkan. U be seka maralikɛkabila i ɲ nin i mako be waatila ka miri sɛriwisi in kan walima ka sɛbɛn dɔ ɲinin ka t'i tayɔrɔla (misalila: wiza). Faraliw walima laɲiniw kan ka ci woyazi ɲɛnɛbɔba baarakɛla ma fɔlɔ ani makan ci otɛli ma dirkitila.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, taamaden suguya jumɛn man teli ka nafasɔrɔ taama cakɛla ka baaraw la?
mc_answer2: Taamaden min ka teli ka yɛrɛkunnakow kɛ
mc_answer3: Taamaden mun m’a ka jamanadonsɛbɛn sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Taamaden mun b’a kanun donin ci kɛ

question: Ninnu na jumɛn ma kofɔ tɛmɛ sira kɔnɔ inafɔ cili nafa taama cakɛla fɛ?

flores_passage: Sinsan sinsan kanbayɛlɛmalan apilikasiyɔn - apilikasiyɔn minunw be seka gafe fanw baw bayɛlɛma yɔrɔnikelen kabɔ kan dɔla ka ta kan wɛrɛla. Apilikasiyɔn dɔw nin bɔnda in kɔnɔ be seka masalabolow bayɛlɛma kɔfɛ kanw la tamasiyɛnw walima fɛn wɛrɛw kuna diɲɛ kɔnɔ nin a baaralikɛba ye telefɔni ɲɛsin fɛnw dɔw ma. Kan bayɛlɛma mansiw talaɲɛ kosɛbɛ kosɛbɛ, ani be waatidɔw la kanbayɛlɛmali ɲuman di cogodɔla (ani cogoya gɛlɛna mana manakan), nka jateminɛ dɔw mako beyi, inafɔ u be sek'a bɛɛ ɲagamu fɛnɛ. Apilikasiyɔn ba kelen nin bɔnda in na ye Google kanbayɛlɛmala ye, min kanyɛlɛmali danga ɛntɛrɛni kɔfɛ tumamina nin ye kan kunafoniw ɲininlen terisarize.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kanbayɛlɛmali a nɔla apilikasiyɔn tɛ sɛn ka mun kɛ?
mc_answer1: Taamasyɛnw kɔrɔ fɔli kan wɛrɛw la
mc_answer3: Ka masala min bɛ minɛnw kan bayɛlɛma nin smartphone ye
mc_answer4: Ka kanbayɛlɛmali ka ɲɛ 100% waati bɛɛ la

question: Mun b’a kanbayɛlɛmali daga ka ķɛ ɛntɛrinɛti kɔfɛ?
mc_answer4: Applications minnu bɛ kanbayɛlɛmali a nɔla kulu kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Nɛzi benw ye fɛn ye min tɛ nɔrimali ye; sira yɛlɛkajigi garolen be seka sumayalikɛ, ani hakɛya  damatɛmɛlen  bena ben inafɔ nɛzi benw. Kunbalan ye min ye ko nɛzi be kole, ola o mako fɛn dɔw la ka jigin, ani nɛzi dɔw jiginli be seka kunw ye ka tɔw ben. Waatidɔwla, benli kun ye tile kɛli ye ka nɛzi kalaya, waatidɔw la nɛzi benw camaw, waatidɔw la kun gansanw, waatidɔw la adamaden dɔ.
question: Ninnu na jumɛn tɛ jikuruyurundu sababu ye?

flores_passage: Nɛzi benw ye fɛn ye min tɛ nɔrimali ye; sira yɛlɛkajigi garolen be seka sumayalikɛ, ani hakɛya  damatɛmɛlen  bena ben inafɔ nɛzi benw. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu na jumɛn bɛ na inafɔ jikuruyurundu?
mc_answer2: Sira yɛlɛkajigi garolen nɛzi tɛ min na
mc_answer4: Nɛzi min binna ka sɔrɔ mɔgɔ ma maga la

flores_passage: "Curry ye dumuni ye min dilaneno nin binw ani nanfɛnw ye, nɔgɔnfɛ nin walima sogo ye walima falenfɛnw ye. Curry be seka ""ja"" walima ""ɲikin"" ka da ji hakɛya min be k'ala kan. Inde ani Pakistan kɔkɔdugu yanfan kɔnɔna maarayɔrɔw kɔnɔ, yawuri be dɔn waaticamana nin curry ye; Inde worodugu yanfan fɛ ani kontinan fitini jidala maarayɔrɔ dɔw la, kako nɔnɔ de be itilize."
question: ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, curry nan kolo ye nan fɛn jumɛn ye?

flores_passage: "Curry ye dumuni ye min dilaneno nin binw ani nanfɛnw ye, nɔgɔnfɛ nin walima sogo ye walima falenfɛnw ye. Curry be seka ""ja"" walima ""ɲikin"" ka da ji hakɛya min be k'ala kan. Inde ani Pakistan kɔkɔdugu yanfan kɔnɔna maarayɔrɔw kɔnɔ, yawuri be dɔn waaticamana nin curry ye; Inde worodugu yanfan fɛ ani kontinan fitini jidala maarayɔrɔ dɔw la, kako nɔnɔ de be itilize."
question: Marabolo dɔw kɔnɔ, kokoji bɛ bila nafɛn jumɛn nɔna waati dɔw la curry nanna?

flores_passage: South Pole Traverse (walima siraba) ye sira kilomɛtiri 1600 ye kabɔ McMurdo Station Ross Sea sanfɛ ka ta Poli fɛ. O ye nɛzi faralen ye ɲɔgɔnkan nin digɛnw minunw falen o ani tamasiyɛnlen no nin dirapow ye. O woyasi be seka kɛ nin tirakitɛri kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlenw ye, jiri samataw nin taji ani fɛnw ye. U ma makan kosɛbɛ, ola sira janya ka tɛmɛ Transantartic Mountains gɛrɛfɛ walasa ka ta kulu la.
question: Munna mununmununyɔrɔ min dɔ bɛ Transantarctic Mountains kɛrɛ la b’a to i bɛ bɔ fuga kan?
mc_answer1: McMurdo Station da tugulen don waati caman
mc_answer4: A ka nɔgɔn nin taama ye Ross Sea kanna ye

flores_passage: South Pole Traverse (walima siraba) ye sira kilomɛtiri 1600 ye kabɔ McMurdo Station Ross Sea sanfɛ ka ta Poli fɛ. O ye nɛzi faralen ye ɲɔgɔnkan nin digɛnw minunw falen o ani tamasiyɛnlen no nin dirapow ye. O woyasi be seka kɛ nin tirakitɛri kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlenw ye, jiri samataw nin taji ani fɛnw ye. question: South Pole Traverse jɔ fɛ, mun taamasyɛnnen don jɔnjɔnw fɛ?
mc_answer2: Mɔbili donintalaw minnu bɛ ka taji saman

flores_passage: Dɔnila Farafina Wɔrɔdugu yanfan fɛ mɔbilila ye cogoya ɲuman ba ye k'o maraw cɛnan ye ani ka se yɔrɔw la minunw tɛ kɛ turisiw tɛmɛ siraw la. UO be seka kɛ mɔbili gansan kɔnɔ nin bolodali ɲuman kli ye nka mɔbili 4 x 4 de laɲini neno kosɛbɛ ani yɔrɔ camaw be sɔrɔ nin mɔbili  4 x 4 sen jan ba dɔ ye. A bil'i kun na bolodaliwaatila ko ali na sɔrɔ Sud-Afiriki suma neno, a gɛrɛfɛ jamanaw bɛ tɛ. Visa ɲininfɛnw an'a sɔngɔn be yɛlɛma kabɔ jamanaw dɔ la ka ta jamana dɔ la ani be ɛnfiliyanse nin i beka jamana mina ye. Jamana kelenw kelenw ka sariya kɛrɛnkɛrɛni fɛnɛ beyi min jatogola yɛrɛdɛmɛ fɛnw minunw kan ka kɛ mɔbili kɔnɔ.
question: Fɛn juman ma fɔ tɛmɛsiran in kɔnɔ ni turisiw ka kan k’o dɔn n’u bɛ farafinna worodugu yanfa yala?
mc_answer1: Danfaraw bɛ jamanaw ka Visas ɲinifɛw cɛ
mc_answer2: Yala mɔbilila o ye cogoya ɲuman ye ka yɔrɔ ye minnu tɛ sira dɔnnen kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer3: Farafinna worudugu yanfa kɛrɛfɛ jamanaw fanba bɛɛ suma neno

flores_passage: Dɔnila Farafina Wɔrɔdugu yanfan fɛ mɔbilila ye cogoya ɲuman ba ye k'o maraw cɛnan ye ani ka se yɔrɔw la minunw tɛ kɛ turisiw tɛmɛ siraw la. Jamana kelenw kelenw ka sariya kɛrɛnkɛrɛni fɛnɛ beyi min jatogola yɛrɛdɛmɛ fɛnw minunw kan ka kɛ mɔbili kɔnɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun bɛ se ka jate nafɔ bilasirali jugu ka ɲɛsin turisi ma minnu b’a ɲini ka farafinna worodugu yala?
mc_answer1: Mobili kɔnɔ jatigɛla yɛrɛdɛmɛ fɛnw bɛ wajibiya sariya fɛ
mc_answer2: Hali ni 4x4 laɲini neno, yɔrɔ camanw bɛ sɔrɔ ni bɛ mɔbili gansan
mc_answer3: Mɔbili woyasi kaɲi kosɛbɛ mɔgɔw ma minnu b’a ɲini ka sirakɔrɔw bila
mc_answer4: Farafinna Worodugu yanfan lamini jamanaw bɛɛ lajɛli tɛ hakika ye

flores_passage: Tɔw ka walisiw tali - Kan'i ka minɛnw fiyɛn i ɲɛ t'u ye yɔrɔmina, kɛrɛnkɛniyala tumamina i beka jamanaw furɔntiyɛriw tigɛ. I be se kana i yɛrɛ sɔrɔ nin durɔgu ye ka sɔrɔ i ma bɔ a kalama, min bena i dɔn kunbalan baw la. O ye ka kɔnɔli kɛ aran na, inafɔ durɔgu kasama wuluw be seka itilize waatibɛɛ la ka sɔrɔ i t'a kalama. Jamana dɔw ka ɲangiliw ka fari ka dama tɛmɛ ali nin sariyasɔsɔ fɔlɔw lo; o seka kɛ san 10 kaso ye walima si kaso. Minɛnw bolobololen ye zɔnw ka sibulu ye ani be seka fɛnɛ famaw sɔnmu janya kɔsilila kabɔ bɔmu faratiw ma.
question: Nin fɛn juman kelen ma fɔ tɛmɛsiran in kɔnɔ n’o bɛ se ka kɛ farati ye ka kɛɲɛ ni minɛnw bilali yɔrɔ la ɲɛ t’a yɔrɔ min?
mc_answer2: I bɛ se ka i yɛrɛ sɔrɔ ni dɔrɔku ye kasɔrɔ i ma bɔ a kalama
mc_answer3: U bɛ sa ka ɲagami mɔgɔwɛrɛ taw la
mc_answer4: Famaw bɛ se ka filɛ nafɔ bɔmu farati dɔ

flores_passage: Tɔw ka walisiw tali - Kan'i ka minɛnw fiyɛn i ɲɛ t'u ye yɔrɔmina, kɛrɛnkɛniyala tumamina i beka jamanaw furɔntiyɛriw tigɛ. Minɛnw bolobololen ye zɔnw ka sibulu ye ani be seka fɛnɛ famaw sɔnmu janya kɔsilila kabɔ bɔmu faratiw ma.
question: Mun ma fɔ tɛmɛsira in kɔnɔ ka ɲɛsin i yɛrɛsɔrɔli ni dɔrɔgu ye?
mc_answer1: Jamana dɔw kɔnɔ, sariyasɔsɔlafɔlɔw bɛ se ka ɲangi ni si kaso
mc_answer2: Jantoli labɛn ka kan ka kɛ n’i bɛna woyase diɲɛ kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Dɔrɔku kasasama wuluw bɛ se ka utilize kasɔrɔ i t’a kalama
mc_answer4: Fangaw bɛ se ka i ka fɛnw minnɛ i la, hali ni dɔrɔgu t’i kun

flores_passage: I ka so fa nin kafe dunlen ba ye sɔkɔmada fɛ ani kamomili te lafiyalan dɔni sufɛ. Nin i be sokɔnɔ konze la, waati b'i bolo ka mako do i yɛrɛla ani ka miniti dama damani ta ka fɛni kɛrɛnkɛrɛnle dɔ wili ka min. Nin i beka taɲɛ santi, opɔrtinite in minɛ ka jirinɔnɔ walima jirinɔnɔ gosilen dɔ ɲagama ɲɔgɔna. Lala i bena seka minfɛn nɔgɔmani dɔ kodɔn i be seka min dilan daraka la tumamina nin i segin na ka ta i ka diɲɛ baarakɔrɔw la. In i balolen dugu dɔ kɔnɔ nin minfɛn camaw tabolo ye, ta bariw la walima minfɛn yɔrɔw gɛrɛfɛralaw la i tɛ ta minunw na.
question: Minfɛn nɔgɔmani juman kelen ma fɔ n’o bɛ se ka kɛ fɛn ye i bɛ se ka lajɛ ka min dilan sɔkɔnɔkɔnse waati?

flores_passage: I ka so fa nin kafe dunlen ba ye sɔkɔmada fɛ ani kamomili te lafiyalan dɔni sufɛ. Nin i be sokɔnɔ konze la, waati b'i bolo ka mako do i yɛrɛla ani ka miniti dama damani ta ka fɛni kɛrɛnkɛrɛnle dɔ wili ka min. Nin i beka taɲɛ santi, opɔrtinite in minɛ ka jirinɔnɔ walima jirinɔnɔ gosilen dɔ ɲagama ɲɔgɔna. Lala i bena seka minfɛn nɔgɔmani dɔ kodɔn i be seka min dilan daraka la tumamina nin i segin na ka ta i ka diɲɛ baarakɔrɔw la. In i balolen dugu dɔ kɔnɔ nin minfɛn camaw tabolo ye, ta bariw la walima minfɛn yɔrɔw gɛrɛfɛralaw la i tɛ ta minunw na.
question: I ka kan ka ta nin fɛn juman kelen lajɛ sɔkɔnɔkɔnse waati n’i ka dugu dɔnnen bɛ n’a ka minfɛn tabolo ye?
mc_answer1: Kafe-fereyɔrɔ min b’i ka sigida kɔfɛ
mc_answer3: I tɛ deli ka ta bari minnu na
mc_answer4: Dumuni fere yɔrɔ min bɛ kamomili te wili

flores_passage: Haldarsŋik wulakɔnɔna be gɛrɛfɛ Eysturoy gun lajɛli di ani san bisegin egilizi suguya dɔ b'a kɔnɔ. Egilizi kuru kɔnɔ, tuganiw kabaru dilane ɲuman beyi kaburuw sanfɛ. A be lɛri kelen ni tilan bɔ ka ta munu munu nin wulakɔnɔna kabakoma in na.
question: Tubani dilannenw bɛ yɔrɔ juman?
mc_answer1: Ani dugu cɛ ye lɛri kelen ni tila ye

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ i mako tɛna se wiza ma lajɛli fitiniw la jamana dɔw la inafɔ turisi walima baara okumu kɔnɔ, tagali yen inafɔ kɔfɛ kalanden waaticamala mako toli kuntalajan la ka tɛmɛ tagali yen dɔrɔ inafɔ tile damadɔni turisi. bakurubala, tolila kɔfɛ jamana fɛnw fɛnw kɔnɔ waatikuntalajan la bena ɲinin i fɛ ka wiza ɲinin ka bila. kalanden wizaw ɲininli fɛnw tɛ kelen waaticamala ani a sɔrɔli baaraw turisiw gansanw fɛ walima baarakɛ wizaw. Jamana camaw fɛ, i mako be se jɛndili sɛbɛn ma kabɔ kalanyɔrɔ i be fɛ kana kalankɛ yɔrɔ mina, ani waari pirewu k'i si yɛrɛ kɔrɔ san kelen boɲɔgɔngola i ka kalan kɔnɔ. kunafoni fɛrɛfɛsiyalenw lajɛ nin kalanyɔrɔ ye, ani jamana imigirasiyɔn baarakɛyɔrɔ bɔnda i be fɛka ta kalan kɛ yɔrɔmina.
question: Wiza suguya juman b’a laɲini i ka na ni waari perewu ye min b’a jira k’i bɛ s’i yɛrɛ kɔrɔ?

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ i mako tɛna se wiza ma lajɛli fitiniw la jamana dɔw la inafɔ turisi walima baara okumu kɔnɔ, tagali yen inafɔ kɔfɛ kalanden waaticamala mako toli kuntalajan la ka tɛmɛ tagali yen dɔrɔ inafɔ tile damadɔni turisi. bakurubala, tolila kɔfɛ jamana fɛnw fɛnw kɔnɔ waatikuntalajan la bena ɲinin i fɛ ka wiza ɲinin ka bila. kalanden wizaw ɲininli fɛnw tɛ kelen waaticamala ani a sɔrɔli baaraw turisiw gansanw fɛ walima baarakɛ wizaw. question: Jɔni mako bɛ na jɔ kosɛbɛ wisa kuntalajan?
mc_answer1: Turisi min bɛ na san o san

flores_passage: Tilamala, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, i kan ka janto sosow la nin i y'a latikɛ ka tama kunkofin kɔnɔ. Ali nin i be ka mɔbili boli kunkofin kɔnɔ, sekɔni dama damaniw nin mɔbili da yɛlɛli ye waatimina i be dɔn a kɔnɔ be seka to sosow be dɔn mɔbili kɔnɔ nin i ye.
question: Waati juman, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenyala, i ka kan k’i janto sosow la?

flores_passage: Tilamala, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala, i kan ka janto sosow la nin i y'a latikɛ ka tama kunkofin kɔnɔ. Ali nin i be ka mɔbili boli kunkofin kɔnɔ, sekɔni dama damaniw nin mɔbili da yɛlɛli ye waatimina i be dɔn a kɔnɔ be seka to sosow be dɔn mɔbili kɔnɔ nin i ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, i ka kan k’i janto mun na walasa k’i yɛrɛ kisi soso ma n’i bɛ mɔbili bolila kunkofin kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Ka mɔbili daw yɛlɛnnen to waati jan kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Ni bɛ mɔbili boli tilema fɛ
mc_answer3: Ni bɛ mɔbili boli yɔrɔ nɛɛmalenw la
mc_answer4: Ka mɔbili jɔ ɲɛ t’a ye yɔrɔ min n’i bɛ tama

flores_passage: Sunbarbans ye diɲɛ kɔkɔjidabolo ba ye, min janya ye kilomɛtiri 80 ye (50 mi) ka ta bangladeshi kɔnɔ ani Inde dugukolo kan kabɔ kɔkɔjidagolola. Sundarbans kofɔla inafɔ UNESCO World Heritage Site. Kunko fan min be Inde dugukolo kɔnɔ ye min be wele Sundarbans Dugu Pariki. Kunko ninunw tɛ jijukɔrɔ bin dɔrɔn ye ali na sɔrɔ - u be kunkoba laban tɔlenw ta min kun be Gangetic kulu datugu dɔn tɛmɛnula. Sundarbans be yɔrɔ kilomɛtiri ba 3850 te ta, kabɔ minunw tilan sabana yɔrɔw datuguleno nin ji ani lɛkɔnɔnaw ye. Kabini san ba 1966,  Sundarbans kɛra kunko latolen ye, ani a jateminɛleno ko Bengal Tigiri Ruyaliw kɛmɛ 400 beyi sinsin ani makalani nɔnman 30.000 o yɔrɔ in na.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nin kuma juman kelen tɛ tiɲɛ ye Sunbarbans kukan?
mc_answer2: A bɛ yɔrɔ min na o datugunnen bɛ ni lɛkɔnɔnan ye
mc_answer4: A kɛra mankalanin nɔnma dagayɔrɔ ye ka tɛmɛ Bengal tigiri kan

question: Kunko in fan juman bɛ Inde dugukolo kan?

flores_passage: Diɲɛ kanw ka nin 5000 ye, nin min fɔbaga ka ca nin mɔgɔ miliyɔn 20 ani 50 ye walima min ka ca nin o ye. Daɲɛ sɛbɛniw famuya kadi waatidɔw la nɔgɔyala nin daɲɛ fɔlen ye fɛnɛ. O ye diɲɛ ye kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala nin yɔrɔ tɔw ye, minunw fɔli ko ɲuman ka gɛlɛ waatidɔw la. Jamana dɔw mɔgɔw be angilɛ fɔ kaɲɛ cogoɲuman bala, ani ali na sɔrɔ i be seka a dɔni dalen ye - kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala denmisɛniw cɛla.. Miri, n'i sɔna, Manchester duguden, Boston duguden, Jamaique duguden, ani Sydney duguden sigilen tabali gɛrɛfɛ ka suradɔn dumuni kɛyɔrɔ dɔ la Toronto kɔnɔ. U be ɲɔgɔn nisondiya nin nzirinw ye kabɔ u ka duguw la, min ka fɔ u kanw fɔcogow la ani nin u ka dugu kuma kɛrɛnkɛrɛnlenw ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, a dɔgɔyara cogo o cogo Angilɛ kan famuya dannen bɛ se ka sɔrɔ jɔn na?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ minnu ka kan fɔta dɔgɔyalen ye fila ye

flores_passage: Diɲɛ kanw ka nin 5000 ye, nin min fɔbaga ka ca nin mɔgɔ miliyɔn 20 ani 50 ye walima min ka ca nin o ye. Daɲɛ sɛbɛniw famuya kadi waatidɔw la nɔgɔyala nin daɲɛ fɔlen ye fɛnɛ. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsiran ye, mun fɔli ka gɛlɛn?

flores_passage: Bisiw be bɔ karitiyew ɲɔgɔncɛ bisi jɔyɔrɔla (ka tɛmɛ jifɛ) tile kɔnɔ, ali na sɔrɔ camaw, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala minunw be ɲɛsin kɔrɔnma ani Jakar/Bumthang be b'ɔ sanga 6:30 ani 7:30 ɲɔgɔncɛ. Komi karitiye ɲɔgɔncɛ bisiw faleno waatcamana, a ɲinineno ka tikɛ san tile dama damani kabila. Karitiye camaw tali be kɛ nin Japanese Coaster Buses ye, min lafiya kabɔn ani u jaleno. Takisiw minunw be tilan ye cogoay telima ani lafiyalen ye ka woyaze gɛrɛfɛ yɔrɔw la inafɔ Paro (Nu 150) ani Punakha (Nu 200).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, nin lahaliya juman kelen de bɛ se ka fisaya woyasikɛla ma min bɛ k’a ɲɛsigi ka bisi dɔ ta karitiyew ni ɲɔgɔncɛ bisiyɔrɔ la?
mc_answer1: Woyasikɛla nin ɲɛsinnen bɛ Jakar ma w’a ye tike dɔ san ka bila
mc_answer2: Woyasikɛla nin ɲɛsinnen bɛ Bumthang ma w’a ka kan ka bɔ sanga 7
mc_answer3: Woyasikɛla nin ɲɛsinnen bɛ Paro ma wa ka kan ka bɔ sanga 11 tɛmɛnnen kɔfɛ
mc_answer4: Woyasikɛla in ɲɛsinnen bɛ Tilebinyafan ma w’a bɛ se bisiyɔrɔ la sani sanga 6:20 cɛ

flores_passage: Bisiw be bɔ karitiyew ɲɔgɔncɛ bisi jɔyɔrɔla (ka tɛmɛ jifɛ) tile kɔnɔ, ali na sɔrɔ camaw, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala minunw be ɲɛsin kɔrɔnma ani Jakar/Bumthang be b'ɔ sanga 6:30 ani 7:30 ɲɔgɔncɛ. question: Mun bɛ se k’a kɛ bilasirali kan ɲuman ye turisi ma min bɛ fɛ ka bisi ta karitiye-ni-ɲɔgɔncɛ bisitayɔrɔ la ka woyase ka ta tilebin fɛ?
mc_answer1: Bisiw tɛ ta ni 8:30 tɛmɛnnen tɛ
mc_answer2: Ka tike san tile damadamani ka bila
mc_answer3: Bisiw caman bɛ bɔ tile kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Takisi minnu bɛ tila olu bɛ se ka kɛ woyasi cogoya bɛɛ la ɲuman ye

flores_passage: "Farani a dɔnbaliyagɛlɛya kan, ""Tombouctou"" nana nati inafɔ dugu janw ani fɔlɔfɔlɔ duguw wele tɔgɔ ye. Bibi in na, Tombouctou ye fanta dugu ye, ali na sɔrɔ a tɔgɔ be turisiw sama, ani ayeropɔri beyi. San ba 1990 kɔnɔ, a kun farala Diɲɛ Cɛnw Mayɔrɔ Minunw be Faratila kan, ko sababu kɛ desɛri cɛncɛn farati ye. O kun ye jɔyɔrɔ ba kelen dɔ ye Henry Louis Gates ka PBS special Wonders of the African World kɔnɔ. Dugu in kun ye jamana dugu tɔw kontirɛrili ye, bari  Arabu cogoya kabɔn ka tɛmɛ a ka farafin ya kan."
question: Nin fɛn juman kelen tɛ Tombouctou ɲɛfɔli hakika ye?
mc_answer1: A Arabu cogoya ka bɔn ka tɛmɛ jamana fan tɔw kan
mc_answer4: Hali sisan a bɛ turisiw sama

flores_passage: "Farani a dɔnbaliyagɛlɛya kan, ""Tombouctou"" nana nati inafɔ dugu janw ani fɔlɔfɔlɔ duguw wele tɔgɔ ye. Bibi in na, Tombouctou ye fanta dugu ye, ali na sɔrɔ a tɔgɔ be turisiw sama, ani ayeropɔri beyi. Dugu in kun ye jamana dugu tɔw kontirɛrili ye, bari  Arabu cogoya kabɔn ka tɛmɛ a ka farafin ya kan."
question: Nin wale juman kelen ye tiɲɛ ye Tombouctou kun kan?
mc_answer1: Pankurun tɛ ta dugun in kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Dugu kɔrɔ don ka tɛmɛ fantan dugu ka
mc_answer3: A ka farafinyan cogoya kadɔgɔn ka tɛmɛ a lamini duguw ta kan
mc_answer4: Dugu in tɛ tusisiw sama tun

flores_passage: Paralympics bena kɛ kabɔ Utikalo tile 24 ka ta bila Sɛtanburu kalo tile 5 2021. Tulɔnkɛbaara dɔ bena kɛ yɔrɔw Japon kɔnɔ. Tokyo bena kɛ Asie dugu kelen dɔrɔn ye ka Olympique tilemafɛ zuye kun bɛ, nin zuyew kun bɛli ye san 1964 kɔnɔ. Nin i y'i ka pankuru woyazi ɲɛminɛ kabila ani siyɔrɔ 2020 yani abɔlen a ma kun mafɔ, i bena kɛ lala cogoya gɛlɛn na. Abɔli ama sariyaw be falen, nka inafɔ Marisi laban na, bɔli ama sariyaw ko sababu kɛ korona banakisɛ ye te sama ka ta fo Zuwekalo 2020, nin Olympique zuyew bolodara kura ye. Sigikɛleno a kan ko tike bena kɛ yan 2500 ani 130.000 ɲɔgɔncɛ, nin tike nɔrɔmali munu munu ni ye yan 7000 gɛrɛfɛ.
question: Olympique tilemafɛ tun bolodara ka bɛn waati fɔlɔ juman ma?

flores_passage: "Fiyɛnkolɔn ye fiyɛn fitini munu munata ye, min be gɛrɛfɛyɔrɔ fiyɛn sama kado kɔnɔ ani kɔɔfɛ. U be fiyɛn baw nati (waatidɔw la kilomɛtiri 100-200 lɛrila) ani be seka fɛn giramaw kɔrɔtan fiyɛn la, k'u ta ka ta tumamina fiyɛn kolɔn be bɔ a nɔna. U be daminɛ inafɔ antonurayi ka jigin kabɔ kabakolow fiyɛn la, ani be kɛ ""fiyɛn kolɔn"" ye tumamina u be maka tugumakolola."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, hakɛ jumɛn na fiyɛn antonurayi bɛ yɛlɛma ka kɛ fiyɛn kolɔn?
mc_answer1: Tuma min fiyɛn bɛ se kilomɛtɛrɛ 100 dafɛ lɛrila
mc_answer2: Tuma min fiyɛn fitini bɛ munu munu daminɛ
mc_answer3: Tuma min a bɛ jigin kabɔ kabakolow fiyɛn la

flores_passage: "Fiyɛnkolɔn ye fiyɛn fitini munu munata ye, min be gɛrɛfɛyɔrɔ fiyɛn sama kado kɔnɔ ani kɔɔfɛ. U be fiyɛn baw nati (waatidɔw la kilomɛtiri 100-200 lɛrila) ani be seka fɛn giramaw kɔrɔtan fiyɛn la, k'u ta ka ta tumamina fiyɛn kolɔn be bɔ a nɔna. U be daminɛ inafɔ antonurayi ka jigin kabɔ kabakolow fiyɛn la, ani be kɛ ""fiyɛn kolɔn"" ye tumamina u be maka tugumakolola."
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen ye kunnafoni tigitigi ye fiyɛn kolon kan?
mc_answer1: Tuma bɛɛ u bɛ fiyɛn wili ka surunya kilomɛtɛrɛ 100-200 lɛrila
mc_answer2: U bɛ fɛn girinmaw cɛ u fɛ waatidɔw
mc_answer3: U bɛ yɛlɛma ka kɛ antonurayi ye tumamina u be maka tugumakolola
mc_answer4: Olu ye fiyɛn fitiniw ye minnu bɛ fiyɛn sama kata kɔfɛ

flores_passage: Nin i bena jamana min lajɛ kofɔla woyasi ladilikan gafe dɔ kɔnɔ, i woyasi kɛnɛya asiransi walima woyasi boli ama asiransi be seka kɔlɔlɔ sɔrɔ. I be seka kanu lala ka gɔfɛrɛnemanw ka ladilikanw lajɛ nin i yɛrɛ ta ye, nka u ka ladilikan dilana u ka jamanadenw de kama, Misali kelen dɔrɔn, Ameriki jamanadenw Muwayɛnoriyan la be seka cogoya camaw ye kabɔ Erɔpeyɛnw walima Arabuw ma. Ladilikanw ye dɔrɔn dakuruɲɛ dama damani ye jamana dɔ politi ko cogoya kan. Yetaw minunw be jira ka teli waaticama, ye barakuruba ye ani ka nɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ sumalila nin kunafoni pɛrɛnpɛrɛnlatigɛlenw camaw ye min be sɔrɔ fan wɛrɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, woyasi kɛla kan ka politigi ko cogoyaw kunnafoniw sɔrɔ yɔrɔ jumɛn u bɛna woyazi ka taa jamana min na?
mc_answer1: Kabɔ jamana gɔfɛrɛneman yɔrɔ u bɛna taa jamana min lajɛ
mc_answer2: Kabɔ yeta minnu bɛ jirala woyazi ladilikanw kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Kabɔ jamanadenw yɔrɔ u bɛna taa jamana min lajɛ
mc_answer4: Kabɔ u yɛrɛ ka gɔfɛrɛneman yɔrɔ

flores_passage: Nin i bena jamana min lajɛ kofɔla woyasi ladilikan gafe dɔ kɔnɔ, i woyasi kɛnɛya asiransi walima woyasi boli ama asiransi be seka kɔlɔlɔ sɔrɔ. I be seka kanu lala ka gɔfɛrɛnemanw ka ladilikanw lajɛ nin i yɛrɛ ta ye, nka u ka ladilikan dilana u ka jamanadenw de kama, Misali kelen dɔrɔn, Ameriki jamanadenw Muwayɛnoriyan la be seka cogoya camaw ye kabɔ Erɔpeyɛnw walima Arabuw ma. Ladilikanw ye dɔrɔn dakuruɲɛ dama damani ye jamana dɔ politi ko cogoya kan. Yetaw minunw be jira ka teli waaticama, ye barakuruba ye ani ka nɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ sumalila nin kunafoni pɛrɛnpɛrɛnlatigɛlenw camaw ye min be sɔrɔ fan wɛrɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni woyazi ladilikanw hakilina ye, mun ni mun man teli ka jamana wɛrɛ mɔgɔ sɔrɔ?
mc_answer1: Kɛnɛya asiransi min ye kɔlɔlɔ sɔrɔ bɔli a ma
mc_answer2: Dakuruɲɛ dama damani barakurubaw jamana in politi ko cogoya kan
mc_answer3: Kɛnɛya asiransi min ye kɔlɔlɔ sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Kunnafoni kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw min bɛ boli jamana marali kun kan

flores_passage: Woyasi azansiw kun beyi kabini siyɛkili 19 na. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, woyasi suguya jumɛn kelen de ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ min tɛ taa woyasi ɲɛnɛbɔba baarakɛla ka dɛmɛ kɔ ka marali kɛ?
mc_answer1: Ɲɔgɔn ye baara hukumu kɔnɔ woyasi ka ta dugu la woyasi kɛla delila ka taa yɔrɔ min ka tɛmɛ
mc_answer2: Dɔgɔkun--fila janya woyasi min taa len do waaribɔta kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dô kosɛbɛ
mc_answer4: Woyasi kɛla dɔ ka woyazi fɔlɔ jamana kɔfɛ

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, sinariyo jumɛn kelen na woyazi kɛla bɛ nafan caman sɔrɔ ni woyasi ɲɛnɛbɔba baarakɛla ka dɛmɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Tuma min woyasikɛla bɛka taanikasegin tikè mara ka woyazi ka t'u ka dugu la
mc_answer2: Tuma min dugutaala bɛ fɛ ka kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala woyasi suguya dɔ marali kɛ a siyɛn fɔlɔ
mc_answer3: Tuma min woyasi kɛla bɛ se ka kuma yɛrɛ lafiyɛn yɔrɔ dugu kan na ka ɲɛ
mc_answer4: Tuma min woyasi kɛla bɛ woyasi kɛ yɔrɔ dɔ la yɔrɔ minna balo cogoya danfaraw ni u ta ka surun

flores_passage: "Fɛnw camaw beyi i kan ka min jateminɛ yani and tumamina i be ka woyase ka ta yɔrɔ dɔ la. Nin i be woyase, sigi a kana kow tɛna kɛ inafɔ ""so"". Kɛjogow, sariyaw, dumuni, sirasariyaw, siyɔrɔ ani baloco sariyaw, kan ani dɔ wɛrɛ tɛna kɛ inafɔ i kun be yɔrɔ mina cogoyala. O ye fɛn ye i kan ka min bila i kun na, ka jigifabaliya bali walima lala ali yɔrɔ ko kɛ cogow kanu baliya."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, fɛn jumɛn bɛ se ka woyasi kɛla dɛmɛ ka jigifabaliya bali tuma min a bɛ woyase ka taa dugu kuraw la?
mc_answer1: Ka sigi ni balocogo kelenw ye inafɔ u bɔyɔrɔ
mc_answer2: Sɔnni ka dumuni nɛnɛ u tɛ minnu dɔn
mc_answer3: K’u bɛrɛ bɛn sariya kelenw ma inafɔ u bɔyɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Ɲininiw so ko la yani ka se balili

flores_passage: "Fɛnw camaw beyi i kan ka min jateminɛ yani and tumamina i be ka woyase ka ta yɔrɔ dɔ la. Nin i be woyase, sigi a kana kow tɛna kɛ inafɔ ""so"". question: Ka sinsin kunnafoni ni tɛmɛ sira in ye,mɔgɔ suguya jumɛn de se a dɔla ka jigifabaliya sɔrɔ tuma min nin i ne woyazi ka taa kɔfɛ Jamana dɔ la?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min bɛ yɔrɔwɛrɛ dumuniw fɛ

flores_passage: In i beka woyase ka ta jamana dewelopeni dɔ la siyɛnfɔlɔla - walima diɲɛ fan kura dɔ fɛ - kana tabolo ɲɔgɔn kunbɛn kɔlɔlɔ kɛ bolokɔfɛ fɛn ye. Woyasikɛla basigilen ani seba camaw ma se k'u yɛrɛ sɔrɔ ka da jamana taganyɛfɛ woyasi tabolo kuraw kan, yɔrɔmina tabolo fitiniw degiliw be fara ɲɔgɔnkan teliyala. Kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala i ka tile fɔlɔw la, a ɲinin ka gɛrɛfɛ kosɛbɛ Erɔpu balolicogola ani otɛli, dumuniw ani sɛriwisi ɲumanw k'i dɛmɛ degilila. Kana sunɔkɔ dilan kan walima sɛriwiyɛtiw duguma yɔrɔw la i tɛ minunw maara kunkokɔnɔna dɔn. Nin i bena sigi kɛrɛma, nani sigili dilan ye walima jɔ walasa ka saw, buntɛniw ani o ɲɔgɔnaw gɛn ka bɔyi.
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen ma tɛ bilasirali kan ɲuman ye taama kɛlaw man tuma min na i be ka woyase ka ta yɔrɔ dɔ la u siyɛn fɔlɔ?
mc_answer1: A ɲini i ka maara kunkokɔnɔna dɔn yani i k'i da duguman
mc_answer2: Gɛrɛli kosɛbɛ bali dumuni la i seli tile fɔlɔw kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Sigili dilan walima jɔ laɲini ne don nin i bena sigi kɛrɛma
mc_answer4: Wari don dunanjigiso ɲuman da fɛ fɔlɔ ni sera

flores_passage: In i beka woyase ka ta jamana dewelopeni dɔ la siyɛnfɔlɔla - walima diɲɛ fan kura dɔ fɛ - kana tabolo ɲɔgɔn kunbɛn kɔlɔlɔ kɛ bolokɔfɛ fɛn ye. question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen ma fɔ inafɔ fɛn min kan ka gɛrɛfɛ kosɛbɛ n'i bɛ fɛ k'i dege jamana dewelopeni dɔ la?
mc_answer3: Dilan walima sɛriwiyɛtiw dɔ ka t'i sigi kɛrɛma

flores_passage: "I ka kontira ani kontira wele kunafoniw dilan ani k'u bila i kun ka yala. U mako be ka asuransi ka imeyili jira ani nɛgɛjuruw jira ladilikanw, jɛnw ani laɲiniw siratigɛ fɛ. Sɛbɛn kopi kelen bila i ka walizi kɔnɔ ani ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ (imɛyili bataki c'i yɛrɛ ma nin tugulanw ye, walima a mara ""kabanɔkɔ"" kɔnɔ). Nin be seka woyaze nin ɔridinatɛri walima tabilɛti ye, sɛbɛn kopi dɔ mara memuwari kan walima disiki (min be sɔrɔ ali ni ɛntɛrɛnɛti tɛ). Kontara sɛbɛn kelen fɛnɛ di i woyazi kɛɲɔgɔnw ma ani balimaw walima tɛriw so minunw b'a fɛ ki dɛmɛ."
question: Ninnu sira jumɛnw de kaɲi kosɛbɛ kɔntira tigi min bɛ fɛ ka viritiyali kopi dɔ mara, nka a bɛ se ka kɛ ɛntɛrinɛti t'a bolo?
mc_answer1: Ka kopi dɔ di taama ɲɔgɔn man
mc_answer2: Ka kopi dɔ ci i yɛrɛ ka imeyili
mc_answer3: Ka kopi dɔ mara u ka ɔridinatɛri memuwari kan

flores_passage: Filimu cogoya camaw beyi minunw natila san cama tɛmɛni kɔnɔ. Filimu nɔrɔmali 35 (36 nin 24 milimɛtiri negatiwu ye) ye kodɔnlen ba ye. A beka falen fitini dɔrɔn nin a bana, ani be rezolisiyɔn di min be seka suma nin sisan DSLR ye. Filimu fɔrima fitini kamera dɔw be 6 nin 6 cm fɔrima itilize, kɛrɛnkɛrɛniyala 56 nin 56 mm negatiwu. question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ninnu jumɛn kelen bɛ se ka kɛ a dɔ la sen laban ye ni bɛka woyasi sɛbɛni baaraw daminɛ?
mc_answer1: Toka sɛbɛni sɛbɛn kɛcogoya taa ni ka segin
mc_answer2: Artikiliw badenba sɛbɛn taama bulɔgi lakodonnen ba dɔ ye
mc_answer3: I yɛrɛ tɔgɔla ɛntɛrinɛti siti dilan
mc_answer4: K'i ka sɛbɛnin kɛliw dɔnniya taɲɛ

flores_passage: Sira nɔgɔmani ba ka woyasi sɛbɛni baaraw daminɛ ye k'i ka dɔniya taɲɛ ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ woyasi bulɔgi siti jɔlen dɔ kan. Tumanina nin i degila sɛbɛni sɛbɛn kɛcogoya ani sɛbɛn kɛliw la ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ, ola kɔfɛ, i be sekana lala i yɛrɛ ka ɛntɛrɛnɛti siti dilan,
question: Waati min i bɛ woyasi sɛbɛni baaraw kɛ, ninnu se jumɛnw kelen de fɔlɔ fɔlɔ kaɲi ka ladilan halibi?

flores_passage: So, ko sababu kɛ waatibɛɛ bilali ye maarayɔrɔ banakisɛ la, a ka c'ala i lakana neno kabɔ nin bana ninunw ma. Nka diɲɛ fan dɔw fɛ, yɔrɔmina kunkokɔnɔ ye kura y'i ɲɛna, a ka c'ala kosɛbɛ i bana kunbalanw sɔrɔ. Yɔrɔ kalamaw la banakisɛw be bugun fɛnɛ teliyala ani be balo waatijan la farikolo kɔfɛ. Ola, Delhi Belly Kunbalanw, Pharaon ka Daga, Montezuma ka Tasarali ani u ter wɛrɛw. Inafɔ nɛnɛkirila kunbalanw yɔrɔ sumaniw la, kɔnɔna kunbalanw yɔrɔ kalamaw la ka ca ani cogoya camaw la be mɔgɔw tɔrɔ nka tɛ farati ye.
question: Yɔrɔ jumɛn kelen na kɔnɔna kunbalanw ka c'a la ka sɔrɔ ?

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, waati bɛɛ bilali bɛ se k’i lakana kabɔ fɛn jumɛn bana ma?

flores_passage: Erɔpu ye kontinan ye min ka dɔgɔ cogoyala nka nin jamana camaw ye minunw y'u ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyaw ta. Cogoya boloda ko ɲumana, woyali kɛli jamana camaw kɔnɔ be tɛmɛli jira wiza sɔrɔli baaraw fɛɛ ani pasipɔri lajɛli siyɛn camaw la. Schengen maara, nka, be baara kɛ cogoyala inafɔ jamana kelen nin siratigɛ fɛ K'i to maara in kɔnɔ, i be seka furɔntiyɛriw tikɛ hali i ma tɛmɛ pasipɔri lajɛli yɔrɔw fɛ tugun. O cogo kelen na, nin Schengen wiza b'i bolo, i mako tɛ ka wiza ɲinin ka ta Schengen jamana dɔla tuguni, ola o ye waati mara ye, waari ani sɛbɛnkɔw baaraw.
question: Ninnu jumɛn ye nafa dɔ ye n’'i bɛ woyazi Schengen maara kɔnɔ?
mc_answer1: Tɛmɛ baliya wiza baaraw siyɛn caman fɛ
mc_answer3: Tɛmɛ baliya pasipɔri lajɛli yɔrɔw siyɛn caman fɛ
mc_answer4: Furɔntiyɛriw tikɛli hali i ma tɛmɛ pasipɔri lajɛ

flores_passage: Tutankhamun Kaburu (KV62). KV62 be seka kɛ lala kaburuw la kodɔnlen ba ye u Kulu la, Howard Carter ka 1922 masakɛ denmisɛni kaburu yɛlmabali yeli yɔrɔ. Sumalen nin masakɛ kaburuw tɔw ye, nka, Tutankhamun kaburu lajɛli nafan ma bɔn kosɛbɛ, nin a ka tɔgɔya ani nin masiri fitini ye. Mɔgɔ min be fɛ ka kɔlɔlɔ min kɛra sumaralen ye a ɲɛna waatimina o y'a ɲinin ka ta ka bɔ ka kɛsu kɔnɔ nimisa tɛna wasa  bari kunkolo ani kamakunw dɔrɔn de be ye Kaburu warimanfɛnw ɲuman nininw t'a kɔnɔ tuguni, nka a tara ka ta Egyptie mize kɔnɔ Caire. Lajɛlibaw waati caman tɛ minunw bolo kan ka waati tɛmɛ yɔrɔ wɛrɛla.
question: Fɛn jumɛn tɛ sɔrɔ bilen Ttankhamun kaburu la?

flores_passage: Bowen Gun ye tile woyazi kodɔnlen ye walima dɔkɔkun boli min kayaki, kululayɛlɛ, butukiw, dumuni kɛyɔrɔw ani fɛn camaw bil'aw ka bolo kan. Kulu yɛrɛ yɛrɛ be Howe Sound kɔnɔ, Vancouver kɔfɛ dɔrɔn, ani ta ka di ni jisanfɛ takisi bolodalen ye kabɔ Grandville Island ka Vancouver dugukɔnɔna. Ka ɲɛsin mɔgɔ min be kɛnɛma baaraw fɛ, tama ka ta Sea ani Sky kɔnɔna sirafɛ nafan kabɔn. Whistler (lɛri 1 ni miniti 30 boli kabɔ Vancouver) ka gɛlɛ nka kodɔnleno ko sababu kɛ 2010 Winter Olympics ye. Nɛnɛ waatila, siki kɛ yɔrɔ ɲuman dɔw Ameriki Kɔkɔdugu Yanfan fɛ jabɔ, ani tilema fɛ kulusanfɛ nɔkɔsoboli yɛrɛ yɛrɛ dɔw lajɛ.

question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, taayɔrɔ jumɛn bɛ sɔn kosɔbɛ ka taamadenw labɔ Vancouver sigi yɛrɛyɛrɛ kalama?

flores_passage: Voctoria Falls ye dugu ye Zimbabwe worodugu yanfan fɛ, furɔntiyɛri la nin Livingstone, Zambie, ani Botswana gɛrɛfɛ. Dugu dalen no masurunyala jibɔn yɔrɔwɔ gɛrɛfɛ, ani u de ye samani kɛrɛyɔrɔ ba ye, nka nin lajɛli yɔrɔ kodɔnlen ba be toli kuntagala jan opɔritinite di layalikɛlaw ani lajɛlikɛlaw ma. Samiya waatil kɔnɔ (Nowanburukalo ka Marisikalo), ji bɔnɲa be yɛlɛ ani jibɔnyɔrɔ bena cɛn kojuguya. Sikatala i be ɲiki nin ye pɔn tikɛ walima tamana sirafitiniw fɛ minunw be jibɔnyɔrɔ gɛrɛfɛ. Sira wɛrɛ fɛ, o de kama tiki tiki bari ji bɔnɲa yɛlɛneno kosɛbɛ ko ji bɔnw yɔrɔ lajɛli be dibi - nin jiw bɛɛ ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, waati jumɛnna taamadenw ka kan ka taa bɔ jijigin na n’u bɛ filɛkɛnɛjɛ ɲininna?
mc_answer1: Ka bɔ Nowanburu ka taa Marisi la

flores_passage: Voctoria Falls ye dugu ye Zimbabwe worodugu yanfan fɛ, furɔntiyɛri la nin Livingstone, Zambie, ani Botswana gɛrɛfɛ. Dugu dalen no masurunyala jibɔn yɔrɔwɔ gɛrɛfɛ, ani u de ye samani kɛrɛyɔrɔ ba ye, nka nin lajɛli yɔrɔ kodɔnlen ba be toli kuntagala jan opɔritinite di layalikɛlaw ani lajɛlikɛlaw ma. Samiya waatil kɔnɔ (Nowanburukalo ka Marisikalo), ji bɔnɲa be yɛlɛ ani jibɔnyɔrɔ bena cɛn kojuguya. Sikatala i be ɲiki nin ye pɔn tikɛ walima tamana sirafitiniw fɛ minunw be jibɔnyɔrɔ gɛrɛfɛ. Sira wɛrɛ fɛ, o de kama tiki tiki bari ji bɔnɲa yɛlɛneno kosɛbɛ ko ji bɔnw yɔrɔ lajɛli be dibi - nin jiw bɛɛ ye.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛbɛn nin ye, mun de ye Victoria Falls bɔnnali koɲuman ye Nowanburu nin Marisi cɛ?

flores_passage: Sariyaw ka ɲɛsin fototama be apilike fɛnɛ widewo anrizisitilela, lala ali min ka c'o ye. Nin fɛn dɔ fototali ma daga, ola i man ka miri ali k'a filime, Nin beka durɔni dɔ itilize, a sɛgɛsɛgɛ jɔna ka bila nin a dagaleno ka fɛn min filime ani sɛbɛn minunw walima jɛndili wɛrɛw minunw kan ka ɲinin. Duroni pani ayeropɔri dɔ walima jamamayɔrɔ kuna tɛ waaticama hakili ɲumanw ye, ali nin a dagaleno i ka maarayɔrɔla.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jumɛn tɛ kanunnen doroni kɛtɔla ka ja ta?
mc_answer1: Ka lajɛ fɔlɔ i bɛ sɛn ka min ja ta
mc_answer4: Ka ja ta jamama yɔrɔw dɔrɔn la nin doroni tɛ na sɛn ka jateminɛ

flores_passage: Sariyaw ka ɲɛsin fototama be apilike fɛnɛ widewo anrizisitilela, lala ali min ka c'o ye. Nin fɛn dɔ fototali ma daga, ola i man ka miri ali k'a filime, Nin beka durɔni dɔ itilize, a sɛgɛsɛgɛ jɔna ka bila nin a dagaleno ka fɛn min filime ani sɛbɛn minunw walima jɛndili wɛrɛw minunw kan ka ɲinin. Duroni pani ayeropɔri dɔ walima jamamayɔrɔ kuna tɛ waaticama hakili ɲumanw ye, ali nin a dagaleno i ka maarayɔrɔla.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, ja ta yɔrɔ ɲumanbaw bɛ min doroni la?
mc_answer1: Kɛrɛfɛ jamaw minnu tɛ tɔɔrɔ nin doroni nali ye
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔw la ladala nin nataliye tɛ yamaruyalen
mc_answer3: Yɔrɔ falenw na nin doroni yeli ka dɔgɔn
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔw la i ye yamaruyalisɛbɛnw sɔrɔ minnuw kunkɔrɔ ka kɔn

flores_passage: Tɔgɔsɛbɛnli ye laɲinin wɛrɛ ye wiza sɔrɔli siratamala.Jamana dɔw la, i kan k'i ka piresansi kɔfɛ ani yɔrɔmina i bena tɔyi adirɛsi nin maarayɔrɔ famaw ye. U mako be lala sɛbɛn dɔ dafalila maarayɔrɔ polisisola walima talila imigirsiyɔn baarakɛyɔrɔw la. Jamana camaw kɔnɔ, nin ni sariya sigu ye, maarayɔrɔ otɛliw be tɔgɔsɛbɛni sɛbɛn ko ɲɛnɛbɔ (jatemina ka ɲinin). Cogoya wɛrɛw la, mɔgɔw minunw jigileno yɔrɔw turisiw ka sigiyɔrɔw kɔfɛ de dɔrɔn kan ka tɔgɔsɛbɛni kɛ.Nka, o be sariya kɛ dibila fɛn ye, ola a ɲininkadɔn kabila.
question: Ka sinsin nin tɛmɛ sira ye, mankutu jumɛn jamana doninsɛbɛn tɔgɔsɛbɛn ɲɛnabɔli kunkan tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Ni bɛna to turisi jiginsow la, A bɛ sɛn ka kɛ i mako tɛ k’i tɔgɔ sɛbɛn
mc_answer2: A ɲininnendow jamana bɛɛ denw fɛ k’u tɔgɔsɛbɛn sigida sariyasow la
mc_answer3: Taamadenw ka cakɛda taali bɛ sɔn ka ɲinin i kan
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔdɔw la, sigida dunanjiginsow bɛ sɛn k’i jɔ nin tɔgɔsɛbɛn ye

flores_passage: Tɔgɔsɛbɛnli ye laɲinin wɛrɛ ye wiza sɔrɔli siratamala.Jamana dɔw la, i kan k'i ka piresansi kɔfɛ ani yɔrɔmina i bena tɔyi adirɛsi nin maarayɔrɔ famaw ye. U mako be lala sɛbɛn dɔ dafalila maarayɔrɔ polisisola walima talila imigirsiyɔn baarakɛyɔrɔw la. Jamana camaw kɔnɔ, nin ni sariya sigu ye, maarayɔrɔ otɛliw be tɔgɔsɛbɛni sɛbɛn ko ɲɛnɛbɔ (jatemina ka ɲinin). Cogoya wɛrɛw la, mɔgɔw minunw jigileno yɔrɔw turisiw ka sigiyɔrɔw kɔfɛ de dɔrɔn kan ka tɔgɔsɛbɛni kɛ.Nka, o be sariya kɛ dibila fɛn ye, ola a ɲininkadɔn kabila.
question: Jumɛn tɛ yɔrɔ ye nin turisi bɛ sɛn ka taa ka tɔgɔsɛbɛn ɲɛnabɔ?
mc_answer2: Dunanjiginso min n’u bɛ ka to ye

flores_passage: Alakamabaarakɛli tumamina nin be woyasila ye sira ɲumanba ye ka danfara bɔ nka o tɛ dili dɔrɔn kuna. Baloli ani alakamabaarakɛli jamana wɛrɛla ye sira ɲumanba ye ka tabolo wɛrɛ dɔn, mɔgɔ kura dɔn, k' yɛrɛ dɔn, ka yecogo wɛrɛ famuya ani ali ka se kuraw sɔrɔ. O be seka fɛnɛ sira ɲuman ye k'i ka waarimaralen sama ka ta ɲɛfɛ k'i ka toli janya cogoyadɔla bari alakamabaaraw camaw be so ani dumuni d'ima ani dama damaniw be sara fitini di.
question: Wɔlɔntɛriya tɛ jɔn nafa ka to taama la?
mc_answer1: Mɔgɔ min sigidalen bɛ ka teri kuraw sɔrɔ k’a to kɔkan
mc_answer2: Mɔgɔ min bɛ saraba ɲinin la
mc_answer3: Mɔgɔ jigidalen bɛ ka dɔnko kura sɔrɔ
mc_answer4: Mɔgɔ min bɛ sɔn ka kɛ so nin jiri fɛ

flores_passage: Alakamabaarakɛli tumamina nin be woyasila ye sira ɲumanba ye ka danfara bɔ nka o tɛ dili dɔrɔn kuna. Baloli ani alakamabaarakɛli jamana wɛrɛla ye sira ɲumanba ye ka tabolo wɛrɛ dɔn, mɔgɔ kura dɔn, k' yɛrɛ dɔn, ka yecogo wɛrɛ famuya ani ali ka se kuraw sɔrɔ. O be seka fɛnɛ sira ɲuman ye k'i ka waarimaralen sama ka ta ɲɛfɛ k'i ka toli janya cogoyadɔla bari alakamabaaraw camaw be so ani dumuni d'ima ani dama damaniw be sara fitini di.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, cogo jumɛn na wɔlɔntɛriya bɛ sɛn ka kɛ nafabɔfɛn ye taamaden bolodɛsɛnnɛnw ma k’u to kɔkan?
mc_answer1: Sara bɛ ɲinin ka sɔrɔ waati bɛ
mc_answer2: A bɛ na nin baara sɔrɔ sira ye
mc_answer3: So nin jiriw bɛ di fu waati dɔw la
mc_answer4: A bɛ sɛn k’i dɛmɛ ka hakilinata sɔrɔ

flores_passage: "Woyazi kɛɛli ka ta Walt Disney World la be ejita bele jira Ameriki du camaw fɛ. Lajɛli ""tigitigi"" ye ka pan ka Orlando ayeropɔru la, ka bisi ta ka o yɔrɔ Disney ɔtɛli, ka dugunu fila ɲɔgɔna kɛ yani kabɔ Disney dugu kɔnɔn ani ka segin so. Yɛlɛmali cama cogoya wɛrɛw beyi, nka in de ye mɔgɔ camaw kan bɛ min ma nin u kumana ""taali kan Disney World kɔnɔ"". Tike camaw be fere ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ ferelikɛsitiw kan inafɔ eBay walima Craigslist dɔn cama pariki tike tikɛni finitiw itilize. Ali ni o ye baara kodɔnlen ba dɔ ye, a kɔn neno Disney fɛ: tikew tɛ seka yɛlɛma."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun bɛ sɛn ka jati tana ye taama camanna ka taa Walt Disney World la?
mc_answer3: K’a ka taama bɛɛ Disney dugukolow kan
mc_answer4: ka kari ta ka bɔ pankurun jiginso la ka taa dunanjiginso la

flores_passage: "Woyazi kɛɛli ka ta Walt Disney World la be ejita bele jira Ameriki du camaw fɛ. Lajɛli ""tigitigi"" ye ka pan ka Orlando ayeropɔru la, ka bisi ta ka o yɔrɔ Disney ɔtɛli, ka dugunu fila ɲɔgɔna kɛ yani kabɔ Disney dugu kɔnɔn ani ka segin so. Tike camaw be fere ɛntɛrɛnɛti sanfɛ ferelikɛsitiw kan inafɔ eBay walima Craigslist dɔn cama pariki tike tikɛni finitiw itilize. Ali ni o ye baara kodɔnlen ba dɔ ye, a kɔn neno Disney fɛ: tikew tɛ seka yɛlɛma."
question: Mankutu jumɛn Walt Disney World kunkan n’a tɛ tiɲɛ ye?
mc_answer1: Park-hopper tikɛtiw bɛ sɛn ka di taamaden wɛrɛw ma
mc_answer2: Yɔrɔ dunanjiginso yɛrɛ bilalen b’a kɔnɔ
mc_answer3: Kariw bilalen bɛ ye ka taamadenw ta ka bɔ pankurun jiginso la ka taa u ka sow la
mc_answer4: Kile camanta tikɛtiw bɛ sɛn ka sɔrɔ sannifeere bɔlɔlɔsiraw kan

flores_passage: "Mɔgɔw mɔgɔw be ka lajɛli boloda ka jamana dɔ la min jateleno inafɔ kɛlɛkɛyɔrɔ kan ka fɔrimasiyɔn purofesiyɔnɛli kɛ. Ɲininli dɔ ɛntɛrɛnti sanfɛ ""Yɔrɔw faratilenw kalan"" kuna bena lala o maarayɔrɔ baarakɛyɔrɔ dɔ ka adirɛsiw d'i ma. Kalan in dɔ bena cogoyala kunbalaw minunw ɲɛfɔra yan nin kunafoniw bɛɛ kalankɛ, waaticama nin baarafamuya tigitigi ye. Kalan in dɔ be kɛ nɔrimalema tile 2-5 kɔnɔ ani bena kɛ roli zuye kuna, furakɛli dɛmɛli fɔlɔw camaw ani waatidɔw la marifa kalanw. Gafew ani magaziniw minunw be kunokɔnɔna baloli kan ka ca, nka gafe ganseniw min be kuma kɛlɛkɛyɔrɔ kuna ma ca."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kunkow jumɛn ka tɛli n’a bɛɛ ye ko makama k’a la baaradegin kalansow kɔnɔ ani kunnafonigafew kan?
mc_answer1: Ka sɛn ka bɔ wula kɔnɔ

flores_passage: "Mɔgɔw mɔgɔw be ka lajɛli boloda ka jamana dɔ la min jateleno inafɔ kɛlɛkɛyɔrɔ kan ka fɔrimasiyɔn purofesiyɔnɛli kɛ. Ɲininli dɔ ɛntɛrɛnti sanfɛ ""Yɔrɔw faratilenw kalan"" kuna bena lala o maarayɔrɔ baarakɛyɔrɔ dɔ ka adirɛsiw d'i ma. Kalan in dɔ bena cogoyala kunbalaw minunw ɲɛfɔra yan nin kunafoniw bɛɛ kalankɛ, waaticama nin baarafamuya tigitigi ye. Kalan in dɔ be kɛ nɔrimalema tile 2-5 kɔnɔ ani bena kɛ roli zuye kuna, furakɛli dɛmɛli fɔlɔw camaw ani waatidɔw la marifa kalanw. Gafew ani magaziniw minunw be kunokɔnɔna baloli kan ka ca, nka gafe ganseniw min be kuma kɛlɛkɛyɔrɔ kuna ma ca."
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, kalansen jumɛnw ka tɛli ka ta baaradegin kalansow kɔnɔ?
mc_answer3: Ka sɛn ka bɔ wula kɔnɔ

flores_passage: Ji tirɛtelen suguya camaw beyi, dɔw kaɲi kosɛbɛ ka bɔ kunbalanw. Maarayɔrɔ dɔw la ji wilili miniti kelen b'a bɔ, dɔ wɛrɛw la miniti camaw ɲininelɔn. Zɛnzɛnikɛlaw tɛ kelen ye ɲumayala, ani nin kunbalan dɔ beyin o la i kan ka jateminɛ ka butɔn kɔrɔ ji datugule san baarakɛyɔrɔ kodɔnle dɔ fɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, cogo jumɛn de kayin n’a bɛɛ ye yasa ka jicɛnta kɔsagon?

flores_passage: Ji funu ji sanfɛ ye ji kulu segintɔ kabɔ ji funu cilila ji da kun, waatidɔw la jisanfɛ kulu walima o ɲɔgɔna. Ko sababu kɛ jijukɔrɔla dilan cogoya ye, ji funu segin ta be sinsin yɔrɔ dɔnw fitiniw dɔrɔn kuna, ani ji funu telima kabɔ ji duguma be seka nati yen lala. Saya camaw be kɛ ko sababu kɛ sɛgɛ nɔnilila ka segin ka ji funu cɛci, min tɛ seka kɛ. Nin i bɔra waatimina dɔrɔn ji funu la, nɔnili ka segin ma gɛlɛ tuguni katɛmɛ nɔnili nɔrɔmali kan. A ɲinin ka yɔrɔ dɔ ɲinin i tɛna balan yɔrɔmina tuguni walima, kada i ka nɔni sew kan ani nin a sɔrɔ i yela, lala u be seka kɔnɔnikɛ walasa k'i bɔ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, mun bɛ ye sɔɔni nin kɛɲɛnko dow hali nɔnkɛla ŋanaw fɛ?
mc_answer3: Ka nɔn ka yɛlɛn wɔyɔ ma

flores_passage: Ji funu ji sanfɛ ye ji kulu segintɔ kabɔ ji funu cilila ji da kun, waatidɔw la jisanfɛ kulu walima o ɲɔgɔna. Ko sababu kɛ jijukɔrɔla dilan cogoya ye, ji funu segin ta be sinsin yɔrɔ dɔnw fitiniw dɔrɔn kuna, ani ji funu telima kabɔ ji duguma be seka nati yen lala. A ɲinin ka yɔrɔ dɔ ɲinin i tɛna balan yɔrɔmina tuguni walima, kada i ka nɔni sew kan ani nin a sɔrɔ i yela, lala u be seka kɔnɔnikɛ walasa k'i bɔ.
question: I ka Kan ka mun kɛ nin minɛna woyo fɛ?
mc_answer1: A ɲinin k’i bɔ woyo kɔnɔ nin kilenni ye fan wɛrɛ fɛ, kɔfɛ k’i nɔn ka sɛgin dawolo la a cogo la
mc_answer2: I nɔn teliya la ka yɛlɛn woyo ma

flores_passage: Dugukɔnɔ jisiraw be seka kɛ dankun ɲuman ka konze sinsin o kan. Misalila, fɔlɔfɔlɔ satow lajɛli Loire Valley kɔnɔ, Rhine Valle walima batɔntali ka dugu nafanw la Danube sanfɛ walima batɔnbili Erie Canal fɛ. U bena tama ani nɔgɔsoboli siraw kodɔnlenw siraw ɲɛfɔ fɛnɛ.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, yɔrɔ jumɛn de faamadaga bɔnnali bɛ sɛn ka sɛgɛnfiyɛnlabɔ sennayaala kun bɔ?
mc_answer4: Jamana kɔnɔna jisira wo jisira dala

flores_passage: Kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛ, marayɔrɔ datugulen no nin Saheli ye, ani worodugu ani tileben yɔrɔla nin Ocean Atlantique ye. Musow: a ɲinin eno ko muso woyazikɛlaw bɛɛ ka fɔ nin u furulen no, siratuka sinsin kɛcogoyala. A nafan ka bɔn fɛnɛ ka tigɛla bagi dɔ do(fen dɔrɔn min da ma gɛlɛ kɔsɛbɛ). Musow kan ka famuya ko tabolo kelenyabaliyaw be fɛn nati n'u b'a wele ko ɛntimidasiyɔn ani a man ca u ka nɔminɛ, nin tigɛ minɛ ye, walima dɔ wɛrɛ. I yɛr ja cɛw ɲɔntili ye, ani kana siran ka jɔ i jɔyɔrɔla (tabalo kelenyabaliya walima u tɛ, o t'a kɛ fɛn daganlen ye).
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, jumɛn tɛ sɛn ka kɛ ladilikan kanunen ye musow taama tɔ yɔrɔ in na?
mc_answer1: I yɛrɛ minɛ furukow ɲɛfɔli ma
mc_answer2: I ka dɔn ko danbew danfaraw bɛ sɛn ka nani kogɛlɛnw ye ka bɔ dugukɔnɔdenw yɔrɔ la

flores_passage: Kɔkɔdugu yanfan fɛ, marayɔrɔ datugulen no nin Saheli ye, ani worodugu ani tileben yɔrɔla nin Ocean Atlantique ye. Musow: a ɲinin eno ko muso woyazikɛlaw bɛɛ ka fɔ nin u furulen no, siratuka sinsin kɛcogoyala. A nafan ka bɔn fɛnɛ ka tigɛla bagi dɔ do(fen dɔrɔn min da ma gɛlɛ kɔsɛbɛ). Musow kan ka famuya ko tabolo kelenyabaliyaw be fɛn nati n'u b'a wele ko ɛntimidasiyɔn ani a man ca u ka nɔminɛ, nin tigɛ minɛ ye, walima dɔ wɛrɛ. I yɛr ja cɛw ɲɔntili ye, ani kana siran ka jɔ i jɔyɔrɔla (tabalo kelenyabaliya walima u tɛ, o t'a kɛ fɛn daganlen ye).
question: Ka sinsin yɔrɔ kofɔlen kan tɛmɛ sira kɔnɔ, ladilikan min bɛ sɛn ka dɛmɛnni kɛ muso taamadenw ma?
mc_answer2: Ka bololanɛgɛ kunbaba don k’i ka furu koɲɛ jira
mc_answer3: A dɔn ko danbew cɛ danfaraw b’a jira k’i ka kan ka
mc_answer4: Nin kungoɲɛfɔliw m’i diya, sabati i ban ninna cɛw la

flores_passage: Kunkokɔnɔna be fototaw jɛla min ka gɛlɛ kosɛbɛ fototalama ma, ani mako be gɛrizigɛ, muɲu, ɛkisiperiyansi ani baaraminunw faralen ye ɲɔgɔnkan na. Kunkokɔnɔna fotota be jateminɛ fɛn nɔgɔ ye, nka inafɔ fotota bakurubala, foto be daɲɛ ba kelenw bɔ kɔrɔla. Kunkokɔnɔna fotota be waatidɔw la yɔrɔjanfototana ɲinin, ali na sɔrɔ fɛnw inafɔ kɔnɔ kuluw walima dantan fitini dɔw mako be kunkolo wɛrɛw la. Kunkokɔnɔ baganɲ camaw sɔrɔli ka gɛlɛ, ani sariya be parikiw kɔnɔ waatidɔw la ka ɲɛsin fototama fereli siratigɛw fɛ. Kunkokɔnɔ bagan be seka maloya walima ka fariya. Nɛnɛ, funteni be seka kɛ yɔrɔla walima be beka gɛlɛya.
question: Ka kɛɲi ni tɛmɛ sira in ye, sinariyo jumɛn mako bɛ sɔn ka jɔ Kunkokɔnɔna fototala ma?
mc_answer1: Nin u bɛ dantan fitiniw fotota a dan ma
mc_answer2: Nin forow bɛna ɲɛsin fereli siratigɛw fɛ
mc_answer3: Nin kunkokɔnɔ bagan min foro bɛka ta min bɛ maloya
mc_answer4: Nin pariki dɔ ye sariyaw ta ka ɲɛsin kunkokɔnɔna fotota man

flores_passage: Kunkokɔnɔna be fototaw jɛla min ka gɛlɛ kosɛbɛ fototalama ma, ani mako be gɛrizigɛ, muɲu, ɛkisiperiyansi ani baaraminunw faralen ye ɲɔgɔnkan na. Kunkokɔnɔna fotota be jateminɛ fɛn nɔgɔ ye, nka inafɔ fotota bakurubala, foto be daɲɛ ba kelenw bɔ kɔrɔla. Kunkokɔnɔna fotota be waatidɔw la yɔrɔjanfototana ɲinin, ali na sɔrɔ fɛnw inafɔ kɔnɔ kuluw walima dantan fitini dɔw mako be kunkolo wɛrɛw la. Kunkokɔnɔ baganɲ camaw sɔrɔli ka gɛlɛ, ani sariya be parikiw kɔnɔ waatidɔw la ka ɲɛsin fototama fereli siratigɛw fɛ. Kunkokɔnɔ bagan be seka maloya walima ka fariya. Nɛnɛ, funteni be seka kɛ yɔrɔla walima be beka gɛlɛya.
question: Ninnu na jumɛn kelen ma fɔ tɛmɛ sira in kɔnɔ inafɔ gɛlɛya dulonnen kunkokɔnɔna fototala ma?
mc_answer2: I mana bɛn bagan farinmanw ma

flores_passage: Mɔgɔw mɔgɔw bena fili ka jigi sanfɛlara walima kulu sanfɛ kan ɲɛzi jateminɛ, gilasi walima nɛnɛjuguman ba. Sira gilasi manw ani ɲɛzi man sanfɛ, minɛɲɔgɔnya ka dɔgɔ ani i tɛ seka boli komi inafɔ gudɔnrɔn gansan sanfɛ. Ɲɛzifiyɛnkolɔnbaw waatila, ɲɛzi dɔni dɔrɔn min be sek'i balan be seka jigin waati fitini bɛɛ la. Yeli be seka dɔgɔya nin ɲɛsi benin walima carili ye walima nin faariyeɲɔgɔn kan ye walima nin gilasi bolifɛn witiriw sanfɛ. Sira wɛrɛ fɛ, gilasi ani ɲɛzi cogoyaw ye nɔrɔmali ye jamana camaw na, ani bolilisiraw tɛ jɔ san waati sila.
question: Ninnu na jumɛn bɛ se ka dɔgɔya kɔsɛbɛ ka kunbalanw lase mobilibolila ma kulu saɲfɛlara?

flores_passage: Fo nin ye lasigiden ye, min be baara kɔkan waaticamala kɔrɔ ye ko i bena sɔrɔ takisi sara jamana la i sigilen min kɔnɔ. Sɔrɔ takisi dilaneno cogoyacamaw la jamana camaw la, ani takisi waariw ani bɔndaw be yɛlɛma cogoya bala kabɔ jamana dɔ la ka ta jamana dɔ la. Jamana kulu dɔw kɔnɔ, inafo Etazini ani Kanada, sɔrɔ takisi be bɔ jamana kulu yɔrɔ la ani maara yɔrɔ la, ola waariw and bɔndaw be seka yɛlɛma kabɔ maarayɔrɔ dɔla ka ta maarayɔrɔ dɔ wɛrɛ la.
question: Fɛn jumɛn kelen de ka teli ka to ye takisi sarali ko la jamana caman kɔnɔ?

flores_passage: Fo nin ye lasigiden ye, min be baara kɔkan waaticamala kɔrɔ ye ko i bena sɔrɔ takisi sara jamana la i sigilen min kɔnɔ. Sɔrɔ takisi dilaneno cogoyacamaw la jamana camaw la, ani takisi waariw ani bɔndaw be yɛlɛma cogoya bala kabɔ jamana dɔ la ka ta jamana dɔ la. Jamana kulu dɔw kɔnɔ, inafo Etazini ani Kanada, sɔrɔ takisi be bɔ jamana kulu yɔrɔ la ani maara yɔrɔ la, ola waariw and bɔndaw be seka yɛlɛma kabɔ maarayɔrɔ dɔla ka ta maarayɔrɔ dɔ wɛrɛ la.
question: Ka kɛɲɛ ni tɛmɛsira in ye, nin i bɛ baara kɛ jamana kɔkɔjikɔfɛ jamanaw la n'ka i sigilen do yɔrɔ wɛrɛ, a ka can a la i bena i ka sɔrɔ takisi sara yɔrɔ jumɛn?
mc_answer1: Yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ n'i sigilendo ka kɔrɔ
mc_answer3: Jamana kɔnɔ i bɛ baara la yɔrɔ min ni waati in na
mc_answer4: Yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ nin sɔngɔ ka nɔkɔn kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛn

flores_passage: Diɲɛ Sugu dɔ (kodɔnlen inafɔ World Eɲposition walima Expo dɔrɔn) ye diɲɛ ariw ani dɔniyaw ka fɛti ye. Jamana minunw bo sendo ala be catiri ani kalan tulɔnkɛw jira yɛlɛmali so kɔnɔ ka diɲɛ kunbalanw jira walima u ka dugu tabolo ani tariku. International Horticultural Expositions ye baara kɛrɛnkɛrɛni ye min filɛriw jira, filɛri zaridenw ani fɛnw fɛn nin o be taga nin jiriw ye. Ali na sɔrɔ hakilinanala, u be seka kɛ san un san (fo nin a be kɛ jamana camaw na), tiɲɛla u tɛ kɛ. Nin baara ninunw be kɛ nɔrɔmalila kalo saba ani wɔɔrɔ nin ɲɔgɔncɛ, ani be kɛ yɔrɔ minunw man dɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ ɛkitari 5o kan.
question: Ninnu laseliw jumɛn tɛ Diɲɛ Sugu bugunnatigɛ tigitigi?
mc_answer1: Tulɔnkɛw bɛ se jamana dɔ ka tariku walima balo cogoyaw jira yɛlɛmali so kɔnɔ
mc_answer2: Filɛriw jiraliw bɛ jira yɛlɛmali so kɔnɔ ariw ani dɔniyaw jiraliw kɛrɛfɛ
mc_answer3: Baara ninunw be se ka kɛ fo katase kalo wɔrɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: A ɲinni ne tɛ Jamanaw k'u sen do a la

flores_passage: Diɲɛ Sugu dɔ (kodɔnlen inafɔ World Eɲposition walima Expo dɔrɔn) ye diɲɛ ariw ani dɔniyaw ka fɛti ye. Jamana minunw bo sendo ala be catiri ani kalan tulɔnkɛw jira yɛlɛmali so kɔnɔ ka diɲɛ kunbalanw jira walima u ka dugu tabolo ani tariku. International Horticultural Expositions ye baara kɛrɛnkɛrɛni ye min filɛriw jira, filɛri zaridenw ani fɛnw fɛn nin o be taga nin jiriw ye. Ali na sɔrɔ hakilinanala, u be seka kɛ san un san (fo nin a be kɛ jamana camaw na), tiɲɛla u tɛ kɛ. Nin baara ninunw be kɛ nɔrɔmalila kalo saba ani wɔɔrɔ nin ɲɔgɔncɛ, ani be kɛ yɔrɔ minunw man dɔgɔ ka tɛmɛ ɛkitari 5o kan.
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen ye Diɲɛ Sugu wali International Exposition sariya dɔ ye?
mc_answer1: Jiraliw kan ka fɛn fila de jira yɛlɛmali so kɔnɔ diɲɛ kunbalanw jira walima u ka dugu tabolo ani tariku
mc_answer2: Jamana kelen in tɛ se k’'a baaraw kɛ san o san ka tugu ɲɔgɔna
mc_answer3: Baaraw kan ka kɛ kalo wɔrɔ kɔnɔ
mc_answer4: Walasa ka sugu in sigi, jamana bɛɛ kan ka sen do a la

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ baganw minunw be pariki in kɔnɔ degilen no mɔgɔw yelila, kunko ye kunko le ye ani makan balo walima k'u tɔrɔ. Pariki marabaw ka kumana, mabɔ mɛtiri 100 kabɔ urisiw ani luw la ani mɛtiri 25 kabɔ konkokɔnɔ bagan tɔw bɛɛ la. U mana magaya cogow cogow, kunkomisi, mankalaniw, minanw, urisiw ani masurunyala konkosɔkɔ belebele baw be seka mɔkɔ minɛ. San un san, lajɛlikɛraw cama be mandini bari u ma mabɔ kaɲɛ. Nin baganw ka bɔn, ma mara ani ou masuba kabon fo ka dantimi, ola u ka yɔrɔ d'u ma. Farankalila, i jant'ala ko kasa be urisiw sama ani kunkosoko wɛrɛw, ola i farati ka nana ni walima ka dumuni kasamaba dilann ani sigiyɔrɔ lajɛya.
question: Ninnu jumɛn kɛli bɛ se ka dɔ bɔ bagan dɔ binkani farati la?
mc_answer1: Binbulu suma dumanw tali i fɛ
mc_answer3: Ka mɛtɛrɛ 25 do a ni luw cɛ
mc_answer4: Banganw bɔli kana dumuni tɔw nɔfɛ

flores_passage: Ali na sɔrɔ baganw minunw be pariki in kɔnɔ degilen no mɔgɔw yelila, kunko ye kunko le ye ani makan balo walima k'u tɔrɔ. Nin baganw ka bɔn, ma mara ani ou masuba kabon fo ka dantimi, ola u ka yɔrɔ d'u ma. Farankalila, i jant'ala ko kasa be urisiw sama ani kunkosoko wɛrɛw, ola i farati ka nana ni walima ka dumuni kasamaba dilann ani sigiyɔrɔ lajɛya.
question: Ninnu jumɛn kelen ma fɔ ni tɛmɛ sira in kɔnɔ inafɔ kun dɔ min bɛ se ka na ni kunkonɔnfɛn ka binkaniw ye?
mc_answer2: Dɛsɛ ka yɔrɔ jan do aw cɛ
mc_answer4: Bagan minnu ma deli mɔgɔw la
